1.name: Uzumaki Naruto
1.description: A Genin from Team 7, Naruto is an orphan with the goal to one day become Hokage. Using his signature move, Shadow Clones, Naruto is able to perform powerful moves such as the Uzumaki Naruto Combo and the Rasengan.

skills.skillDescription: This skill deals 20 damage to one enemy. During 'Shadow Clones' this skill will deal 10 additional damage.
Uzumaki Naruto will gain 1 random energy after 1 turn. For 1 turn 'Uzumaki Naruto Combo' and 'Rasengan' will be unable to be used.
Uzumaki Naruto gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. During this time 'Uzumaki Naruto Combo' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Rasengan' can be used.
This skill makes Uzumaki Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Naruto deals 45 damage to one enemy and stuns their skills for 1 turn.

2.name: Haruno Sakura
2.description: A Genin from Team 7, Sakura is very intelligent, but self-conscious about herself. Having just recently received training from Tsunade, Sakura is now able to deliver powerful punches and heal her own allies.

skills.skillDescription: Haruno Sakura deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. During 'Inner Sakura', 'KO Punch' deals 10 additional damage.
Haruno Sakura heals herself or an ally for 25 health.
For 4 turns, Haruno Sakura will gain 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all stun effects. During this time 'KO Punch' will deal 10 additional damage.
This skill makes Haruno Sakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

3.name: Uchiha Sasuke
3.description: A Genin from Team 7, Sasuke is the lone survivor of the Uchiha clan and has sworn vengeance against his brother. Using his sharingan, Sasuke is able to anticipate incoming attacks and is capable of advanced offensive moves.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Sasuke deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 15 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Sharingan'.
Uchiha Sasuke deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 25 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Sharingan'.

Uchiha Sasuke targets one enemy. For 3 turns, Uchiha Sasuke will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill will end if Uchiha Sasuke dies.
This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

4.name: Inuzuka Kiba
4.description: A Genin from Team 8, Kiba is a member of the Inuzuka clan, and is both short-tempered and impulsive. Using his dog, Akamaru, Kiba is capable of powerful taijutsu or fusing with Akamaru to become a deadly double headed dog.

skills.skillDescription: This skill deals 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Double Headed Wolf' this skill is improved and costs 1 less random energy.

Inuzuka Kiba deals 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, 'Garouga' will be improved and cost 1 random energy less.* During this time, Inuzuka Kiba gains 15 points of damage reduction.

Inuzuka Kiba targets one enemy making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. During this time, 'Garouga' and 'Double Headed Wolf' will deal 5 additional damage to them. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.
This skill makes Inuzuka Kiba invulnerable for 1 turn.

5.name: Aburame Shino
5.description: A Genin from Team 8, Shino is the successor of the Aburame clan, and a very reserved and tactical fighter. Using the bugs that live inside his body, Shino is able to leech the chakra off his enemies, or protect his entire team.

skills.skillDescription: Aburame Shino deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them.

Aburame Shino targets one enemy. For 3 turns, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 5. During this time, 'Chakra Leach' will deal 5 additional damage to them. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.
Aburame Shino grants his team 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Aburame Shino invulnerable for 1 turn.

6.name: Hyuuga Hinata
6.description: A Genin from Team 8, Hinata is the next in line in the Hyuuga clan, but she is shy and very withdrawn. Using the trademark Byakugan of the Hyuuga, Hinata is able to delicately target an enemy's Chakra Points while defending the team.

skills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Hinata deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. If used during 'Byakugan', this skill will also remove 1 random energy each turn.
Hyuuga Hinata deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants her team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. If used during 'Byakugan', this skill will deal 5 additional damage.
Hyuuga Hinata gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, 'Hinata Gentle Fist' and 'Protective Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms' will be improved.
This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata invulnerable for 1 turn.

7.name: Nara Shikamaru
7.description: A Genin from Team 10, a member of the Nara clan, Shikamaru is considered to be the smartest Genin of all the Konoha 11. Using his bloodline, Shikamaru can manipulate the shadows in the battlefield to disable and attack his enemies.

skills.skillDescription: Nara Shikamaru targets one enemy for 5 turns. During this time 'Shadow-Neck Bind' and 'Shadow Imitation' will be improved on them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.
Nara Shikamaru makes all enemies unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable* and deals 15 damage to them for 1 turn. This skill lasts 1 additional turn on enemies affected by 'Meditate'.
Nara Shikamaru stuns all enemies' physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill lasts 1 additional turn on enemies affected by 'Meditate'.
This skill makes Nara Shikamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

8.name: Akimichi Chouji
8.description: A Genin from Team 10, Chouji is a member of the Akimichi clan, a large eater, and a close friend to his allies. While innately strong, Chouji is able to sacrifice his own life using special pills from his clan to become insanely powerful.

skills.skillDescription: Akimichi Chouji deals 20 damage to one enemy.
Akimichi Chouji deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns and becomes invulnerable for 2 turns.

For the rest of the game, 'Partial Double Size' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Meat Tank' will deal 10 additional damage. Akimichi Chouji takes 20 affliction damage.* This skill can only be used three times and costs 1 additional random energy with each use.
This skill makes Akimichi Chouji invulnerable for 1 turn.

9.name: Yamanaka Ino
9.description: A Genin from Team 10, Ino is a member of the Yamanaka clan, and a very confident and vain girl. Ino is able to use a variety of abilities to take over and control her enemies, making it difficult to tell friend from foe.

skills.skillDescription: Yamanaka Ino stuns one enemy's  physical, energy and strategic skills and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. One random enemy will take 30 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

Yamanaka Ino targets one enemy for 4 turns, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and stunning their skills. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Art of the Valentine'.
For 1 turn, if one target enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will have the cooldowns of their skills increased by 1 for 2 turns. This skill is invisible until triggered.
This skill makes Yamanaka Ino invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Yamanaka Ino deals 25 damage to one enemy.

10.name: Rock Lee
10.description: A member of team Gai; Lee is a genin with no talent at all in ninjutsu or genjutsu, so he has focused his life all on taijutsu. With his powerful hand to hand techniques, Lee can crush any defense with his immense power.

skills.skillDescription: Rock Lee deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, Rock Lee will gain 10 points of damage reduction and that enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Front Lotus'. This skill stacks and will deal 15 additional damage during 'Fifth Gate Opening'.
Rock Lee deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 30 additional damage during 'Fifth Gate Opening'.

Rock Lee removes all harmful effects on him, losing 40 health*, and then becoming invulnerable to all harmful skills for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Final Lotus'. The affliction damage dealt by this skill cannot be ignored and cannot kill Rock Lee.
This skill makes Rock Lee invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Rock Lee deals 100 damage to one enemy.

11.name: Tenten
11.description: A member of team Gai, Tenten is a tomboyish weapon specialist who believes a kunoichi can be as strong as a male ninja. In battle, Tenten surrounds the battlefield in weapons, using them for damage and for disabling her opponents.

skills.skillDescription: Tenten deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all others. All enemies will take 10 additional damage from 'Twin Rising Dragons Trap' and will have their physical and energy damage lowered by 10 additional points from it.
Tenten deals 5 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their physical and energy damage will be lowered by 5. All stacks of 'Twin Rising Dragons' will be removed from all targets afterwards.

Tenten becomes invulnerable to non-strategic skills for 1 turn and improves her harmful skills until the next time she uses one; this doesn't stack. 'Twin Rising Dragons' will apply its non-damage effect twice and the damage reduction effect of 'Twin Rising Dragons Trap' will last 1 additional turn.
This skill makes Tenten invulnerable for 1 turn.

12.name: Hyuuga Neji
12.description: A member of team Gai; Neji is the most talented member of the Hyuuga clan in both mind and body. Neji can use the most powerful techniques of his clan, shutting down an enemy's chakra or defending with an absolute defense.

skills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Neji deals 25 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, this enemy's non-affliction damage will be lowered by 5.
Hyuuga Neji deals 10 damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.
Hyuuga Neji deals 40 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.
This skill makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for 1 turn.

13.name: Gaara
13.description: A Jinchuuriki from the Village of Sand, Gaara is an unstable ninja with the Shukaku, the one-tailed beast. With the Shukaku, and his own abilities, Gaara can manipulate the sand in his gourd to crush the enemy, or defend himself.

skills.skillDescription: Gaara stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. For the following 2 turns, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Sand Burial'.
Until the next time Gaara receives new non-affliction damage, he will ignore all enemy stun effects. This skill cannot be used while active.
Gaara gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill cannot stack and will re-apply itself.
This skill makes Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Gaara kills one enemy. This skill requires 'Sand Coffin' to be active on this enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

14.name: Kankuro
14.description: The brother of Gaara, and a master puppeeter, Kankuro is one of the three sand siblings. With his puppets, Kankuro is able to use the varied abilities hidden inside them to attack his enemies, or even protect himself.

skills.skillDescription: Kankuro deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from 'Poison Bomb'.
Kankuro deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, these enemies will take 5 additional damage from 'Black Secret Machine One Shot'.
Kankuro gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. For 4 turns, 'Black Secret Machine One Shot' and 'Poison Bomb' will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Kankuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

15.name: Temari
15.description: The elder sister of Gaara and Kankuro, Temari is a somewhat cruel and blunt ninja that fights using the wind at her side. With her fan, Temari can create powerful gusts of wind that she can manipulate at her desite.

skills.skillDescription: Temari deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Temari will be invulnerable to non-mental skills.
Temari deals 35 piercing damage to all enemies.
Temari makes her team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 20 less damage.
This skill makes Temari invulnerable for 1 turn.

16.name: Kinuta Dosu
16.description: One of the three sound genin, and possibly the strongest; Dosu is an intelligent and patient ninja that likes to act with logic. Using a powerful sound based arm, Dosu can disable his enemies by disrupting their hearing and throwing them off.

skills.skillDescription: Kinuta Dosu deals 20 damage to one enemy. This enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. The following turn, 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage to them.

Kinuta Dosu deals 10 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will deal 5 less damage from non-affliction skills. This effect stacks.
For the following 4 turns, 'Resonating Echo Drill' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage.
This skill makes Kinuta Dosu invulnerable for 1 turn.

17.name: Tsuchi Kin
17.description: One of the three sound genin; Kin is a confident ninja that likes to toy with her enemies before finishing them off. Using a set of needles and bells, Kin has a number of different effects she can create to attack her enemies.

skills.skillDescription: One enemy takes 15 damage. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Unnerving Bells', that enemy will take 25 additional damage. If used one turn after 'Needle and Bell Trap', Tsuchi Kin will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

One enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Unnerving Bells', that enemy will also be stunned for 1 turn. If used one turn after 'Illusion Bell Needles', that enemy will also take 10 damage.

One enemy loses 1 random energy. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Needle and Bell Trap', that enemy will also take 15 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn. If used one turn after 'Illusion Bell Needles', that enemy will also take 15 additional damage from energy skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Tsuchi Kin invulnerable for 1 turn.

18.name: Abumi Zaku
18.description: One of the three sound genin; Zaku is a willful individual who has a very strong desire to win and succeed. Using the implanted tubes in his arm, Zaku can create powerful waves of chakra, or alter the wind ever so gently to protect an ally.

skills.skillDescription: Abumi Zaku deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, 'Extreme Decapitating Airwaves' may be used.
Abumi Zaku targets one ally. The following turn, the first non-strategic skill used on this ally will be countered. This skill is invisible.
Abumi Zaku deals 45 damage to all enemies. This skill requires 'Decapitating Airwaves' to be used in the previous turn.
This skill makes Abumi Zaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

19.name: Young Kakashi
19.description: A jounin at the age of 13 and the son of the legendary White Fang, Kakashi is a member of Team Minato. Using his early ninjutsu, and borrowed sharingan, Kakashi can fight any adult on an equal level.

skills.skillDescription: Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.
Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

For 2 turns, if one enemy uses a new skill that removes/steals/gains energy, Young Kakashi will gain 1 random energy. If they use a skill that stuns, Young Kakashi's skills will stun for 1 turn. If they use a skill that damages, Young Kakashi's skills will deal 10 additional damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and ends when triggered.
This skill makes Young Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

20.name: Uchiha Obito
20.description: A minor member of the Uchiha clan and a chuunin, Obito is a member of Team Minato. While Obito does not possess any singular powerful ability, he can use all of what he knows with his developing sharingan to put up a fight.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Obito deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Obito Sharingan', this skill will deal 10 additional damage.
Uchiha Obito deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During 'Obito Sharingan', this skill will deal 30 affliction damage instantly and have no cooldown.

Uchiha Obito targets one ally. For 4 turns, Uchiha Obito will gain 15 points of damage reduction. If Uchiha Obito dies, that ally will gain 5 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage permanently. This skill becomes 'Sharingan-Enhanced Parry' for 4 turns after used.
This skill makes Uchiha Obito invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uchiha Obito makes his allies invulnerable for 1 turn.

21.name: Nohara Rin
21.description: A chuunin medical nin assigned to Team Minato, Rin is a quiet and passive girl who focuses on keeping her team mates alive. Using her healing abilities, and her intelligence, Rin is able to heal her allies while trapping her enemies.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, Nohara Rin will gain 15 points of damage reduction and one target enemy will take 15 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability at the end of their turn. If that enemy uses a new skill, they will also take another 15 damage from this skill. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability. This skill's damage isn't increased nor decreased by effects used on Nohara Rin.
Nohara Rin heals herself or an ally for 25 health and removes all harmful afflictions on this character.

Nohara Rin targets herself or an ally. For 3 turns, that character will be healed for 10 health each turn. During this time, any healing skills used by the target will heal 10 additional health and they will deal 5 additional damage with physical and energy skills.
This skill makes Nohara Rin invulnerable for 1 turn.

21.3.name: Hyuuga Hanabi
21.3.description: The younger sister of Hinata, Hanabi is a Hyuuga clan member who trains endlessly to prove herself. Hanabi's skills surpass her elder sister's, and while lacking in strength, Hanabi makes up for it with her tenacity and speed.

skills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Hanabi deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, everytime this enemy uses a new energy removal, drain or gain skill, they will lose 1 random energy.*
Hyuuga Hanabi deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, everytime this enemy uses a skill that stuns, they will be stunned for 1 turn.*

For 2 turns, Hyuuga Hanabi will be unable to be killed and will ignore all stun effects. During this time, 'Hanabi Gentle Fist' and 'Hanabi Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven' will cost 1 random energy instead and Hyuuga Hanabi will deal 5 additional damage.
This skill makes Hyuuga Hanabi invulnerable for 1 turn.

21.5.name: Teuchi
21.5.description: Teuchi is a citizen of the Hidden Leaf Village and the owner of Ramen Ichiraku. As a teenager, Teuchi devoted his life to making ramen, what undoubtedly makes him the most important character from the Naruto franchise.

skills.skillDescription: Teuchi deals 20 damage to one enemy.
Teuchi heals his allies for 20 health and gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.
Teuchi targets all his allies. For the rest of the game, everytime an ally uses a new skill, 'Ramen' will heal 5 additional health permanently. This skill stacks and ends if Teuchi dies.
This skill makes Teuchi invulnerable for 1 turn, heals him for 40 health and ends 'Ramen Ichiraku: Open' on his team.

21.8.name: Young Minato
21.8.description: Minato is a prodigy kid from the Hidden Leaf Village who is capable of fighting other shinobi in higher ranks by having faster and stronger taijutsu skills. He entered the Hidden Leaf's Academy with the dream of earning the villagers' respect and recognition by becoming Hokage.

skills.skillDescription: Young Minato deals 25 damage to one enemy. If Young Minato's health is at 40 or below, this skill will also stun the enemy for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered.
Young Minato removes all harmful skills from one ally and makes them invulnerable for 1 turn. If 'Highground Watcher' was used the previous turn, this invulnerability will last 2 turns instead.

One random enemy will have 'Speedy Flanker' applied on them. One random ally will have 'Night Saviour' applied on them. These skills' conditional effects won't trigger this way. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Young Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

22.name: Young Kushina
22.description: Kushina is a kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village originated from the Hidden Eddy Village's Uzumaki Clan. Due to her special origins, Kushina has a red colored hair that constantly puts her into trouble.

skills.skillDescription: Young Kushina gains 1 random energy. For 4 turns, Young Kushina gains 20 points of destructible defense and ignores enemy stun effects.

Young Kushina destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 20 damage to them. The following turn, 'Dropping Kick' will deal 20 additional damage and will first destroy its target's destructible defense.
Young Kushina deals 10 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-startegic skills. The following turn, 'Fierce Punch' will deal 10 additional damage and will stun enemy non-strategic skills.
This skill makes Young Kushina invulnerable for 1 turn.

22.1.name: Mahiru
22.1.description: Mahiru is a jounin from the Hidden Rock Village. During the Third Shinobi World War Mahiru was partnered with Kakkou and Taiseki. He went out to surveillance the area in which Team Minato was travelling. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Darkness

skills.skillDescription: Mahiru deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then marks them permanently. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.
Mahiru deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and then marks them permanently. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

Mahiru deals 0 piercing damage to one enemy and then becomes invulnerable for 2 turns. If the enemy is marked by either 'Sword Slash' or 'Shadow Clone Assault', this skill will deal 25 piercing damage instead. If they are marked by both, this skill will deal 50 piercing damage instead. All of Mahiru's markings will be removed from that enemy afterwards.
This skill makes Mahiru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Young Kakashi.

22.2.name: Taiseki
22.2.description: Taiseki is a jounin from the Hidden Rock Village. During the Third Shinobi World War, he led a team with Kakkou and Mahiru, using their superb diversionary tactics to attack the enemy. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Nix

skills.skillDescription: Taiseki deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage.

Taiseki targets one enemy. For 2 turns, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will ignore all friendly destructible defense and healing effects. If they use a new skill during this time, they will be countered. If successfully countered, their non-strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn, Taiseki will gain 1 random energy and this skill will end.
For 3 turns, Taiseki will ignore enemy stun effects and 'Precise Kunai Strike' and 'Hostage Capture' will be invisible if used. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Taiseki invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Rin.

22.3.name: Kakkou
22.3.description: Kakkou is a jounin from the Hidden Rock Village. During the Third Shinobi World War he was partnered with Taiseki and Mahiru. He most notably engaged Team Minato of the Hidden Leaf Village, led by Hatake Kakashi. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Neji1113

skills.skillDescription: Kakkou targets all enemies. The main target will take 25 damage and any enemy affected by 'Interrogation Genjutsu' will take 15 damage.

Kakkou deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of permanent destructible defense that stacks. If any target of this skill has 'Interrogation Genjutsu' active on them, 'Interrogation Genjutsu' will be applied again on them.
Kakkou targets one enemy, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 2 turns.
This skill makes Kakkou invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Obito (classic).

22.5.name: Anbu Kakashi
22.5.description: After everything that went down with his teammates, Kakashi decided to join Anbu. He quickly became one of the strongest members of the organization and even a captain of it.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, Anbu Kakashi targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill, then for 2 turns 'Sharingan: Copy Technique' will be replaced by the skill used by that enemy and 'Raikiri' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

Anbu Kakashi targets one enemy, stunning their skills and making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. Permanently, that enemy will take 10 additional damage from energy skills. This skill stacks.
Anbu Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy.
This skill makes Anbu Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Young Kakashi.

22.6.name: Tenzou
22.6.description: Tenzou is one of the sixty children that were abducted by Orochimaru to be his test subjects. He was injected with the First Hokage's DNA in the hopes that he could replicate the First's ability to use Wood Release. Tenzou ended up being taken by Danzo, then he was recruited into the Anbu's Root division.

skills.skillDescription: This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Tenzou's team. If used on an enemy, they will take 25 damage and then will deal 5 less non-affliction damage for 2 turns. If used on a member of Tenzou's team, they will gain 25 points of destructible defense and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 2 turns.

This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Tenzou's team. If used on an enemy, they will deal 15 less non-affliction damage and will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills for 2 turns. If used on a member of Tenzou's team, they will gain 20 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 2 turns.

This skill can be used on an enemy or on a member of Tenzou's team. If used on an enemy, they will be stunned for 2 turns and will permanently deal 10 less non-affliction damage. If used on a member of Tenzou's team, they will become invulnerable for 2 turns and will permanently deal 10 additional non-affliction damage. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Tenzou invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Anbu Kakashi.

22.7.name: Anbu Itachi
22.7.description: Itachi joined Konoha's Anbu from a very young age, following orders directly from the Hokage and the village's elders. What he didn't know is that something would be requested to him later, what would change his life and his clan's forever.

skills.skillDescription: Anbu Itachi deals 10 affliction damage* to his allies and then increases his non-conditional damage by 5 permanently. For 2 turns, Anbu Itachi will gain 1 random energy each turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Mangekyou Genjutsu' permanently after used.
Anbu Itachi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and for 1 turn their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy.

Anbu Itachi gains 1 random energy and targets all enemies, making their stun and counter skills last 1 turn less for 1 turn. For 3 turns, Anbu Itachi will have 10 points of damage reduction and this skill will be replaced by 'Illusory Crow Replacement'.
This skill makes Anbu Itachi invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Anbu Itachi targets one enemy. For 1 turn, they will deal 100% less damage and their stun and counter skills will last 1 turn less. The following turn, this enemy will take 25 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible on the first turn.
Anbu Itachi targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, they will be countered and take 10 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Anbu Kakashi or Tenzou.
Win 20 battles with Anbu Kakashi or Tenzou.

22.8.name: Corrupted Obito
22.8.description: After spending some time with Madara, Obito decides to get back to his teammates with the help of Guruguru's regenerative body. However, a dark path for both Kakashi and Rin awaits their old friend, a path that would awake a disrupture on his mind and dreams.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, Corrupted Obito will ignore all enemy damage dealt. This skill lasts 2 additional turns for each ally that is dead. This skill deals 5  affliction damage* to Corrupted Obito for each ally that is dead. This skill cannot be used while active and ends when 'Wood Release: Cutting Technique' is used.

Corrupted Obito deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. The following turn, they will receive an additional 30 piercing damage. The initial damage of this skill will be increased by 10 for each ally that is dead.
Corrupted Obito deals 20 damage to one enemy. This damage is increased by 10 for each ally that is dead. This skill deals 10 affliction damage* to Corrupted Obito for each ally that is dead.

Corrupted Obito applies 'Reactionary Intangibility' on himself and deals 0 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each ally that is dead. If an enemy's health drops to 20 or below, they will deal 10 less non-affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Obito (classic).
Win 20 battles with any Minato Team member.

23.name: Drunken Lee
23.description: Having accidentally drank sake, Lee's hidden Drunken Fist powers have awakened, completely changing his fighting style. While drunk, Lee attacks randomly, but is harder to stop the more he keeps fighting.

skills.skillDescription: Drunken Lee deals 20 damage to one random enemy. This skill cannot be countered. Each time this skill is used, it will deal 5 additional damage.
Drunken Lee targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first non-strategic skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will have 'Unpredictable Assault' used on them*.

Drunken Lee deals 15 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. *The following 3 turns, Drunken Lee will ignore all stun effects, and 'Unpredictable Assault' will become targetable while dealing 5 additional damage.
This skill makes Drunken Lee invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Rock Lee.

24.name: Rehabilitated Gaara
24.description: After his fateful encounter with Naruto, Gaara has left behind his murderous ways, and has instead rehabilitated. Gaara has honed his abilities to shape and craft his sand, allowing him to create giant waves of sand or quicksand traps.

skills.skillDescription: Rehabilitated Gaara deals 15 damage to one enemy for 3 turns and gains 35 points of permanent destructible defense.* This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

For 1 turn, all enemies' non-strategic skills will have their costs increased by 1 random energy. This skill will end on them if they use a new non-strategic skill. Afterwards, this skill will be replaced by 'Desert Imperial Funeral' for 1 turn.

Rehabilitated Gaara deals 15 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time, all destructible defense skills that the enemy team uses will grant 10 less destructible defense, and all destructible defense skills Rehabilitated Gaara's team uses will grant 10 additional destructible defense.*
This skill makes Rehabilitated Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Rehabilitated Gaara targets all enemies affected by 'Prison Sand Burial', destroying their destructible defense then dealing 40 piercing damage to them.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Gaara.

25.name: Oboro
25.description: A Rain Genin in the Chuunin exams, Oboro is vindictive ninja that specializes in genjutsu. Using the various illusions that Oboro creates, he is able to hide his true self while attacking from below.

skills.skillDescription: Oboro deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies. During 'Haze Clone', this skill will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 5 additional damage.
Oboro deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and affliction skills for 1 turn. During 'Haze Clone', this skill will target all enemies and will cost 1 less random energy.

For 2 turns, 'Exploding Kunai' will cost 1 less random energy and will deal 5 additional damage and 'Earth Swim' will target all enemies and will cost 1 less random energy. During this time, Oboro will become invulnerable to non-strategic skills.
This skill makes Oboro invulnerable for 1 turn.

26.name: Shigure
26.description: A genin from the village of rain, Shigure is a strong, but arrogant ninja. Using a number of Umbrellas, Shigure is able to attack all enemies with sharp senbon needles, or focus everything to one enemy.

skills.skillDescription: For 4 turns, 'Needle Barrage' and 'Sprinkling Needles' will deal 5 additional damage. During this time Shigure will have 5 points of damage reduction. This skill stacks.
Shigure deals 25 damage to one enemy affected by 'Sprinkling Needles'.
Shigure deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, 'Needle Barrage' can be used on them. This skill cannot be countered.
This skill makes Shigure invulnerable for 1 turn.

26.5.name: Shiore Orochimaru
26.5.description: Shiore was a genin from the Hidden Grass Village that was killed by Orochimaru before the Chuunin Exams. He had his identity stolen by him afterwards.

skills.skillDescription: Shiore Orochimaru targets one enemy, removing 1 random energy from them and making their skills cost 1 additional random energy for 1 turn. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by 'Giant Snake Bind', this enemy will have 1 random energy stolen instead and the energy cost increase effect will last 2 turns instead.
Shiore Orochimaru targets one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them for 2 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.
Shiore Orochimaru stuns one enemy for 2 turns. For 1 turn, this skill can be used for 1 random energy to deal 25 damage to the enemy affected by it.
This skill makes Shiore Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sasuke (classic).
Win 5 battles in a row with Mitarashi Anko.

27.name: Akadou Yoroi
27.description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Yoroi is a capable, but brash ninja who likes to toy with his enemies. Yoroi is capable of absorbing the strength of his enemies, and make it his own in more than one way.

skills.skillDescription: Akadou Yoroi steals 20 health from one enemy then lowers their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Akadou Yoroi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

For 3 turns, Akadou Yoroi steals 15 health from one enemy each turn. Their non-affliction damage will be lowered by 5 for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Akadou Yoroi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.
For 2 turns, if 'Energy Drain' or 'Draining Assault' are used, they will also steal 1 random energy for their duration.
This skill makes Akadou Yoroi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Sound Genin (Kin, Zaku or Dosu).

28.name: Tsurugi Misumi
28.description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Misumi likes taking the initiative when it comes to combat. Misumi can flex his muscles and bones, twisting them to wrap around his enemies, or even defend his allies.

skills.skillDescription: Tsurugi Misumi gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and targets one enemy or one member of his team. If used on an enemy, they will take 15 damage that ignores invulnerability. If used on a member of his team, they will gain 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

Tsurugi Misumi targets one enemy. For 2 turns, all new harmful skills used on Tsurugi Misumi will be reflected onto that enemy instead. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.
Tsurugi Misumi gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense. If 'Soft Physique Modification' is active, the enemy targeted by it will also take 20 damage and be stunned for 1 turn.
This skill makes Tsurugi Misumi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kankuro.

29.name: Umino Iruka
29.description: An instructor for Konoha, Iruka is a caring man who has acted like something of a father and mentor to Naruto throughout his youth. Iruka fights with his allies in mind, preferring to protect them and help them as support.

skills.skillDescription: Umino Iruka deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 additional damage for each 25 health Umino Iruka has lost.
Umino Iruka makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

The following turn, if one enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 40 damage that ignores invulnerability, and for 1 turn they will take 25 additional damage from physical and energy skills. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Umino Iruka invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 3 battles in a row with every Genin from Team 7, 8 and 10 (Naruto, Sakura, Sasuke, Kiba, Shino, Hinata, Ino, Shikamaru, Chouji).

30.name: Mizuki
30.description: An instructor for Konoha, Mizuki is a chuunin, and old friend of Iruka that over time grew jealous and petty. While Mizuki doesn't have any special abilities, he knows to instead be patient, and wait until the right time to strike.

skills.skillDescription: Mizuki deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns.
Mizuki deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 additional damage for each 20 health they have lost. This skill can only be used twice. This skill cannot be removed.

After 1 turn, Mizuki will become invulnerable, 'Kunai Assault' will deal 30 damage instantly and 'Execution Shuriken' will deal 30 additional damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible the first turn and will end if Mizuki successfully receives a new harmful skill.
This skill makes Mizuki invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Iruka.

31.name: Jiroubou
31.description: A member of the Sound Five, Jiroubou is the largest member of the team, and while he appears calm, is actually arrogant and easy to anger. Jiroubou uses his fists to attack his enemies or can manipulate the battleground around him.

skills.skillDescription: Jiroubou deals 30 damage to one enemy. The following turn, 'Earth Mausoleum Dumpling' will deal 5 additional damage.
Jiroubou deals 20 damage to all enemies. The following turn, 'Arhat Fist' will deal 10 additional damage.

For 3 turns, Jiroubou and all allies will gain 35 points of destructible defense. During this time, one target enemy will have 1 random energy stolen each turn. This skill's energy drain effect will end if Jiroubou's destructible defense is destroyed.
This skill makes Jiroubou invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Chouji.

32.name: Kidoumaru
32.description: A member of the Sound Five, Kidoumaru resembles a spider in both appearance and fighting style. Kidoumaru is able to trap enemies in his web while assaulting them from afar with both spiders and powerful arrows.

skills.skillDescription: Kidoumaru deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.

Kidoumaru deals 10 damage to all enemies for 5 turns. During this time, Kidoumaru will gain 10 points of damage reduction and all enemies who use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 1.
Kidoumaru targets himself or one ally. The following turn, the first non-strategic skill used on the target will be countered. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Kidoumaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Neji.

33.name: Tayuya
33.description: A member of the Sound Five, Tayuya is the only female member of the team, and the most foul-mouthed one too. Tayuya uses her flute to both trap her enemies in genjutsu while controlling the beasts she summons.

skills.skillDescription: Tayuya deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Tayuya will gain 10 points of damage reduction*. During this time, 'Demonic Flute: Phantom Wave' will also remove 1 random energy from its target if used*.
Tayuya deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy. During 'Summoning: Doki', this skill will also remove 1 random energy from its target.
Tayuya stuns all enemies' non-mental skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Tayuya invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Shikamaru or Temari.

34.name: Sakon and Ukon
34.description: A member of the Sound Five, Sakon, along with his brother Ukon, are nearly identical twins with a bloodline that let them live inside one another's body. Sakon and Ukon can double team an enemy, or invade another's body.

skills.skillDescription: Sakon and Ukon deals 40 damage to one enemy. During 'Parasite Demon Demolition', this skill will deal 30 damage instead.

This skill cannot be used while active. This skill ends if 'Rest' or 'Summoning: Rashoumon' are used, or if the enemy or Sakon and Ukon dies.
Sakon and Ukon heals himself for 30 health. If 'Parasite Demon Demolition' is active, it will end.
This skill makes Sakon and Ukon invulnerable for 1 turn. If 'Parasite Demon Demolition' is active, it will end.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Kiba or Kankuro.

35.name: Kaguya Kimimaro
35.description: A member of the Sound Five, Kimimaro was the leader, and the strongest of the team before his illness. Kimimaro's bloodline grants him unstoppable offensive power, however, his illness is slowly killing him, giving him precious little time.

skills.skillDescription: Kimimaro deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Afterwards, Kimimaro will take 10 affliction damage.*
Kimimaro deals 40 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Afterwards, Kimimaro will take 10 affliction damage.*

Kimimaro deals 30 damage to all enemies and reduces their physical and energy damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Afterwards, Kimimaro will take 15 affliction damage for 2 turns.*
This skill makes Kimimaro invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Rock Lee.
Win 4 battles in a row with Gaara.

36.name: Mitarashi Anko
36.description: A former student of Orochimaru and bearer of the Cursed Seal, Anko is now a teacher at Konoha. Having learned from Orochimaru, Anko utilizes various types of poisons and forbidden techniques to dismantle her enemies.

skills.skillDescription: Mitarashi Anko deals 5 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Twin Snakes Mutual Death'.
Mitarashi Anko deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, these enemies will take 5 additional damage from Mitarashi Anko's other skills.
Mitarashi Anko deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy. The following 3 turns, this enemy will take 5 affliction damage each turn. This skill stacks.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Mitarashi Anko targets the enemy affected by 'Dual Pin' and herself, killing both targets. This skill cannot be ignored.

mission: Win 6 battles with any member from Team 7, 8, 9, 10, Team Sand and Team Sound.

37.name: Gekko Hayate
37.description: A Jounin and exam proctor from Konoha; while sickly and afflicted with a chronic cough, he is calm and composed. Hayate is an expert sword user, and is well acquainted with using stealth to increase the deadliness of his attacks.

skills.skillDescription: Gekko Hayate deals 20 damage to one enemy. Gekko Hayate's skills will deal 5 additional damage for the rest of the game. This skill stacks.
Gekko Hayate deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the first skill used on Gekko Hayate will be countered.

Gekko Hayate gains 25 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, he will gain 15 points of damage reduction. The turn after, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction. The following 3 turns, Gekko Hayate's skills will deal 10 additional damage.
This skill makes Gekko Hayate invulnerable for 1 turn.

38.name: Shizune
38.description: The apprentice to Tsunade, and the niece of Dan, Shizune is a calm, practical but loyal ninja of Konoha's medical squad. Shizune is agile and quick, able to attack continually when not using her powerful medical jutsu to heal her allies.

skills.skillDescription: Shizune deals 15 damage to one enemy.
Shizune deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy for 3 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.
Shizune heals one ally for 35 health and removes all harmful afflictions from them.
This skill makes Shizune invulnerable for 1 turn.

39.name: Hatake Kakashi
39.description: The squad leader of Team 7, known as the Copy Ninja, Kakashi is a man who puts the life of his teammates above all else. Kakashi is able to copy the abilities of his enemies while using his own original technique, the Raikiri.

skills.skillDescription: The following turn, the first physical, energy or strategic skill used on Hatake Kakashi will be countered and will replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.
Hatake Kakashi stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, 'Raikiri' will deal 50 additional damage to this enemy.
Hatake Kakashi deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. If the enemy is affected by 'Summoning: Ninja Dogs', they will be instantly killed.
This skill makes Hatake Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Team 7 member.
Win 15 battles with any Team 7 member.

40.name: Yuhi Kurenai
40.description: The squad leader of Team 8, Kurenai is a caring woman and a close companion to Asuma. Kurenai is a genjutsu master, being able to use a variety of illusions to disrupt and trap her enemies in nigh impossible to escape illusions.

skills.skillDescription: Yuhi Kurenai targets one enemy. For 2 turns, they will take 10 damage each turn, will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 10, and the cost of their skills will be increased by 1 random energy.

Yuhi Kurenai stuns one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Tree Binding Death Attack'.
This skill makes Yuhi Kurenai invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Yuhi Kurenai deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy affected by 'Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death'.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Team 8 member.
Win 15 battles with any Team 8 member.

41.name: Sarutobi Asuma
41.description: The squad leader of Team 10, Asuma is the son of the 3rd Hokage; Asuma is a chronic smoker that fights to protect his allies. Asuma fights with a pair of trench knives, augmented by his chakra to a highly deadly degree.

skills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Asuma deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Sarutobi Asuma's team will gain 15 points of damage reduction. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Blow' and 'Sharpen Blades' will be replaced by 'Flying Kick'.* This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
The next time 'Flying Swallow' is used, it will last 1 additional turn. This effect stacks and will end when 'Flying Swallow' is used.

Sarutobi Asuma targets one ally. Permanently, all harmful skills used on this ally will be reflected to Sarutobi Asuma. During this time, Sarutobi Asuma can use this skill again for no cost to cancel it.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Asuma deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy.
Sarutobi Asuma deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Team 10 member.
Win 15 battles with any Team 10 member.

42.name: Maito Gai
42.description: The squad leader of Team Gai, and father-like figure to Lee, Gai is a passionate man that's always there for those who need him. In combat, Gai's taijutsu has no equal, being able to open the Eight Gates and pound away at all threats.

skills.skillDescription: Maito Gai deals 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Sixth Gate Opening', this skill will be improved and deal 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

Maito Gai takes 40 affliction damage.* This effect cannot kill Maito Gai. The following 2 turns, 'Leaf Whirlwind' will deal 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. During this time, Maito Gai is invulnerable.
Maito Gai targets one enemy. If this enemy uses a new harmful skill the following turn, they will be countered and take 30 damage*. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Maito Gai invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Team 9 member.
Win 15 battles with any Team 9 member.

43.name: Uzumaki Kushina
43.description: The mother of Uzumaki Naruto, wife to Minato and once the jinchuuriki to the nine-tailed fox. Kushina specializes in unique sealing and barrier techniques that can hinder and disable even the strongest of enemies.

skills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Kushina destroys one enemy's destructible defense, dealing 15 piercing damage to them, stunning them for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will deal 5 less damage from non-affliction skills.

Uzumaki Kushina targets herself and one enemy. For 4 turns, if either Uzumaki Kushina or this enemy die, the other will die as well. This effect ignores invulnerability. The following 4 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Life Transfer'. This skill cannot countered, reflected, removed or prevented and it will not interact with other skills.

Uzumaki Kushina targets one enemy, first removing all helpful effects on them and then stunning them and making them invulnerable to helpful skills for 2 turns. They will be invulnerable to harmful skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Uzumaki Kushina invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Kushina heals one ally for 25 health and takes 25 affliction damage.*

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Young Kushina.

44.name: Namikaze Minato
44.description: A Jounin, and Squad Leader of Konoha, known as the Yellow Flash, Minato is the father of Naruto. Minato fights using space-time jutsu and a number of unique kunai to teleport around the battlefield.

skills.skillDescription: Namikaze Minato deals 30 damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.
For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, Namikaze Minato will gain 1 random energy each turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

Namikaze Minato targets one ally permanently. If they are targeted by a new harmful skill, Namikaze Minato will deal 15 piercing damage to the enemy who used the skill*. This skill lasts until Namikaze Minato dies and cannot be used on an ally already affected by it.
This skill makes Namikaze Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Young Kakashi.
Win 4 battles in a row with Uchiha Obito.
Win 4 battles in a row with Nohara Rin.

44.5.name: Yashamaru
44.5.description: Yashamaru is an ANBU member from the Hidden Sand Village and also Gaara's uncle. After his sister's death, Yashamaru was appointed as Gaara's caretaker by the Fourth Kazekage, but later received the mission to kill the jinchuuriki instead.

skills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, Yashamaru will gain 5 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. Every turn, the damage of 'Silent Murder' will be permanently increased by 5. This effect stacks. This skill cannot be used while active.
Yashamaru deals 0 damage to one enemy.
For 1 turn, if Yashamaru dies, all enemies will be dealt 25 affliction damage instantly. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Yashamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 15 battles with Kankuro or Temari.

45.name: Baki
45.description: A Jounin of the Sand Village, and the leader of Gaara's team; Baki is cruel and ruthless, despite his normally calm nature. Baki fights using both taijutsu and ninjutsu together with top of the line Sand Village branded Flak Jackets.

skills.skillDescription: Baki makes one enemy ignore damage reduction and destructible defense on them for the rest of this turn and then deals 20 piercing damage to them.
Baki makes one enemy ignore damage reduction and destructible defense on them for the rest of this turn and then deals 40 piercing damage to them.

Baki targets himself or an ally, granting this character 50 points of destructible defense for 4 turns. During this time, they will ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage.
This skill makes Baki invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any ninja from Sand Team.
Win 15 battles with any ninja from Sand Team.

46.name: Yakushi Kabuto
46.description: Kabuto is the close assistant and confidant to Orochimaru; calm, logical and highly intelligent, Kabuto is a mystery to many. Kabuto knows how to disrupt an enemy's body while regenerating his own.

skills.skillDescription: Yakushi Kabuto deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy and they will take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills. The following turn, 'Chakra Scalpel' will deal 5 additional damage.
Yakushi Kabuto first removes all enemy affliction skills from himself, then heals himself for 15 health each turn for 5 turns. This skill becomes 'Critical Injury' for 5 turns after used.
The following turn, any enemy that does not use a new skill will be stunned for 1 turn and take 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Yakushi Kabuto deals 15 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Misumi.
Win 5 battles in a row with Yoroi.

47.name: Tsunade
47.description: One of the three sannins, Tsunade is a gambling, sake drinking loving woman with a tough exterior but soft interior. Tsunade is an expert at medical jutsu, using it to remove all her wounds, or delivering high impact kicks.

skills.skillDescription: Tsunade deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn.
Tsunade setts her health to 100 and removes all harmful effects on her.

Tsunade heals herself and her allies for 45 health. For the rest of the game, Tsunade's team will be healed for 5 health each turn, and this skill will be replaced by 'Slug Division'. This skill will end if Tsunade dies.
This skill makes Tsunade invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Tsunade heals her team for 10 health and grants them 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sakura.

48.name: Jiraiya
48.description: One of the three sannins, Jiraiya is a perverted frog hermit who travels the world in search of some sort of knowledge. Using numerous frog based summons, Jiraiya can greatly hinder his enemies all while setting them ablaze.

skills.skillDescription: Jiraiya deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and 10 affliction damage to all others.

For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, if Jiraiya or one of his allies receives a new harmful physical skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

Jiraiya deals 25 affliction damage to all enemies. For the rest of the game, the enemy team will take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills and this skill will be replaced by 'Toad Oil Flame Bullet'.
This skill makes Jiraiya invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Jiraiya deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Naruto.

49.name: Orochimaru
49.description: One of the three sannins, Orochimaru craves nothing more than to learn all the jutsu and abilities in the world. Orochimaru uses his snake summons and cursed seals to various effects, beating down his enemies regardless of their defenses.

skills.skillDescription: Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense then deals 25 piercing damage to them.
Orochimaru targets one ally or one enemy, dealing 15 affliction damage to them. The target will gain 1 random energy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

Orochimaru deals 45 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, Orochimaru will gain 1 additional random energy each turn, and this skill will be replaced by 'Constrict and Bite'. This skill will end if Orochimaru dies.
This skill makes Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Orochimaru stuns one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, they will take 25 damage.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sasuke.

50.name: ET Senju Hashirama
50.description: The first Hokage, and founder of the Hidden Leaf Village; Hashirama, a member of the legendary Senju clan. Hashirama has the unique ability to give life to trees, creating them, and manipulating them to assault the enemy team while protecting his own.

skills.skillDescription: ET Senju Hashirama deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants his team 5 points of permanent destructible defense. During 'A World of Trees', this skill will have no cooldown.
ET Senju Hashirama deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and energy skills for 1 turn. During 'A World of Trees', this skill will stun all skills.

For 2 turns, all enemies' non-mental skills will cost 1 additional random energy and their cooldowns will be increased by 1. During this time, this skill can be used again to grant ET Senju Hashirama's team 30 points of permanent destructible defense and to stun all enemies for 1 turn.
This skill makes ET Senju Hashirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sarutobi Hiruzen.
Win 5 battles in a row with Orochimaru.

51.name: ET Senju Tobirama
51.description: The second Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; Tobirama, a member of the Senju clan, puts the well being of the village and people above all else. Tobirama is a master of many jutsu, using both ninjutsu and genjutsu to stop the enemies in different ways.

skills.skillDescription: ET Senju Tobirama makes one enemy ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn and deals 15 damage to them.
ET Senju Tobirama deals 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns and stuns their affliction skills each turn. During this time, 'Water Assault' will deal 15 additional damage.*
ET Senju Tobirama makes his team invulnerable to all physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes ET Senju Tobirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Senju Hashirama.

52.name: Sarutobi Hiruzen
52.description: The third and most recent Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village to die; Hiruzen, known as the God of Shinobi was considered to be one of the strongest ninja to ever live in his prime. While powerful using just his normal jutsu, Hiruzen is able to pull out a trump card when desperation strikes.

skills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Hiruzen deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 affliction damage.

Permanently, one enemy takes 40 affliction damage, is stunned and cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable each turn. Hiruzen himself takes 20 affliction damage and is stunned each turn. This skill cannot be removed or ignored and will end when Hiruzen dies.

Sarutobi Hiruzen and his team will become invulnerable for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Sarutobi Hiruzen will deal 5 damage to all enemies each turn, Sarutobi Hiruzen's team will gain 5 points of damage reduction, and this skill will be replaced by 'Adamantine Prison Wall'. This skill will end if Sarutobi Hiruzen dies.
This skill makes Sarutobi Hiruzen invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, Sarutobi Hiruzen and his team will gain 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction and they cannot be killed.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Jiraya.
Win 5 battles in a row with Tsunade.
Win 5 battles in a row with Orochimaru.

53.name: Hokage Minato
53.description: The fourth Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; considered to be one of the fastest ninja ever, Minato is a talented man, and the father of Uzumaki Naruto, and the one who sealed the Kyuubi inside of him. Having mastered the time-space skills, Minato is capable of merging them with powerful ninjutsu for powerful effects.

skills.skillDescription: Hokage Minato deals 35 damage to one enemy that ignores invulnerability. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 ninjutsu energy only. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
Hokage Minato targets one ally or himself. For 2 turns, the first new harmful skill used on this character will be reflected onto the enemy team* and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.
Hokage Minato deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy, permanently lowering their non-affliction damage by 5. Hokage Minato will take 15 affliction damage.
This skill makes Hokage Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Naruto.
Win 5 battles in a row with Minato.
Win 5 battles in a row with Uzumaki Kushina.

53.5.name: Masked Man
53.5.description: No one knows anything about this man in the yellow mask, except that he was responsible for the attack to Konoha by Kurama's claws that resulted on the death of the Yondaime Hokage and his wife.

skills.skillDescription: Masked Man deals 20 damage to one enemy. If 'Kamui: Dimensional Placement' isn't active on that enemy, any direct stun skill used on them this turn will stun them for 1 additional turn. If it is active on them, this skill will instead deal 35 damage.
Masked Man targets himself and one enemy, making both invulnerable to harmful skills for 3 turns. During this time, Masked Man's skills will ignore invulnerability.

Masked Man deals 25 damage to all enemies. Until Masked Man dies, everytime they use a new physical, energy or mental skill, they will deal 5 less damage with skills with that specific class for 2 turns (this is applied before the skill they used takes effect). This skill becomes 'Kurama's Tailed-Beast Bomb' permanently after used.
This skill makes Masked Man invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Masked Man deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Hokage Minato.

54.name: Demon Brothers
54.description: A duo of Mist ninja who work for Zabuza, the Demon Brothers specialize in assassinating their targets with their shuriken chain. Using their weapons and teamwork, the Demon Brothers can gang up on one enemy, disable him, and then kill him.

skills.skillDescription: Demon Brothers stuns one enemy's physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Chain Shred'.
Demon Brothers deals 30 damage to one enemy. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by 'Chain Wrap', it will deal 10 additional damage.
Demon Brothers gains 20 points of permanent destructible defense and 1 taijutsu energy.
This skill makes Demon Brothers invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Demon Brothers targets one enemy affected by 'Chain Wrap', dealing 45 piercing damage to them and re-applying 'Chain Wrap' on them.

mission: Win 3 battles in a row with Naruto or Sasuke.

54.5.name: Zori and Waraji
54.5.description: Zori and Waraji are two samurai from the Land of Waves, both mercenaries hired by Gatou to be his personal bodyguards. They are capable hand-to-hand combatants, able to use their swords to perform Iaido.

skills.skillDescription: Zori and Waraji deal 20 piercing damage to one enemy and make that enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

Zori and Waraji deal 30 piercing damage to one enemy and make that enemy unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. If 'Zori's Iaidou' was used the previous turn, then for 1 turn 'Zori's Iaidou' will deal 20 piercing damage plus piercing damage equal to Zori and Waraji's missing health.

Zori and Waraji target one ally. For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on that ally, that enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Zori's Iaido' and 'Waraji's Iaido' permanently. This effect stacks. This skill cannot be used on an ally already affected by it and ends if Zori and Waraji die.
This skill makes Zori and Waraji invulnerable for 1 turn.

55.name: Haku
55.description: The sole survivor of the Yuki clan, and the subordinate of Zabuza; Haku, despite being young, holds enough potential strength to surpass almost any ninja. Using his ice based bloodline, and his intelligence, Haku can attack and defend nearly simultaneously.

skills.skillDescription: Haku deals 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals', this skill targets all enemies.

Haku targets one enemy or one ally. If used on an enemy, they will be stunned for 1 turn. If used on an ally, all enemy stun skills on them will be removed and they will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. During 'Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals', this skill targets all allies and enemies. This skill ignores invulnerability.
For 3 turns, Haku will become invulnerable. The following 3 turns, 'Flying Water Needles of Death' will target all enemies and 'Acupuncture' will target all allies and enemies.
This skill makes Haku invulnerable for 1 turn.

56.name: Momochi Zabuza
56.description: Zabuza is a missing-nin from the Hidden Mist Village that specializes in silent assassination. Using the various ninjutsu abilities Zabuza has, he is able to attack his enemies all at once, or stealthily try to kill them.

skills.skillDescription: Momochi Zabuza deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Hidden Mist', this skill will deal 45 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.
Momochi Zabuza deals 10 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical and strategic skills for 1 turn.

For 2 turns, all enemies' physical and energy skills will cost 1 additional random energy and Momochi Zabuza will gain 5 points of damage reduction. The following 2 turns, 'Soundless Murder' will deal 15 additional damage and will ignore invulnerability. This skill ignores invulnerability.
This skill makes Momochi Zabuza invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Haku.

56.5.name: Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke
56.5.description: Sasuke is pushed into his maximum during the Chuunin Exams and ends awakening his Cursed Seal to fight the Sound Genin and save Sakura. Sasuke is not in full control of the seal yet, but his anger and power were already raised a lot.

skills.skillDescription: Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke's skills will deal 5 additional damage.
Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. The following turn, Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke's skills will deal 5 additional damage.

For 3 turns, Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke gains 10 points of reduction and targets all enemies. If they use a new harmful skill, they will receive 10 additional damage from 'Silent Blow' and 'Cursed Chidori' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered and will end if Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke dies.
This skill makes Cursed Seal Lv1 Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Sasuke.
Win 15 battles with Sound Genin (Dosu, Kin, Zaku).

57.name: Kyuubi Naruto
57.description: Naruto's anger and desperation has forced the Kyuubi's chakra to come up to the surface, changing Naruto into a single-minded beast with a nearly endless amount of chakra. With the Kyuubi chakra around Naruto, he is able to unleash powerful waves of raw chakra to endow his power further, or gather it back to guard and heal him.

skills.skillDescription: Kyuubi Naruto deals 35 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. Kyuubi Naruto will take 5 affliction damage.*
Kyuubi Naruto deals 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, 'Kyuubi Rasengan' will deal 10 additional damage. 'Kyuubi Chakra' may not be used during this time.*

Kyuubi Naruto heals himself for 15 health each turn for 5 turns.* During this time, Kyuubi Naruto will gain 10 points of damage reduction and 'Kyuubi Rasengan' will deal 10 less damage. 'Kyuubi Rage' may not be used during this time.
This skill makes Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Naruto.

58.name: Cursed Seal Sasuke
58.description: Having gotten used to the Cursed Seal, Sasuke is able to draw Orochimaru's vile chakra through it, becoming a twisted hideous version of himself, but also getting stronger and faster. With the Cursed Seal, Sasuke's powers have exponentially increased, allowing him to pierce or trap enemies with his dark chakra.

skills.skillDescription: Cursed Seal Sasuke deals 45 damage to one enemy, reducing their non-affliction damage by 20 for 2 turns.
Cursed Seal Sasuke stuns one enemy for 2 turns and makes them invulnerable during this time. When this skill ends, that enemy will take 55 damage. This skill will end if Cursed Seal Sasuke dies.

Cursed Seal Sasuke becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and takes 15 affliction damage.* This skill cannot kill Cursed Seal Sasuke. The following turn, 'Corrupt Chidori' will cost 1 random energy and 'Dark Void' will cost 2 random energies.
This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Sasuke.

59.name: Shukaku Gaara
59.description: Having lived inside him the whole time, Shukaku is one of the nine tailed beasts and is very eager to escape and cause chaos to the world. While Shukaku slowly takes over Gaara, his own power increases, allowing him to demolish his foes with powerful sand attacks.

skills.skillDescription: Shukaku Gaara deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of permanent destructible defense.
Shukaku Gaara deals 10 damage to one enemy each turn. The first skill that this enemy uses will be countered, and this skill will end.

Shukaku Gaara will gain 10 points of destructible defense each turn for 4 turns. When this skill ends, for 3 turns 'Sand Claw' will cost 1 less random energy and 'Constricting Sand Prison' and 'Sand Transformation' will be replaced.
This skill makes Shukaku Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Shukaku Gaara deals 60 damage to one enemy.
The following turn, 'Sand Claw' and 'Drilling Air Bullet' will deal double damage.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Gaara.

60.name: Butterfly Chouji
60.description: Chouji has evolved into butterfly mode by consuming all three akimichi's coloured pills, gaining incredible speed and strenght at the cost of rapid weight loss.

skills.skillDescription: Butterfly Chouji gains 10 points of damage reduction and 10 points of destructible defense. He will take 5 affliction* damage each turn. Butterfly Chouji can use his other skills while this skill is active. Butterfly Chouji will deal 5 extra damage every turn to a max of 10 stacks. This skill may be used once and is permanent. This skill cannot be removed.
Butterfly Chouji targets one enemy, destroying all destructible defense that target has and then dealing 20 damage to them. This skill cannot be countered and can only be used during 'Chakra Wings'.

Butterfly Chouji targets one enemy dealing 5 damage to them. For 1 turn, that target's skills will be stunned and Butterfly Chouji will ignore stun effects. This skill may only be used during 'Chakra Wings'.
This skill makes Butterfly Chouji invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Chouji.

61.name: Hoshigaki Kisame
61.description: Formerly one of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist Village, Kisame is an S-Rank missing ninja that is now a member of Akatsuki, having been partnered with Uchiha Itachi. Using his powerful, and ominous sword, mixed with his powerful water based ninjutsu, Kisame can disable enemies in every manner of way.

skills.skillDescription: Hoshigaki Kisame deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their energy, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn.
Hoshigaki Kisame deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns, stealing 1 random energy from them each turn.
Hoshigaki Kisame deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Gai.

62.name: Uchiha Itachi
62.description: The only other surviving Uchiha, Itachi is a master of doujutsu, an S-Rank missing nin, and a member of Akatsuki, having been partnered with Hoshigaki Kisame. Despite being powerful, Itachi is slowly going blind, making his abilities weaker, but when Itachi activates his Sharingan he becomes an unstoppable force of pure power.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Itachi becomes invulnerable, enhancing 'Amaterasu' and 'Tsukuyomi', increasing their cooldowns by 2, and doubling their costs. During this time, Uchiha Itachi will take 15 affliction damage each turn*, ignore healing, and Uchiha Itachi can use this skill again for no cost to cancel it.

Uchiha Itachi deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn. This skill does not stack. If used during 'Mangekyou Sharingan', this skill will target all enemies and deal double damage. This skill will end if Uchiha Itachi dies.
Uchiha Itachi deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. If used during 'Mangekyou Sharingan', this skill will last 3 turns.
This skill makes Uchiha Itachi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Kakashi.
Win 3 battles in a row with Sasuke.

62.6.name: Kazahana Doto
62.6.description: Dotō began the revolt in the Land of Snow whilst searching for a treasure, which resulted in him killing his brother, Sōsetsu Kazahana who was the daimyō at the time. His niece, Koyuki Kazahana, fled from the Land of Snow, and became an actress named Yukie Fujikaze.

skills.skillDescription: For the next 3 turns Kazahana Doto will gain 10 unpierceable damage reduction and ignore all stun effects.
Kazahana Doto deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.
Kazahana Doto deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their energy and strategic skills for 2 turns.
This skill makes Kazahana Doto invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Leader of the Land of Snow

62.7.name: Temujin
62.7.description: Temujin is a young man from an unknown continent. Born as the heir of the main branch of his clan, Temujin has the ability to create and seal away the Stone of Gelel. Temujin is extremely loyal to Haido; wishing to be of use to him, Temujin trained hard to become a powerful fighter.

skills.skillDescription: Temujin targets one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 20 affliction damage. For 1 turn, their strategic skills will last 1 turn less. Permanent strategic skills will instead last 9 turns. This skill is invisible. This skill becomes 'Raging Thunder Blast' for 1 turn after used.

Temujin targets one enemy for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new skill, they will take 30 affliction damage. For 1 turn, this enemy's physical skills will last 1 turn less. Permanent physical skills will instead last 9 turns. This skill is invisible.
For 1 turn, Temujin will counter all physical skills used on him. The countered enemies' physical skills will permanently deal 5 less damage. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Temujin invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Temujin deals 25 affliction damage to the enemy affected by 'Raging Thunder'. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on Temujin will take 15 affliction damage. This skill is invisible.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Konoha 11 Ninja.

63.name: Uzumaki Naruto (S)
63.description: Having trained with Jiraya for almost three years, Naruto has grown, both mentally and physically. With his training behind him, Naruto is able to utilize his clones even more, granting him strong defense while augmenting his already powerful rasengan.

skills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Naruto (S) deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.
The following turn, Uzumaki Naruto (S) will counter the first new harmful skill used on him and 'Oodama Rasengan' will be replaced by 'Rasenshuriken'. This skill is invisible.

Uzumaki Naruto (S) removes all harmful skills on him then gains 2 random energies. The following turn, Uzumaki Naruto (S) will gain 10 points of damage reduction and 'Oodama Rasengan' will cost 2 random energies.
This skill makes Uzumaki Naruto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Naruto (S) deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill deals 50 additional damage to an enemy countered by 'Mass Shadow Clones'. This skill ignores invulnerability.

mission: Win 3 battles in a row with Naruto.

65.name: Haruno Sakura (S)
65.description: With her extensive training under Tsunade for the last two and a half years, Sakura has gained a greater understanding of healing and the human body. While Sakura's physical strength and healing prowess have both increased, her greatest ability is a powerful chakra storing seal taught to her by Tsunade.

skills.skillDescription: Haruno Sakura (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy. While 'Strength of a Hundred Seal' is active, this skill will deal 35 damage to one enemy, and 10 damage to all other enemies.

Haruno Sakura (S) heals half of one ally's missing health, rounded, and removes all enemy affliction effects from them. While 'Strength of a Hundred Seal}' is active, this skill will cost 1 random energy and have no cooldown.

Haruno Sakura (S) gains 3 seals. During this time, each skill that Haruno Sakura (S) uses other than her invulnerability will use up 1 Seal. While 'Strength of a Hundred Seal}' is active, Haruno Sakura (S) can use this skill again at no cost to restore 25 health and remove all harmful effects on her.
This skill makes Haruno Sakura (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 3 battles in a row with Haruno Sakura.

66.name: Sai
66.description: A current member of the Elite ANBU Root, Sai is a quiet, but expressive individual with a mysterious past. Sai uses a set of brushes with a special ink to give life to his art, from tigers to lions to bears, that allow him to compete with his enemies.

skills.skillDescription: Sai deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Sai will gain 20 points of destructible defense.
