Sai stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability. During 'Adaptive Painting', this skill will be replaced.

For 3 turns, any ally that is targeted by a new non-conditional stun skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn; any ally that has energy removed/stolen will gain 1 random energy, and any ally that successfully receives new non-affliction damage by an enemy will increase Sai's damage by 10 for 1 turn.
This skill makes Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Sai deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with any Team 7 member.

67.name: Inuzuka Kiba (S)
67.description: Over the last several years. Kiba, and his dog, Akamaru have grown considerably, not wanting to be left last in their group. Having improved their team work, and provided they are given enough time, Kiba and Akamaru can become unstoppable rampaging beasts.

skills.skillDescription: Inuzuka Kiba (S) gains 30 points of damage reduction and ignores all non-damage harmful effects except energy cost changes for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Tail Chasing Rotating Fang'.
Inuzuka Kiba (S) deals 30 damage to one enemy and 20 damage to another random enemy. During 'Three-Headed Wolf', this skill will instead deal 20 damage to all other enemies.

Inuzuka Kiba (S) deals 40 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy and then reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 permanently. During 'Three-Headed Wolf', this skill will deal 5 additional damage.
This skill makes Inuzuka Kiba (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Inuzuka Kiba (S) deals 40 damage to all enemies and stuns them for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Inuzuka Kiba.

68.name: Aburame Shino (S)
68.description: Still as mysterious and secretive as ever, Shino has improved greatly over the years, learning and practicing with his loyal bugs. With his new found mastery, Shino can disable enemies even harder while slowly waiting for his bugs to erupt from their bodies and destroy them.

skills.skillDescription: Aburame Shino (S) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, that enemy will be invulnerable to all friendly skills. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Insect Consumption'.

The following turn, the first new harmful skill used on one ally or Aburame Shino (S) will be countered, 'Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation' will be placed on the countered enemy and then activated. If this skill does not counter an enemy skill, Aburame Shino (S) will gain 1 bloodline energy. This skill is invisible.
Aburame Shino (S) targets one enemy. After 3 turns, they will take 25 damage and all other copies of this skill on them will be activated. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Aburame Shino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Aburame Shino (S) steals 1 random energy from one enemy affected by 'Insect Swarm' and increases the damage that enemy receives from 'Insect Swarm' by 5 that turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Aburame Shino.

69.name: Hyuuga Hinata (S)
69.description: With the Chuunin Exam behind her, and with Naruto's words deep in her heart, Hinata has grown and become stronger and a woman. With her mastery of the Hyuuga clan tactics, Hinata can give life to powerful chakra lions while hindering her enemies' chakra paths.

skills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Hinata (S) targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage to them, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn, and removing all stacks of 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' from them. During 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field', this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

This skill deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each 'Pressure Point Closure' stack. Once used, this skill removes all stacks of 'Pressure Point Closure' from the targeted enemy.
For 4 turns, if an enemy uses a new harmful skill, the energy cost increase of 'Pressure Point Closure' will last 1 additional turn on them.
This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Hyuuga Hinata.

70.name: Nara Shikamaru (S)
70.description: Once known to be one of the laziest ninja, Shikamaru has worked tireless to become not only stronger, but a leader too. More than ever before, Shikamaru excels at coming up with long winded and convoluted plans meant to defeat any enemies in his path.

skills.skillDescription: Nara Shikamaru (S) targets one enemy, who takes 35 damage and has their physical, energy and strategic skills stunned 1 turn. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by ‘Long-Range Tactics’, it is improved to 45 damage.
Nara Shikamaru (S) targets one enemy. That enemy has their non-strategic skills stunned 2 turns and Nara Shikamaru (S) will be invulnerable during this time.

For 3 turns, any time that one target enemy uses a new skill, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and all helpful counters and reflect skills on them will be ignored for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Nara Shikamaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Nara Shikamaru.

71.name: Akimichi Chouji (S)
71.description: After nearly three years, Chouji has developed in both strength and size, mastering the Akimichi clan techniques. No longer does Chouji need the Akimichi pills to tap into his true strength, instead, he merely needs to control his chakra and become a force to reckon with.

skills.skillDescription: For the following 4 turns, Akimichi Chouji (S) gains 25 points of destructible defense, ‘Spiked Meat Tank’ will do its alternate effects, and ‘Mega Palm Thrust’ will be improved.

Akimichi Chouji (S) protects one ally or himself and will counter enemy non-mental skills used on the target for 1 turn. The countered enemy will take 25 damage. This skill is invisible. Alternate: Akimichi Chouji (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and is invulnerable for 1 turn.

Akimichi Chouji (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. During ‘Expansion Technique’, this damage is improved to 40, the targeted enemy has their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn, and this skill has an 1 turn cooldown.
This skill makes Akimichi Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Akimichi Chouji.

72.name: Yamanaka Ino (S)
72.description: Not one to be left behind, Ino has trained non-stop to improve her abilities and teamwork. With her improved techniques, Ino can not only control her enemies, but her allies too all while seeing everything on the battlefield.

skills.skillDescription: Yamanaka Ino (S) targets one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 15 damage and if that enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will be countered and this skill will be replaced by that skill for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected. This skill is invisible.

Yamanaka Ino (S) targets all enemies. For 3 turns, everytime they use a new skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. During this time, all new invisible skills they use will become visible. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
For 2 turns, both of Yamanaka Ino (S)'s allies will ignore all harmful effects other than damage and energy cost changes. This skill is invisible and will end if Yamanaka Ino (S) dies.
This skill makes Yamanaka Ino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Yamanaka Ino.

73.name: Rock Lee (S)
73.description: Now a chuunin, Lee has trained endlessly with Gai, and not only learned new abilities, but has learned what it truly means to fight. In battle, Lee now fights for his friends and allies, growing stronger as they fall around him.

skills.skillDescription: Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 2 turns. This skill will deal 10 additional damage, and the damage reduction effect will last 1 additional turn for each ally that is dead.

Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to one enemy and gaining 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will deal 10 additional damage and grant 10 additional damage reduction. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for every ally that has been killed.

Rock Lee (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. This skill will deal 15 additional damage for each ally that is dead and 15 additional damage for every 30 health that Rock Lee (S) has lost.
This skill makes Rock Lee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Rock Lee.

74.name: Tenten (S)
74.description: Now a chuunin, Tenten has added a myriad of powerful and potent weapons in her arsenal, even procuring the legendary fan of the sage of the six paths. Having an arsenal of weapons at her side, Tenten can chose to fight at different levels, upgrading her weapons until she finds something suitable for her battle.

skills.skillDescription: Tenten (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
Tenten (S) makes her team invulnerable to all non-strategic skills for 1 turn.

Tenten (S) gains 5 points of destructible defense. The first time this skill is used, it will replace 'Kunai Grenade' and 'Chain Spin'. The second time it is used, they will be replaced again. The third time this skill is used, it will reset, and her skills will revert back to the original ones.
This skill makes Tenten (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Tenten (S) deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies.
Tenten (S) makes her team invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn and grants them 20 points of permanent destructible defense. This effect stacks.
The following turn, any new non-mental skill used on Tenten (S) or her team will be reflected onto the character who used it. This skill is invisible.
Tenten (S) targets all enemies, dealing 10 physical* and 10 affliction damage to them, and they will receive 5 affliction damage for the following 3 turns.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Tenten.

75.name: Hyuuga Neji (S)
75.description: The only of the original genins to become a Jounin, Neji has only increased his already powerful set of abilities and skills during the near three years of time. While still being able to rely on his pressure point attacks, Neji is now also able to unleash giant waves of chakra for brutish damage as well.

skills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Neji (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them.
Hyuuga Neji (S) targets one enemy, destroying any destructible defense they have and dealing 45 damage to them.

For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. The following turn, any enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Hyuuga Neji (S) will be countered and this skill will be replaced by 'Pressure Point Strike'. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Hyuuga Neji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Neji (S) attacks one enemy countered by 'Byakugan - Eight Trigrams Field' or this skill, dealing 5 damage and removing 1 random energy from them. The following turn this skill will deal 5 additional damage and will remain replaced. This effect stacks and is cumulative until Hyuuga Neji (S) stops using this skill.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Neji.

75.5.name: Sarutobi Konohamaru
75.5.description: The grandson of the 3rd Hokage, Hiruzen, Konohamaru has spent his youth working hard to accomplish his dream of one day following under his grandfather's steps. With his hard work, Konohamaru has learned actual abilities that flow around his agility and speed.

skills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Konohamaru targets one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, that enemy will take 25 damage, and 15 additional damage if they used a new skill that turn. This skill is invisible.

Sarutobi Konohamaru will counter the next new harmful non-strategic skill used on him. Each time this skill is used, it will cost 1 additional random energy permanently. This skill cannot be used while active. This skill is invisible. This skill cannot be removed.
Sarutobi Konohamaru targets one ally. The following turn, the first time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 15. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Sarutobi Konohamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 3 battles in a row with Uzumaki Naruto.

76.name: Hatake Kakashi (S)
76.description: Kakashi has not let the years pass by idle, and has trained as hard as any other, improving his sharingan and his own unique jutsu. While Kakashi's raikiri is still a potent finisher, he is now also able to rely on his kamui, aiming it at his enemies or even rescuing his allies.

skills.skillDescription: Hatake Kakashi (S) deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Raikiri'.

If used on an enemy, they will receive 40 piercing damage, and for 1 turn their cooldowns will be increased by 1 and their skills will cost 1 additional random energy. If used on an ally or himself, all harmful effects on them will be removed and they will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

For 3 turns, Hatake Kakashi (S)'s allies will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1. The following 3 turns, the first new harmful skill used by one enemy will be copied and will replace this skill for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.
This skill makes Hatake Kakashi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Hatake Kakashi (S) targets one enemy, dealing 30 piercing damage to them. This skill will deal 15 additional damage to that enemy if they are stunned or if 'Lightning Beast Fang' was used on them the previous turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kakashi.
Win 20 battles with any Team 7 member.

77.name: Yamato
77.description: A member of the secretive ANBU organization and a man who was once injected with the cells of Hashirama, the 1st Hokage. Due to the cells that live inside of him, Yamato is capable of small scale wood element abilities, from trapping enemies to protecting his comrades.

skills.skillDescription: Yamato targets one enemy, making them ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn and dealing 30 damage to them.

Yamato targets one ally or himself for 1 turn, countering the first physical, energy or strategic skill used against them, dealing 20 damage to the enemy and granting that ally 20 points of destructible defense. This skill is invisible.

This skill can be used on one enemy or one ally. If used on an enemy, that enemy will have their physical, energy and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. If used on an ally, that ally will gain 40 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill ignores invulnerability.
This skill makes Yamato invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sai.
Win 5 battles in a row with Sakura Shippuden.
Win 5 battles in a row with Naruto Shippuden.

78.name: Maito Gai (S)
78.description: Still the leader of Team Gai, Gai is not one to let himself fall behind in terms of training and strength. Gai no longer feels the need to go straight into the highest level of gates that he can, instead taking his time, until the time requires the green beast of Konoha to go all out.

skills.skillDescription: Maito Gai (S) deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if an enemy uses a new harmful physical skill on Maito Gai (S), he will deal 10 damage to them.*
Maito Gai (S) targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them and reducing all non-affliction damage they deal by 20 for 1 turn.

Maito Gai (S) receives 5 affliction damage*, but permanently gains 5 points of damage reduction and increases the damage of 'Nunchaku Taijutsu' and 'Fiery Kick' by 5. At 6 usages of this skill, 'Fiery Kick' will be replaced by 'Morning Peacock', and at 7 usages of this skill, it will be replaced by 'Daytime Tiger'. This skill can only be used 7 times.
This skill makes Maito Gai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Maito Gai (S) deals 60 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.
Maito Gai (S) deals 300 damage to one enemy.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Gai.
Win 20 battles with any Team 9 member.

79.name: Sarutobi Asuma (S)
79.description: Somehow continuing to avoid lung cancer, Asuma has remained the leader of Team 10 through the years. With the secret techniques of the fire temple, Asuma is able to attack and defend while waiting for the opportune moment to slice some heads off.

skills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Asuma (S) gains 15 points of destructible defense and instantly deals 30 damage to one enemy.
Sarutobi Asuma (S) targets all enemies each turn, increasing the cooldowns of their skills by 1 turn. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.
Sarutobi Asuma (S) targets one enemy. If that enemy's health is 25 or less, he will instantly kill that enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Sarutobi Asuma (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Asuma (S) deals 10 damage to all enemies for each stack of 'Ash Pile Burning' on them. This skill will end 'Ash Pile Burning', it cannot be countered or reflected, and it ignores invulnerability.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Asuma.
Win 20 battles with any Team 10 member.

79.2.name: Ebisu
79.2.description: Ebisu is Konohamaru's teacher and protector. Although he's a pervert, he's also very disciplined and puts his life on the life to save his students.

skills.skillDescription: Ebisu targets one enemy, dealing 15 affliction damage for 2 turns.
Ebisu targets one enemy. The next turn, that enemy will take 10 damage and 10 additional damage for every 15 health that target has lost. This skill is invisible
Ebisu targets an enemy. Next turn if, that target uses a new skill, he'll be unable to reduce damage of become invulnerable for 1 turn and will receive 15 damage. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Ebisu invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sarutobi Konohamaru.

79.5.name: Shizune (S)
79.5.description: Shizune has grown up to be an experienced medical-nin as well as the Godaime Hokage's right hand. She is now a great kunoichi not only at healing skills but also at sealing abilities.

skills.skillDescription: Shizune (S) instantly heals herself and her allies for 15 health. During 'Chakra Reinforcement', she heals herself and her allies for 20 health and gains 1 random energy.
Shizune (S) the next turn, the first enemy that uses a new physical, energy or strategic skill on one ally or Shizune (S) will be countered. This skill is invisible.

For 3 turns, Shizune (S) will gain 10 points of damage reduction . During this skill, 'Full Team Recovery' is improved. After used, this skill will be replaced with 'Four-Corner Sealing Barrier' for 3 turns.
This skill makes Shizune (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Shizune (S) attack one enemy dealing 20 damage that ignores invulnerability. Afterwards, Shizune (S) will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Shizune.

79.7.name: Mitarashi Anko (S)
79.7.description: Anko has grown over the years as a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, she is put in command of the Reconnaissance Party, set to track Kabuto and find out what he is planning on doing.

skills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' will grant Mitarashi Anko (S) 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill stacks.

Mitarashi Anko (S) deals 5 damage and 15 affliction damage* to one enemy. This affliction damage cannot be ignored. For 1 turn, Mitarashi Anko (S) will ignore harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

For 1 turn, Mitarashi Anko (S) will counter all new harmful skills used on her and the countered enemies will take 5 additional damage from 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, if used, 'Cursed Seal of Heaven: Enhance' will also make Mitarashi Anko (S) invulnerable for 1 turn and increase the damage of 'Many Hidden Shadow Snake Hands' by 5 permanently. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Mitarashi Anko (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Anko.

80.name: Yamashiro Aoba
80.description: A Konoha jounin assigned to hunt down members of Akatsuki, Aoba while reserved in public, is more than willing to boast and brag in private. While a man of many talents, Aoba specializes in genjutsu that takes on the form of crows, being able to use them for all manner of purposes.

skills.skillDescription: Yamashiro Aoba deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, Yamashiro Aoba and his team will have 5 points of damage reduction.* This skill can stack.
Yamashiro Aoba deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time that enemy cannot use skills with a non-conditional stun effect (this is a stun effect).
Yamashiro Aoba targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each active 'Scattering Thousand Crows Technique' on the target.
This skill makes Yamashiro Aoba invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Izumo and Kotetsu.
Win 15 battles with Izumo and Kotetsu.

81.name: Izumo and Kotetsu
81.description: A pair of Konoha chuunin assigned to hunt down members of Akatsuki, Izumo and Kotetsu are close friends, and great teammates. While individually not as strong as many others.

skills.skillDescription: Izumo and Kotetsu deals 30 damage to one enemy. ‘Mace Crush’ may be used the following turn.

Izumo and Kotetsu deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy, decrease their non-affliction damage by 5 for 1 turn and make them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill requires either 'Mace Crush' or 'Syrup Snare Field' to be used the previous turn.
Izumo and Kotetsu make their team invulnerable to non-mental skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Guided Shell Mace' can be used.
This skill makes Izumo and Kotetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Team 10 member.
Win 15 battles with any Team 10 member.

81.3.name: Shiranui Genma
81.3.description: Genma is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and an elite bodyguard to the Hokage. After Hayate's death, he became the Chuunin Exams proctor.

skills.skillDescription: Shiranui Genma deals 5 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Double Kunai Cut' will deal 20 damage instantly instead if used.
Shiranui Genma deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. Namiashi Raidou's skills will deal 5 additional damage to this enemy permanently. This skill stacks.

Shiranui Genma targets one ally, granting them 1 random energy and healing them for 20 health. Namiashi Raidou's 'Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation' will permanently heal this ally for 5 additional health. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Shiranui Genma invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Izumo and Kotetsu.
Win 15 battles with Izumo and Kotetsu.

81.6.name: Namiashi Raidou
81.6.description: Raidou is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and an elite bodyguard to the Hokage. He is skilled in kenjutsu, using a special sword of his own called 'Kokutou'.

skills.skillDescription: Namiashi Raidou targets one enemy, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. During this time, 'Kokutou Stab' will deal 15 additional damage to them and will reduce their non-affliction damage by 15 additional points. This skill is invisible.

Namiashi Raidou deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. Shiranui Genma's skills will deal 5 additional damage to this enemy permanently. This skill stacks and ignores invulnerability.

Namiashi Raidou targets one ally, granting them 1 random energy and healing them for 20 health. Shiranui Genma's 'Imperfect Flying Thunder God Formation' will permanently heal this ally for 5 additional health. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Namiashi Raidou invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Genma.

82.name: Inuzuka Tsume
82.description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Inuzuka clan, and the mother of Kiba, Tsume, much like her son, is a wild and impatient woman with an often odd sense of humor. Like other members of her clan, Tsume fights one with her companion, Kuromaru, while allowing her wild instincts to take over.

skills.skillDescription: The following 4 turns, Inuzuka Tsume will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Fierce Bite' and any enemy that uses a new harmful non-affliction skill on Inuzuka Tsume will receive 10 damage*.

Inuzuka Tsume deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. All stun skills that enemy uses will also be decreased by 2 turns. If 'Summon Kuromaru' is active, this skill will deal 5 additional damage.
Inuzuka Tsume targets herself and her allies, making them invulnerable to all non-affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill can only be used three times in a game. This skill cannot be removed.
This skill makes Inuzuka Tsume invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Inuzuka Tsume targets one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them that ignores invulnerability. If that enemy dies that turn, then for 2 turns, Inuzuka Tsume will have her non-conditional damage increased by 10, she will ignore enemy stun effects, and she cannot be killed.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Inuzuka Kiba.

82.3.name: Aburame Shibi
82.3.description: Shibi is a jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village, the head of the Aburame clan and the father of Shino. Just like his son, Shibi is a calm and calculated man who prefers to take down his enemies by incapacitating them, using his numerous chakra draining insects.

skills.skillDescription: Aburame Shibi targets all enemies, dealing 5 affliction damage to them, reducing their non-affliction damage by 5 and making them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Secret Technique: Insect Sphere' will be improved.
For 2 turns, any enemy that uses a new skill on Aburame Shibi will lose 1 random energy and then take 5 affliction damage permanently*. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

Aburame Shibi deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. If 'Insect Dispersion' was used the previous turn, this skill will also steal 1 random energy from the target each turn.
This skill makes Aburame Shibi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Shino.
Win 4 battles in a row with Torune.

82.6.name: Hyuuga Hiashi
82.6.description: Head of the Hyuuga clan, and father to both Hinata and Hanabi, Hiashi is a strict, but caring man who would do anything for his clan. In battle, there is no equal when it comes to mastering the Hyuuga clan abilities.

skills.skillDescription: Hyuuga Hiashi deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. The following turn, one other random enemy will receive 20 damage and lose 1 random energy. The target of this skill is invisible.
Hyuuga Hiashi becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns.
The next turn, the first enemy to use a new harmful skill on one ally or Hyuuga Hiashi will have that skill reflected back to one random enemy. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Hyuuga Hiashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Hyuuga.

82.9.name: Nara Shikaku
82.9.description: The father of Nara Shikamaru, and the head of the Nara clan, Shikaku is a cool-headed Jounin of Konoha who will go to any lengths to protect his friends and family. In battle, Shikaku is merciless, combining his impressive shadow imitation skills with his unparalleled intellect to grab victory for his team.

skills.skillDescription: Nara Shikaku targets one enemy. That enemy will take 20 damage and then will have their physical, energy and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Shadow Dispersion'.

Nara Shikaku targets all enemies. For 3 turns, Nara Shikaku's skills will deal 10 additional damage to them, and each time they use a new stun skill, then for 3 turns they will be stunned for 1 additional turn by Nara Shikaku's skills.

Nara Shikaku targets himself or one ally for 1 turn, and the first new harmful non-affliction damage skill that is used on them will deal no damage to them and that character will gain permanent destructible defense equal to the original damage of that skill. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Nara Shikaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Nara Shikaku targets all enemies not affected by 'Master Shadow Imitation', stunning their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn and dealing 20 damage to them.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Shikamaru.
Win 5 battles in a row with Ensui.

83.name: Akimichi Chouza
83.description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Akimichi clan, and the father of Chouji, Chouza is a brave, wise man that instills great confidence in his allies. In a fight, Chouza uses his size to become a nuisance to his enemies while granting safety to his team.

skills.skillDescription: Akimichi Chouza deals 5 damage to one enemy and lowers all physical and energy damage they deal by 10 for 1 turn. Akimichi Chouza's team will also gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense.

Akimichi Chouza targets one enemy for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to them and granting his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. During this time, the damage lowering effect of 'Chain Bind' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

This skill can be used on one ally or one enemy. If used on an enemy, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill they use will be countered. If used on an ally, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill used on them will be countered. The countered enemy will receive 10 damage. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability.
This skill makes Akimichi Chouza invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Akimichi Chouji.

83.5.name: Yamanaka Inoichi
83.5.description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Yamanaka clan, and the father of Ino, Inoichi is a very calm, analytical man who can solve nearly any dilemma. While fighting, Inoichi much prefers targeting an enemy's mind, tearing it apart while remaining unscratched himself.

skills.skillDescription: Yamanaka Inoichi targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns this enemy will be unable to use any counter or reflect skills (this is a stun effect). This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

Yamanaka Inoichi targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use a new harmful skill, this skill will gain one stack and Yamanaka Inoichi will be healed for 10 health. During this time, Yamanaka Inoichi can use this skill again for 1 random energy to instead gain 1 random energy for each stack on it and also be healed for 5 health for each stack on it and this skill will end.

For 4 turns, all invulnerability skills one target enemy uses will last 1 less turn. The following 4 turns, everytime a new harmful mental or strategic skill is used on this enemy, the user of that skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn; that invulnerability cannot be ignored.
This skill makes Yamanaka Inoichi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Ino.

84.name: Morino Ibiki
84.description: A Konoha jounin, and the leader of the Torture and Interrogation force, Ibiki is a hard, sadistic man, who enjoys communicating through pain. Like his personality, Ibiki enjoys torturing his enemies, putting them in awkward situations where they have no choice but to lose.

skills.skillDescription: Morino Ibiki permanently gains 10 points of damage reduction. For the rest of the game, Morino Ibiki can use this skill to deal 10 damage to one enemy, and 5 additional damage for each time a new damage skill was used on Morino Ibiki since this skill was used. This damage resets each time it is used.

Morino Ibiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, each time that enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will receive 20 piercing damage. Morino Ibiki will also gain 20 points of destructible defense when this skill is used.

Morino Ibiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 2 turns, each turn that enemy does not use a new skill, they will receive 20 piercing damage. Morino Ibiki will also gain 20 points destructible defense when this skill is used.
This skill makes Morino Ibiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

84.3.name: Zaji
84.3.description: Zaji is a Konoha Chuunin, and one who constantly boasts about his abilities, regardless of it is warranted or not. Zaji is a sensor, using his abilities to sense out enemies and prevent them attacking.

skills.skillDescription: For 2 turns, Zaji and his allies will be invulnerable to harmful skills that deal original direct damage of 20 or less to an enemy in any form. The following 2 turns, 'Exploding Chakra Kunai' will deal 5 additional damage.

For 1 turn, all new skills that the enemy team uses that deal 35 or more damage will be countered. For this counter effect, damage decrease and increase effects are ignored but straight damage changes are still considered. Also, for 1 turn 'Exploding Chakra Kunai' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill is invisible.
Zaji deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 1 turn after, that enemy will receive 15 damage.
This skill makes Zaji invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Konoha Jounin.

84.4.name: Nara Ensui
84.4.description: Ensui is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village's Nara clan. Ensui is very skilled with his clan's secret techniques, able to use the Shadow Imitation Shadow Bind technique to attach their shadow to a target to extend its range and catch its actual target.

skills.skillDescription: Nara Ensui stuns one enemy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on any member of Nara Ensui's team will be stunned for 1 additional turn by 'Shadow Imitation' permanently. This effect stacks.
Nara Ensui deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, 'Shadow Imitation' will stun them for 1 additional turn permanently. This effect stacks.

Nara Ensui gains 1 white energy and targets one ally. For 3 turns, if this ally uses a new non-strategic skill, Nara Ensui will deal 10 additional damage for 1 turn. If they use a new stun skill, Nara Ensui will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. If they use a new invulnerability skill, Nara Ensui will become invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill ends if Nara Ensui dies.
This skill makes Nara Ensui invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Nara clan member.
Win 20 battles with any Nara clan member.

84.5.name: Aburame Muta
84.5.description: Muta is a special jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and a member of the Aburame clan. As a skilled member of his clan, Muta is part of the Shinobi Alliance's Infiltration and Reconnaissance Party.

skills.skillDescription: Aburame Muta deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, any new skill used by that enemy will have 1 turn of additional cooldown. This effect stacks. This skill deals 5 additional damage if the target enemy is stunned.

Aburame Muta deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, Aburame Muta's skills will cost 1 random energy instead for 1 turn. This skill deals 10 additional damage if the target enemy is stunned.
Aburame Muta makes the non-conditional stun effects of all allies' skills they use this turn last 1 additional turn. For 1 turn, all allies will ignore enemy stun effects.
This skill makes Aburame Muta invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Mitarashi Anko (S).
Win 15 battles with any Aburame clan member.

84.6.name: Uzuki Yugao
84.6.description: A member of Konoha's Anbu faction; Yugao is a hard working kunoichi who puts all her might into anything she does. In combat, Yugao mixes sword, speed, and jutsu for some devastating results.

skills.skillDescription: Uzuki Yugao deals 50 damage to one enemy.
For 1 turn, Uzuki Yugao will gain 25 points of destructible defense and the next time 'Hazy Moon Night' is used, it will deal 25 additional damage. This effect stacks.

Uzuki Yugao targets one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will ignore all damage reduction, destructible defense, counters, reflects, invulnerabilities and ignores on them. This skill ignores invulnerability, and cannot be countered, reflected, or ignored.
This skill makes Uzuki Yugao invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Gekko Hayate.

85.name: Anbu Captain Squad
85.description: During the attack to the Hidden Leaf Village by Pain, three Konoha Anbu Captains got together to defend their village. Capable of using a variety of ninjutsu techniques, they are ready to do everything it's needed to stop Akatsuki from rampaging.

skills.skillDescription: Anbu Captain Squad deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies permanently. During this time, they will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. If 'Earth Release: Dropping Lid' and 'Wind Release: Wind Cutter' are both active, this skill will also make the enemies ignore all helpful effects for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Earth Release: Sticky Earth Drop' permanently after used. Ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.

Anbu Captain Squad stuns all enemies for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, their physical skills will have their cooldowns increased by 1 turn. This skill stacks. If 'Lightning Release: Four Pillar Bind' and 'Wind Release: Wind Cutter' are both active, this skill will also deal 20 piercing damage to all enemies. Ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.

Anbu Captain Squad deals 20 piercing damage to all enemies. For the rest of the game, their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy. This skill stacks. If 'Lightning Release: Four Pillar Bind' and 'Earth Release: Dropping Lid' are both active, Anbu Captain Squad's team will be grant 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 2 turns. Ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.
This skill makes Anbu Captain Squad invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Anbu Captain Squad gains 2 random energies and then targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new skill, they will take 5 additional damage from 'Fire Release: Fired Pottery' permanently. This skill becomes 'Fire Release: Fired Pottery' permanently after used. Ends if Anbu Captain Squad dies.
Anbu Captain Squad deals 40 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

mission: Win 35 battles with any Konoha Anbu Ninja.

86.name: Aburame Torune
86.description: A member of the Aburame clan, and a member of Anbu Root, Torune can almost be said to have no personality of his own, other than his undying loyalty to Danzo. Unlike other members of his clan, Torune employs a unique type of bug that lets him outright destroy both flesh and chakra.

skills.skillDescription: Aburame Torune targets one enemy, whose skills will cost 1 additional random energy for 2 turns*. All allies of that enemy will take 15 damage for 2 turns.

Aburame Torune gains 5 points of damage reduction and 5 points of destructible defense permanently. During this time any enemy that uses a new skill on him will take 5 affliction damage instantly and 5 additional damage from 'Nano Beetles' permanently. This skill stacks.
Aburame Torune targets one enemy. That enemy will take 5 affliction damage permanently. This skill cannot be ignored or removed and this skill stacks.
This skill makes Aburame Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Aburame Ninja.

87.name: Yamanaka Fu
87.description: Yamanaka Fu is a member of the Yamanaka clan and a member of Anbu Root. Fu is a skilled genjutsu user and the partner of Torune.

skills.skillDescription: Yamanaka Fu deals 25 damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 15 additional damage to an enemy affected by 'Mind Puppet Switch'.

Yamanaka Fu targets one enemy, stunning all their friendly skills and making them invulnerable to all friendly skills for 2 turns. During this time, 'Tanto Slash' will deal 15 additional damage to that enemy.

Yamanaka Fu targets one ally or himself. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a physical, energy or strategic skill against the target of this skill will be countered. The countered enemy will have all their skills replaced by 'Mind Puppet Switch - Attack' for 2 turns, take 15 additional damage from 'Tanto Slash' also for 2 turns and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Yamanaka Fu invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: This skill deals 15 damage to one enemy.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Yamanaka Ninja.

88.name: Shimura Danzo
88.description: The leader of Anbu Root, Danzo wishes nothing more than to become the Hokage, and while an extreme man with few morals, Danzo only wishes to protect Konoha. Thanks to Orochimaru, Danzo has gained access to many forbidden sharingan techniques that allow him to dominate any foe before him. Original Design: Pavera

skills.skillDescription: Shimura Danzo deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 5 piercing damage to all other enemies. This skill deals 10 additional damage to an enemy stunned by ‘Self-Cursing Seal’.

Shimura Danzo targets one enemy. If that enemy uses an offensive skill on the following turn, they will take 20 piercing damage and have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. During ‘Izanagi’, this skill is replaced by ‘Reverse Four Symbols Sealing’ for 1 turn.
Shimura Danzo targets all characters, first removing all active skills from the battlefield*, and then dealing 15 damage to the enemy team each turn for 3 turns.

For 1 turn, Shimura Danzo will ignore all enemy damage dealt. This skill is invisible and will have its cooldown increased by 1 turn each time it is used. After used, this skill will be replaced with ‘Hostage Shield’ for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Shimura Danzo deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. Shimura Danzo will also take 10 affliction damage and remove all enemy skills on himself.
For 1 turn, all harmful skills used on Shimura Danzo will be reflected to one target enemy instead. This skill is invisible.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Aburame Torune.
Win 6 battles in a row with Yamanaka Fu.

89.name: Tsunade (S)
89.description: No longer just a Sannin, Tsunade is the new Kage of Konoha, and has taken a large amount of responsibility on her shoulders. Knowing that holding back is no longer an option, Tsunade taps into her seal to gain an impressive power over her foes.

skills.skillDescription: Tsunade (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If an ally was affected by 'Enhanced Healing Wave' the previous turn, they also cannot be killed 1 turn. If empowered, this skill will destroy destructible defense and it will deal 40 piercing damage, but will cost 1 additional random energy.
Tsunade (S) targets one ally, healing them for 40 health. If empowered, this skill will heal 50 health instead.

Tsunade (S) heals herself for 25 health. The next time Tsunade (S) uses a skill, it will be empowered. If this skill is used while empowered, it will heal Tsunade (S) for 50 health and grant her 2 random energies. If a skill is countered while empowered, it won't use the stack of this skill.

Tsunade (S) heals herself for 25 health. The next two times Tsunade (S) uses a skill, it will be empowered. If this skill is used while empowered, it will heal Tsunade (S) for 50 health and grant her 2 random energies.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Tsunade.

94.name: Senju Hashirama
94.description: A member of the Senju clan, and one of the greatest warriors during the Warring States Period who went on to create Konoha. Even before becoming the Hokage, Hashirama proved his power and ability with his unmatched Wood Release jutsus.

skills.skillDescription: For 2 turns, Senju Hashirama will become invulnerable to all energy skills and he will steal 1 random energy from one enemy each turn.
For 2 turns, Senju Hashirama will become invulnerable to all physical skills* and he will deal 20 damage to one enemy each turn.

Senju Hashirama grants 30 points of destructible defense to himself and his allies for 3 turns. For 3 turns, ‘Wood Release: Wood Dragon' and ‘Wood Release: Wood Human' will last 1 additional turn and cost 1 random energy less.
This skill makes Senju Hashirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with ET Senju Hashirama.
Win 35 battles with ET Senju Hashirama.

95.name: Senju Tobirama
95.description: Tobirama was a member of the renowned Senju clan, who, together with his elder brother and the Uchiha clan, founded the first Shinobi village: Konohagakure. Throughout his life, Tobirama created a lot of known shinobi techniques and became the Second Hokage.

skills.skillDescription: Senju Tobirama uses this skill to attack one enemy dealing 30 damage to them. This enemy's non-affliction damage will be lowered by 10 for 2 turns. 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will deal an additional 5 damage permanently. This effect stacks.
Senju Tobirama gains 10 destructible defense and 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. Senju Tobirama will deal 5 more damage with his skills permanently. This effect stacks.
Senju Tobirama deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered. For 1 turn Senju Tobirama's skills will cost 1 less random energy.
This skill makes Senju Tobirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with ET Senju Tobirama.
Win 35 battles with ET Senju Tobirama.

95.3.name: Uchiha Izuna
95.3.description: Izuna is a member of the Hidden Leaf Village's Uchiha Clan and the younger brother of Uchiha Madara. He and his brother were renowned as the clan's two strongest members in their lifetime.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Izuna gains 20 points of destructible defense and targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if they use a new harmful skill, 'Fire Release: Fire Ball' will cost 2 randons and 'Sharingan Genjutsu' will cost 1 random for 1 turn.
Uchiha Izuna deals 30 damage to one enemy and makes them deal 10 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn.

Uchiha Izuna stuns one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 25 affliction damage. For 1 turn, the first enemy to use a new skill on Uchiha Izuna will take 10 affliction damage. This skill will be canceled if Uchiha Izuna is targeted by a new non-strategic skill.
This skill makes Uchiha Izuna invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Uchiha.

95.6.name: Uchiha Madara
95.6.description: The once leader of the Uchiha clan during the founding of Konoha who unfortunately disagreed with Konoha's kage on how to achieve peace. Madara was one of the few ninjas capable of matching Hashirama's power, with the use of his Mangekyou and Susanoo.

skills.skillDescription: For 4 turns, all original non-affliction damage used against Uchiha Madara will be reduced to a maximum of 25, this effect cannot be ignored. During this time, Uchiha Madara can use this skill again to ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes for 1 turn.
Uchiha Madara gains 55 points of destructible defense. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Armored Susanoo Assault'. Using this skill will reset the stacks of 'Armored Susanoo Assault'.

Uchiha Madara deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy and 5 to all others for 3 turns. During this time, if an enemy uses a new skill that grants damage reduction or destructible defense, they will receive 10 affliction damage.
This skill makes Uchiha Madara invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uchiha Madara deals 30 damage to one enemy and 5 additional damage for each turn 'Madara: Susanoo' has been active.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Uchiha Izuna.

95.9.name: Uchiha Shisui
95.9.description: A member of the prestigious Uchiha clan, and the best friend of Uchiha Itachi; Shisui is a highly trained ninja that is utterly devoted to Konoha. Shisui is one of the few known ninjas capable of using one the most powerful genjutsu: Koto Amatsukami.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Shisui gains 45 points of permanent destructible defense. While Uchiha Shisui has destructible defense from this skill, it will be replaced by 'Tsukumo'. Using this skill will reset the stacks of 'Tsukumo'.

Uchiha Shisui deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. During 'Shisui: Susanoo' this skill will last 1 additional turn and have 1 turn of cooldown. During 'Body Flicker' this skill will ignore invulnerability.

Uchiha Shisui targets one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime that enemy uses a new skill, they will lose 1 random energy. During this time, Uchiha Shisui can use this skill for no cost to change the target of the skill to a new enemy. This skill is invisible.

For 2 turns, if a new harmful skill is used on Uchiha Shisui, he will become invulnerable to all other skills for the rest of that turn and will deal 15 damage to the enemy that used the harmful skill. This skill is invisible.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uchiha Shisui deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies and reduces their non-affliction damage by 5 for 1 turn. For each turn that 'Shisui: Susanoo' is activated, the damage reduction effect will last 1 additional turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sasuke.
Win 6 battles in a row with Uchiha Itachi.

95.95.name: Uchiha Fugaku
95.95.description: Fugaku is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village, father of Itachi and Sasuke. He was the head of the Uchiha clan as well as the leader of the Hidden Leaf Military Police Force. He was said to be one of the strongest Uchiha clan members, known worldwide as Wicked Eye Fugaku.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Fugaku deals 10 damage to all enemies and then reduces their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Uchiha Fugaku dies.

Uchiha Fugaku deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and then reduces the duration of their stun and counter effects by 1 turn for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. This skill ends if Uchiha Fugaku dies.

Uchiha Fugaku targets his team for 3 turns. During this time, all effects of 'Mangekyou Sharingan: Mental Breakdown' and 'Fire Release: Great Fireball' will be concentrated on one enemy instead and everytime a member of Uchiha Fugaku's team is targeted by a new harmful skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same class as the skill that was used on them (only main classes considered).
This skill makes Uchiha Fugaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sasuke and Itachi (classic versions) on the same team.

96.name: Uchiha Naori
96.description: Naori was a kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village's famed Uchiha clan. She is as calm as she is powerful, able to use one of her clan's kinjutsu: Izanami which traps the target in an endlessly-looped genjutsu with no hope of escaping unless they accept themselves.

skills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, Uchiha Naori can use 'Mind Disrupture'. During this time, whenever an enemy uses a new non-physical skill on her, 'Mind Disrupture' will be applied on them. This skill will be replaced by 'Redemption' permanently.
Uchiha Naori deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy's non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional white energy. This skill requires 'Izanami' to be active.
Uchiha Naori deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Uchiha Naori invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uchiha Naori targets one enemy, permanently changing the cost of their non-strategic skills to 2 white energies. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it and ends if Uchiha Naori dies.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Edo Tensei Itachi.
Win 40 battles with any Uchiha clan member.

96.1.name: Maito Dai
96.1.description: Maito Dai is a shinobi of the Hidden Leaf Village and the father of Gai. Dai spent his entire career as a genin, causing many to look down upon him and earned him the epithet of the 'Eternal Genin'. Despite this, after twenty years of tireless training, Dai perfected how to use all Eight Gates.

skills.skillDescription: Maito Dai deals 10 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use.
Maito Dai deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill deals 5 less damage with each use.

Maito Dai makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 30 piercing damage to one random enemy. Maito Dai's skills will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill cannot be countered or reflected, ignores invulnerability and requires 'Eight Gates Opening' to be active.
This skill makes Maito Dai invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Gai.

96.2.name: Maki
96.2.description: Maki is a kunoichi of the Hidden Sand Village and the student of Pakura. Maki is also a member of the Ninja Alliance Sealing Squad.

skills.skillDescription: Maki gains gains 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. If any enemy uses a new skill on Maki, their skills will be stunned the following turn. This effect ignores invulnerability. This skill is invisible.
Maki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their offensive skills for 1 turn.

Maki targets one enemy dealing 25 damage to them and then stunning their non-mental skills for 2 turns. Non-Affliction skills will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill while it is in effect.
This skill makes Maki invulnerable for 1 turn.

96.5.name: Chiyo
96.5.description: The grandmother of Sasori and elder ninja of the Sand Village, Chiyo is a well known and accomplished puppet master and builder.

skills.skillDescription: Chiyo (S) gains 10 points of damage reduction permanently. During this time, this skill and 'Human Body Puppet Control' will be replaced. 'Chikamatsu Artillery' and 'Stronger Chikamatsu Artillery' cycle between their effects with each use.
Chiyo (S) targets one ally. For 2 turns, this ally will have 15 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional damage with physical and energy skills. This skill ends if Chiyo (S) dies.

Chiyo (S) targets one dead ally, reviving them with 100 health. Chiyo (S) will instantly die when this skill is used. This skill can only be used if Chiyo (S) has 50 or less health and its self-death effect cannot be ignored.
This skill makes Chiyo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Dual Blades: Chiyo (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy. / Small Bombs: Chiyo (S) deals 20 affliction damage* to one enemy. / Spinning Orb: Chiyo (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. / Sealing Lion Head: Chiyo (S) stuns one enemy's physical and strategic skills for 2 turns.

Arm Cage: Chiyo (S) deals 10 damage to all enemies and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. / Cable Pierce: Chiyo (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies. / Suction Crushing: Chiyo (S) deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies and stuns their strategic skills for 1 turn. / Lion Closing Roar: Chiyo (S) reduces all enemies' non-affliction damage by 10 for 3 turns.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sakura.

97.name: Kankuro (S)
97.description: In the last couple years Kankuro(s) has become a Jounin and has created a new puppet. He is now able to harness three puppets at once and is a more versatile combatant. Original Design: Yaseen16

skills.skillDescription: Kankuro (S) targets one enemy, countering any offensive skill they use for 1 turn. If countered, that enemy will take 100% more damage from ‘Karasu Knives’ the following turn. This skill is invisible until triggered.
Kankuro (S) targets an enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 affliction damage.*
For 3 turns, Kankuro (S) and his allies 10 points of damage reduction and are immune to enemy affliction damage. This skill becomes ‘Defensive Puppet Control’ when used.
This skill makes Kankuro (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Kankuro (S) can target one ally or himself. The target of this skill will have 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kankuro.

98.name: Temari (S)
98.description: Temari (S) has grown over the years. She is now a Jounin as well as the sister of Kankuro and Gaara. Temari is also the Hidden Sand Village's ambassador to the Hidden Leaf Village.

skills.skillDescription: Wind Scythe is improved and deals an additional 5 damage permanently. Temari (S) gains 10 points of damage reduction permanently and this skill becomes Second Moon permanently when used.
Temari (S) protects one of her teammates. For 1 turn, that ally will gain 20 points of damage reduction and they cannot be killed by enemy skills.
Temari (S) deals 20 damage to 1 enemy.
This skill makes Temari (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Temari (S) will now have 15 points of damage reduction permanently and Wind Scythe will deal an additional 10 damage permanently. This skill becomes Third Moon permanently when used.
Temari (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies. All targets of this skill will deal 5 less damage for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Temari.

100.name: Kazekage Gaara
100.description: After a few short years and much soul-searching, Gaara has risen to be his village's Kazekage. Rather than destroying others he now protects those he cares about to prove his existence.

skills.skillDescription: Kazekage Gaara deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. This effect lasts 1 additional turn for each Desert Charge Kazekage Gaara has and then removes all Desert Charges on him.
Kazekage Gaara deals 25 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. This skill grants Kazekage Gaara 1 Desert Charge.

Kazekage Gaara gains 5 points of permanent damage reduction and 1 Desert Charge. His allies gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense. 'Desert Missile' and 'Desert Prison' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Kazekage Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Gaara.

100.1.name: Ruka
100.1.description: Ruka is a kunoichi from the Hidden Mist Village and part of the Third Division of the Shinobi Alliance. As a medical-nin, she has great control over her chakra and is capable of using Water Release techniques.

skills.skillDescription: Ruka deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 20 piercing damage.

Ruka will counter the next enemy that uses a new non-mental skill on her and will then make this skill unusable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active. This skill will end if 'Water Release: Burning Bath' is used.

For 2 turns, all enemies' skills will cost 1 additional random energy. During this time, they will take 10 additional damage from 'Water Release: Water Stream' and this skill will be replaced by 'Water Release: Burning Bath'.
This skill makes Ruka invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Permanently, one enemy takes 20 piercing damage each turn and is stunned. Ruka takes 10 affliction damage* each turn during this time. This skill ignores invulnerability and will end if either character dies or if Ruka uses a new skill.

mission: The Kind Girl of the Mist
Win 5 battles in a row with Zaji.

100.2.name: Ao
100.2.description: Ao is a hunter-nin of the Hidden Mist Village and a skilled sensor. Ao is a veteran shinobi who has been in many battles, one of his spoils of war is the byakugan he possesses.

skills.skillDescription: Ao deals 25 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn.

Ao targets himself or an ally for 1 turn. Any enemy who uses a new skill on the target will have their new invisible skills become visible and will take 10 additional damage from 'Sensing Barrier' permanently. This skill stacks and is invisible.

For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to use non-conditional stun, counter and reflect skills (this is a stun effect). For 2 turns, any member of Ao's team that uses a new skill will be healed for 15 health.
This skill makes Ao invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Haku.
Win 5 battles in a row with Momochi Zabuza.

100.4.name: Chojuro
100.4.description: Chojuro confidence is building as the war rages one. The longer it lasts the stronger Chojuro becomes.

skills.skillDescription: Chojuro targets all enemies, dealing 15 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.
Chojuro makes one enemy lose all destructible defense they have and then deals 45 piercing damage to them. This skill ignores invulnerability.
For 1 turn, Chojuro will counter all enemy non-strategic skills used on him. All countered enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage*. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Chojuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Ao.

100.6.name: Terumi Mei
100.6.description: Terumi Mei is the Fifth Mizukage of Kirigakure. After the dreadful reign of Yagura Karatachi ended, she became Mizukage and worked tirelessly to reform internal policies and recreate diplomatic relations with other villages.

skills.skillDescription: Terumi Mei argets all enemies, dealing 10 piercing damage to them for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, all allies will deal 5 additional damage from physical and energy skills.
Terumi Mei attacks one enemy, dealing 40 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, that enemy will be stunned, and they will ignore healing effects.
Terumi Mei targets the enemy team, destroying all destructible defense and dealing 5 affliction damage to them for 4 turns. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

For 1 turn, Terumi Mei makes one ally and herself invulnerable. If used on one enemy, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable, and they will be dealt 15 affliction damage if they use a new skill.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Ao.
Win 6 battles in a row with Chojuro.

101.name: Akatsuchi
101.description: Akatsuchi is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village. Akatsuchi is a powerful shinobi who uses brute strength and earth style jutsus in combat.

skills.skillDescription: Akatsuchi deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered
Akatsuchi deal 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns.* During this skill, Akatsuchi gains 10 points of damage reduction and ‘High Speed Assault’ costs 1 random energy less.
Akatsuchi targets one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them and removing 1 energy.
This skill makes Akatsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Deidara.

102.name: Kurotsuchi
102.description: Kurotsuchi is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village and the Partner of Akatsuchi. She is also the granddaughter of the third Tsuchikage.

skills.skillDescription: Kurotsuchi deals 25 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Water Trumpet' will deal 5 additional damage. The next time 'Water Trumpet' is used, it will stun its target for 1 turn.
Kurotsuchi deals 20 damage to one enemy.
Kurotsuchi deals 20 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, all enemies affected by this skill will be invulnerable to friendly skills.
This skill makes Kurotsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Akatsuchi.

103.name: Ittan
103.description: Ittan is a Hidden Rock Village shinobi. Ittan is battle hardened and extremely calm during battle.

skills.skillDescription: All enemies will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills for 2 turns. During this time Ittan will have 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 'Moving Earth Core' will deal 5 additional damage.
Ittan deals 30 damage to one enemy and reduces the damage they deal by 10 the following turn.
Ittan targets and makes invulnerable one ally and himself from enemy physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Ittan invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Akatsuchi.
Win 5 battles in a row with Kurotsuchi.

103.5.name: Monga
103.5.description: Monga is a shinobi from the Hidden Rock Village, member of the Shinobi Alliance's Third Division. Monga is skilled in the field of Earth Release techniques. He is capable of using earth walls of varying sizes for defense as well as trapping an opponent.

skills.skillDescription: Monga deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 4 turns. For 1 turn 'Earth Release: Earth-Style Wall' will have no cooldown. This skill stacks.

Monga grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy that target them with a new skill will take 10 damage. This skill grants 5 additional points of destructible defense with each use.
Monga deals 35 damage to one enemy and then grants his allies 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill grants 5 additional points of destructible defense with each use.
This skill makes Monga invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Ittan.

104.name: Kitsuchi
104.description: Kitsuchi is a jounin of the Hidden Rock Village and the son of the Sandaime Tsuchikage as well as the father of Kurotsuchi. Kitsuchi is also the commander of the allied shinobi forces second division.

skills.skillDescription: Kitsuchi targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. That enemy will be unable to use counter skills for 1 turn (this is a stun effect).

Kitsuchi attacks, dealing 10 damage to all enemies. The following turn, all stun and counter skills used by the affected enemies will last 1 turn less. This skill grants Kitsuchi 10 of unpierceable points of damage reduction.
Kitsuchi deals 45 damage to one enemy. This enemy will be stunned for 2 turns.
This skill makes Kitsuchi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kurotsuchi.

105.name: Ohnoki
105.description: Ohnoki, renowned as 'Onoki of Both Scales', was the Third Tsuchikage of Iwagakure.

skills.skillDescription: Ohnoki attacks, dealing 30 damage to one enemy and gaining 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

Ohnoki targets an enemy, dealing 10 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, skills of the target will cost 1 additional random energy and they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Steam'.

If used on an ally, their skills will cost 1 less random energy and that ally will deal 5 additional damage for 2 turns. If used on an enemy, their skills will cost 1 additional random energy and that enemy will deal 10 less damage with any non-affliction skill for 2 turns.
This skill makes Ohnoki invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Ohnoki deals 50 damage to one enemy. If that enemy's health drops to 20 or less, they will be killed. This skill requires ‘Dust Release’ to be active on the enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Akatsuchi.
Win 6 battles in a row with Kurotsuchi.

106.name: Atsui
106.description: Atsui is a skilled swordsmen of the Hidden Cloud Village as well as the hot blooded brother of Samui.

skills.skillDescription: For 3 turns, damage dealt to Atsui will be reduced by 10 and any enemy that uses a skill on Atsui will be dealt 10 affliction damage.* ‘Fire Wall’ will cost 1 random energy less during this skill and ‘Flame Beheading’ will deal an additional 10 damage.
Atsui targets all enemies. For 1 turn, all enemies will be dealt 25 affliction damage that ignores invulnerability if they use a new skill. This skill is invisible.
Atsui deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy.
This skill makes Atsui invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: The Hot Blade of the Cloud
Win 5 battles in a row with any Cloud Ninja.
Win 15 battles with any Cloud Ninja.

106.5.name: Karui
106.5.description: Karui is a kunoichi of the Hidden Cloud Village and a member of Team Samui. Karui is a capable kunoichi with great teamwork skills, able to coordinate attacks with her partner Omoi without either needing to communicate.

skills.skillDescription: Karui targets herself and one ally, granting both 5 points of damage reduction and increasing their non-affliction damage by 5 for 4 turns. If this skill is used on Karui only, its effects will trigger twice. This skill stacks and ends if Karui dies.
Karui deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then gains 5 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. This skill stacks and cannot be countered.
Karui stuns one enemy's strategic skills for 4 turns and gains 5 points of damage reduction also for 3 turns. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Continuous Rampage'.
This skill makes Karui invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Karui targets one enemy affected by 'Body Immobilization', dealing 10 damage to them and then gaining 5 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. This skill stacks.

mission: An Impulsive Blade in the Cloud
Win 20 battles with any Team 7 member.

107.name: Omoi
107.description: Omoi is a Hidden Cloud Village shinobi and a student of Killer Bee. Having been trained by Killer Bee naturally he is an exceptional swordsman.

skills.skillDescription: The following turn, all enemy skills used on Omoi will be countered and they will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill is invisible. This skill becomes ‘Crescent Moon Beheading’ when used.
Omoi targets one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them and stunning their friendly skills the following turn.
Omoi targets one ally or himself. The first enemy to use a skill on the target of this skill will be dealt 20 damage that ignores invulnerability. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Omoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Omoi deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy will be stunned for 1 turn and will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable also for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Crescent Moon Reverse Beheading' when used.

mission: A Cautious Blade in the Cloud

107.5.name: Samui
107.5.description: Samui is a kunoichi from the Hidden Cloud Village, and the leader of Team Samui. She is a quite skilled jounin who uses kenjutsu, wielding a tanto in battle.

skills.skillDescription: Samui makes one ally invulnerable for 4 turns. During this time, she will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and 'Battle Cry' will last 1 additional turn. This skill ends if Samui dies.
Samui deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If Samui's health is at 30 or below, this skill will deal another 25 piercing damage to its target.
Samui targets her team, granting them lifelink for 1 turn.
This skill makes Samui invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 30 battles with Atsui, Karui or Omoi.

108.name: Shee
108.description: Shee is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and a sensor. Shee is one of the Raikage's most reliable shinobi.

skills.skillDescription: Shee deals 25 damage to 1 enemy. For 1 turn, if a new enemy skill is used on Shee, he will be invulnerable for 1 turn.
Shee heals one ally or himself for 25 health.
Shee targets one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them. That enemy will be invulnerable to new friendly skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Shee invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Darui.
Win 5 battles in a row with Karui or Atsui.
Win 15 battles with Karui or Atsui.

108.5.name: Darui
108.5.description: Darui is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and the right hand of the Yondaime Raikage. Despite his appearance Darui is a formidable shinobi.

skills.skillDescription: Darui targets one enemy, stunning their non-strategic skills for 1 turn. All other enemies will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill ignores invulnerability.
Darui deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies. The following turn, ‘Laser Circus’ and ‘Black Panther Lightning’ will deal 5 additional damage to them.
Darui deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy.
This skill makes Darui invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: The Dull Genius of the Cloud
Win 5 battles in a row with Omoi.

108.7.name: Motoi
108.7.description: Motoi is a shinobi from the Hidden Cloud Village who is stationed on the Island Turtle. Motoi is a childhood friend of Killer Bee, proficient in ninjutsu while also being an expert tracker-nin.

skills.skillDescription: Motoi deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and 10 piercing damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, 'Minor Discharge' can be used on them.

Motoi deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new skill, that skill's cooldown will be increased by 1 turn. This skill requires 'Lightning Release: Spider Web' to be active on the enemy and stacks.
For 2 turns, the counter effects of all enemies' new skills will last 1 turn less. For 2 turns, Motoi's team will have 5 points of damage reduction.
This skill makes Motoi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Aoba.

109.name: Dodai
109.description: Dodai is a skilled sensor shinobi and a lava release user as well. His intelligence is his most powerful asset and he will need it to survive this war.

skills.skillDescription: For 3 turns, Dodai and his allies gain 10 unpierceable damage reduction and they will ignore stun effects during this skill.
Dodai deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy will be unable to use stun effects (this is a stun effect).
This skill deals 35 damage to one enemy, and one random ally will become invulnerable. The following 4 turns, the target of this skill will have their skills stunned by ‘Communication Telepathy’.
This skill makes Dodai invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Cloud Ninja.
Win 30 battles with any Cloud Ninja.

109.1.name: Mabui
109.1.description: Mabui is a kunoichi of the Hidden Cloud Village and the Fourth Raikage's assistant. While very calm and analytical, Mabui possesses an unique technique that allows her to transfer objects from a place to another, in a matter of seconds.

skills.skillDescription: Mabui targets one ally. For 3 turns, that ally's skills will have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill cannot be used on an ally already affected by it.

Mabui targets both teams for 4 turns. During this time, her team will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1 turn, while the enemy team will have the cooldown of their skills increased by 1 turn.

This skill can be used on an enemy or on ally. If used on an enemy, they will take 25 affliction damage and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 2 turns. If used on an ally, they will take 15 affliction damage and for 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be decreased by 2 turns.
This skill makes Mabui invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Cloud Ninja.
Win 5 battles in a row with Shikaku.

109.2.name: Ay
109.2.description: Ay is the Fourth Raikage of Kumogakure. Ay is generally characterised as stern, outspoken and decisive. After becoming Raikage, Ay grew more humble as he referred to himself as 'washi', a more humble term used by old men, instead of 'ore', a prideful way of saying 'I' or 'me'.

skills.skillDescription: For 4 turns, Ay will gain 10 points of damage reduction and 20 points of destructible defense. During this time, 'Raitoningu Sutoreto' is altered to target one enemy instead of a random enemy. Becomes 'Girochin Doroppu' for 4 turns after being used.
Ay deals 25 damage to one enemy. This skill removes all stacks from 'Raitoningu Sutoreto'. This skill cannot be countered.
Ay deal 15 damage to one random enemy. Permanent, 'Raiga Bomu' will deal 15 additional damage. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Ay invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Ay uses his whole body, destroying any destructible defense they have and dealing 25 piercing damage to them. The following turn Ay skills will cost 1 less energy for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Killer Bee.
Win 6 battles in a row with Shee.
Win 6 battles in a row with Darui.

109.4.name: Samurai Troops
109.4.description: Samurai are a military power similar to shinobi, though not nearly as widespread. Only the Land of Iron continues to use samurai, with all other countries having since opted to use shinobi. All samurai are practised sword users, into which they channel their chakra.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, 'Flash Iaidou' will target all enemies if used and 'Ally Saving' will target all allies if used. Also for 1 turn, every enemy who uses a new skill on Samurai Troops will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns. This skill ends if Samurai Troops receive new non-affliction damage.

Samurai Troops deal 15 piercing damage to one enemy. On this skill's 1st and 2nd uses, the enemy will take 5 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn. On its 3rd and 4th uses, the enemy will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. On its 5th and 6th uses, the enemy's strategic skills will be stunned for 2 turns.
Samurai Troops target one ally, making them unable to be killed for 2 turns. This skill ends if Samurai Troops die.
This skill makes Samurai Troops invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Fighters from the Land of Iron
Win 5 battles in a row with any Team Hebi/Taka member.
Win 20 battles with any Team Hebi/Taka member.

109.5.name: Mifune
109.5.description: Mifune is a samurai warrior and the General of the Land of Iron. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Mifune is placed in charge of the Fifth Divison, also known as the Special Battle Division.

skills.skillDescription: Mifune targets one enemy. The following turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful non-strategic skill they will be countered and take 15 damage. This skill is invisible.
Mifune targets all his allies. For 3 turns, everytime an ally uses a new harmful damaging skill, Mifune will deal 10 additional damage for 1 turn. This effect stacks.
Mifune deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy's health drops to 10 or below they will be instantly killed. This skill becomes 'Flash' permanently after used.
This skill makes Mifune invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Mifune deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy. If this enemy's health drops to 10 or below they will be instantly killed. This skill becomes Iai Beheading' after used.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Hanzo.

109.7.name: Hanzo of the Salamander
