109.7.description: Hanzo, feared as Hanzo of the Salamander, was a legendary shinobi and the leader of the Hidden Rain Village. During the Second Shinobi World War, he gave Jiraiya, Orochimaru and Tsunade the "Hidden Leaf 's Sannin" title.

skills.skillDescription: Hanzo of the Salamander deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. This enemy will take 15 additional damage from 'Exploding Flame Formation' permanently. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, 'Exploding Flame Formation' will target all enemies instead and 'Antidote', 'Body Flicker' and 'Embedded Venom Sac' will target Hanzo of the Salamander's entire team instead.

Hanzo of the Salamander targets one enemy for 3 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, this enemy will take 20 affliction damage and all stacks of 'Dance of the Sickle Blade' on them will be removed. This skill stacks.

Hanzo of the Salamander deals 5 affliction damage* to one ally and makes them ignore energy drain or removal effects permanently. This skill cannot be used on an ally already affected by it. If used during 'Dance of the Sickle Blade', this skill will be permanently replaced by 'Embedded Venom Sac'.
This skill makes Hanzo of the Salamander invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Hanzo of the Salamander, that enemy will be dealt 10 affliction damage. This skill stacks and ends if Hanzo of the Salamander dies.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Yahiko.
Win 5 battles in a row with Konan.
Win 25 battles with Yahiko or Konan.

110.name: Nii Yugito
110.description: A kunoichi from Kumogakure, Nii Yugito holds within her the two-tailed beast. She has full control over the bijuu Nibi, and is able to transform into it and use its powers to fight.

skills.skillDescription: Nii Yugito gains 15 unpierceable damage reduction. This skill is permanent and cannot be used while in effect.

Nii Yugito deals 30 damage to one enemy. That enemy will deal 10 less damage for 1 turn. Each time this skill is used it will deal 5 more damage (this effect stacks). This skill can only be used during 'Nibi Transformation'.

Nii Yugito takes a huge swipe of her claw, dealing 15 damage to one enemy, and 5 damage to all other enemies. This skill will deal 5 more damage each use (this effect stacks). This skill can only be used during 'Nibi Transformation'.
This skill make Nii Yugito invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Jinchuuriki.
Win 25 battles with any Akatsuki Member.

110.5.name: Karatachi Yagura
110.5.description: Karatachi Yagura is the Jinchuuriki of the Three Tails, Isobu. He used to be the Fourth Mizukage of the Hidden Mist Village and is chiefly remembered for a bloody, despotic reign that contributed to the Hidden Mist being known as the 'Bloody Mist '.

skills.skillDescription: Karatachi Yagura removes all non-strategic skills from the battlefield and targets all enemies. For the following 2 turns, everytime an enemy uses a new physical skill, their physical skills will cost 2 additional random energies for 1 turn.

Karatachi Yagura deals 15 damage to one enemy each turn permanently. Their non-strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy while this skill is active. This skill ends when the target enemy uses a new non-strategic skill or when Karatachi Yagura dies and cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.
Karatachi Yagura deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Karatachi Yagura will ignore all non-damage harmful effects.
This skill makes Karatachi Yagura invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Nohara Rin.
Win 30 battles with any Mist Ninja.

111.name: Roshi
111.description: Roshi is a shinobi from the Hidden Rock Village and also the jinchuuriki of the Four-Tails, Son Goku. He is known to be one of the best Lava Release users of the whole ninja world, masterizing it throughout his lifetime.

skills.skillDescription: Roshi gains 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 4 turns. During this time, any enemy that uses a new non-strategic skill on Roshi will take 10 affliction damage. For 4 turns this skill will be replaced by 'Rising Lava Extent'.

Roshi deals 15 piercing damage to one random enemy for 2 turns. During this time they will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy. During 'Lava Release Chakra Mode' this skill targets a specific enemy instead of a random enemy.
Roshi deals 20 damage to all enemies. During 'Lava Release Chakra Mode' this skill will have no cooldown.
This skill makes Roshi invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Roshi deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, they will take 10 affliction damage if they use  a new harmful skill.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Hoshigaki Kisame.
Win 30 battles with any Rock Ninja.

111.5.name: Han
111.5.description: Han is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village and the jinchuuriki of the Five-Tails, Kokuo. Han is a very capable close-range fighter, being able to destroy wide areas around him, while being protected by his armor and Kokuo's chakra.

skills.skillDescription: Han reduces the cost of his skills by 1 random energy permanently. For the rest of the game, this skill will be replaced by 'Boil Release'. During this time, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on Han, he will be healed for 5 health and will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn (both effects happen before he is affected by the harmful skill).

Han deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Boil Release: Steam Dash'. During 'Chakra Sharpening', this skill will deal 20 damage instead.

Han targets one enemy. For 1 turn their skills will deal 100% less damage and if they use a new harmful skill they will take 40 piercing damage and will be stunned for 1 turn. During 'Chakra Sharpening', this skill will deal 15 less damage. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Han invulnerable for 2 turns. During 'Chakra Sharpening' this skill will last 1 less turn and will have 1 less cooldown.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Han ends 'Chakra Sharpening' and gains 20 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Chakra Sharpening' permanently.

Han deals 15 damage to all enemies and for 1 turn, they will take 10 additional damage from affliction-only skills. For 1 turn, Han will gain 10 points of destructible defense and will deal 5 damage to every enemy that uses a new skill on him. The following turn, this skill will remain replaced. This effect is comulative until Han stops using this skill.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Roshi.

112.name: Utakata
112.description: Utakata is a missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village and the jinchuuriki for the six tailed slug Rokubi. A distant person most of the time Utakata is a kind shinobi who uses bubble line ninjutsu in many ways.

skills.skillDescription: Utakata target one enemy. The target of this skill will lose all destructible defense and then take 20 piercing damage.

Utakata targets one enemy, dealing 10 affliction damage permanently. ‘Soap Bubble Ninjutsu’ will deal an additional 5 damage to any enemy affected by this skill. This skill cannot be used on an enemy currently being affected by it. This skill ends if Utakata dies.
Utakata uses this skill, effortlessly healing himself for 25 health points and gaining 20 unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.
This skill makes Utakata invulnerable for 1 turn.

112.5.name: Fuu
112.5.description: Fuu is a kunoichi from Takigakure and the jinchuuriki of the Seven-Tails, Choumei, Fuu is a sweet-hearted young girl who is always looking for new friends.

skills.skillDescription: Fuu deals 35 damage to one enemy and gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill ignores invulnerability.

Fuu grants herself 50 points of destructible defense for 4 turns and during this time, she will ignore all stun effects. After used, this skill will be replaced with 'Choumei Chakra Wave' for 4 turns.

Fuu protects one ally or herself for 1 turn, countering the first harmful skill used against them, dealing 20 damage to the countered enemy and stunning their physical skills for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Fuu invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Fuu heals herself for 20 health and re-apply 'Ninja Art: Cocoon''s points of destructible defense for 4 turns. This skill cannot stack.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kakuzu.

113.name: Killer Bee
113.description: Killer Bee is the jinchuriki from Kumogakure. Bee (S) is referred to as the hero of Kumogakure and possess immense physical strength as well as being an expert swordsmen.

skills.skillDescription: For 4 turns, Killer Bee will deal 15 piercing damage to any enemy that uses a new skill on him. ‘Buzz Saw’ will deal 15 additional damage during this skill.
Killer Bee deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 15 additional damage when ‘Kenjutsu’ is active.
Killer Bee targets himself or an ally, countering all enemy skills used on them for 1 turn. All countered enemies will be dealt 15 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Killer Bee invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Team Hebi.

114.name: Hachibi Bee
114.description: Hachibi Bee has complete control of the Hachibi within him. This allows Bee to use all forms of the Hachibi's power at will making him a true killer shinobi.

skills.skillDescription: Hachibi Bee uses energy Bones. Hachibi Bee gains 5 unpierceable damage reduction permanently and will also deal an additional 5 damage permanently when this skill is used. Hachibi Bee can only use Chakra Bones 5 times and this skill is permanent.
Hachibi Bee targets 1 enemy dealing 25 damage. For 1 turn that enemy's stamina is depleted, if that enemy uses a skill the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.
Hachibi Bee uses Tailed Beast Bomb on 1 enemy dealing 30 damage. This skill cannot be reflected.
This skill makes Hachibi Bee invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Killer Bee.

115.name: Hozuki Suigetsu
115.description: Hozuki Suigetsu is a native of Kirigakure who was once a captive of Orochimaru. He is a dangerous individual with unique abilities and now follows Uchiha Sasuke.

skills.skillDescription: Hozuki Suigetsu deals 20 damage to one enemy and gains 10 destructible defense permanently.
Hozuki Suigetsu deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy and he gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

For 2 turns, Hozuki Suigetsu is invulnerable to enemy strategic skills, gains 1 random energy, and 15 permanent destructible defense each turn. This skill will be replaced by 'Water Release: Tate Eboshi' for 2 turns after used.
This skill makes Hozuki Suigetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Hozuki Suigetsu deals 30 damage to one enemy and makes his allies invulnerable for 1 turn.

116.name: Karin
116.description: Karin is a former subordinate of Orochimaru who oversaw one of his secret laboratories. She is a skilled sensor and master of chakra control who now follows Uchiha Sasuke.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, if one enemy uses an offensive skill, it will be countered*; if that enemy uses a friendly skill, their skill costs will increase by 1 random energy for 3 turns. This skill is invisible.
Karin deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will be unable to use skills with a non-conditional stun effect (this is a stun effect). This skill ignores invulnerability.
Karin targets one ally. That ally will be healed for 25 health and Karin will take 5 affliction damage.*
This skill makes Karin invulnerable for 1 turn.

117.name: Juugo
117.description: Juugo is the origin of the cursed seal and now follows Sasuke. He can either be a calm natured person or a psychotic lunatic.

skills.skillDescription: Juugo deals 40 damage to one enemy, stunning their skills for 1 turn.
Juugo deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, Juugo gains 25 points of damage reduction* and 'Fusion' will cost 1 random energy instead*.
Juugo heals one ally for 20 health and that ally gains 20 destructible defense permanently. Each time this skill is used, Juugo's cooldowns will increase by 1 turn for 4 turns.
This skill makes Juugo invulnerable for 1 turn.

118.name: Cursed Seal Juugo
118.description: Cursed Seal Juugo is fully transformed and no longer recognizable. Becoming a psychotic lunatic Juugo is able to maintain absurd amounts of chakra making him nearly impossible to defeat.

skills.skillDescription: Cursed Seal Juugo targets one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will be dealt 10 damage and Cursed Seal Juugo will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, 'Chakra Cannons' will cost 1 blue and 1 random energy and 'Body Absorption' will cost 1 random energy instead.
This skill deals 45 damage to one enemy..
Cursed Seal Juugo steals 15 health from one enemy.
This skill makes Cursed Seal Juugo invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Juugo.

119.name: Uchiha Sasuke (S)
119.description: Uchiha Sasuke (S) has spent the last 2 years training under Orochimaru. He is now an expert swordsman and has immensely developed his lightning element techniques. His demeanor has also grown very cold and he is one of the most dangerous individuals in the ninja world.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, all non-mental enemy skills used on him will be countered and those enemies will take 10 affliction damage. This skill is invisible and becomes ‘Binding Snake Glare Spell’ after being used.

Uchiha Sasuke (S) targets one enemy. That enemy will take 15 affliction damage for 3 turns and all enemies that use a skill on Uchiha Sasuke (S) during this time will take 5 affliction damage. For 3 turns 'Kirin' will deal 5 additional damage.
Uchiha Sasuke (S) deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uchiha Sasuke (S) targets one enemy, dealing 20 damage and stunning their skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes ‘Chidori Nagashi' after being used.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Orochimaru.

119.5.name: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S)
119.5.description: After spending the past year training under Orochimaru's watch, Sasuke has gained a tremendous amount of power, being able to use strong cursed techniques to hinder his enemies. His cursed seal has evolved to its peak, allowing Sasuke to control it precisely and maintain it for a long time.

skills.skillDescription: Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) makes one enemy ignore healing effects for 1 turn, deals 15 piercing damage to them and then applies 'Aerial Chidori' (except its apply effect) on them.
Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 15 piercing damage to them and then applies 'Long-Range Distortion' (except its apply effect) on them.
Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) reduces one enemy's non-affliction damage by 15 for 1 turn, deals 15 damage to them and then applies 'Double Shadow Shuriken' (except its apply effect) on them.
This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sasuke (Cursed Seal versions).
Win 25 battles with Sasuke (Cursed Seal versions).

120.name: Mangekyou Sasuke
120.description: Mangekyou Sasuke, Sasuke after defeating his older brother Itachi has gained the mangekyou sharingan. That combined with his embrace of darkness makes him one of the deadliest shinobi alive.

skills.skillDescription: Mangekyou Sasuke gains 25 destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

For 3 turns, Mangekyou Sasuke gains 10 points of damage reduction, and if an enemy uses a new non-mental skill on Mangekyou Sasuke, that enemy will be dealt 5 affliction damage. This skill will also deal 5 affliction damage each turn permanently. This skill stacks.
Mangekyou Sasuke attacks, dealing 25 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy's skills will be stunned for 1 turn.
This skill makes Mangekyou Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sasuke.

121.name: Yakushi Kabuto (S)
121.description: Kabuto is the loyal servant of Orochimaru and is a very dangerous missing-nin. He is a calculating individual who is both accomplished at combat and healing.

skills.skillDescription: Yakushi Kabuto (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will ignore all helpful effects.
Yakushi Kabuto (S) targets one enemy, dealing 30 piercing damage to them. For the rest of the game, that enemy will ignore healing effects.
Yakushi Kabuto (S) heals an ally or himself for 25 health and removes all enemy afflictions from them.
This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Orochimaru.
Win 5 battles in a row with Kabuto.
Win 15 battles with any Team 7 member.

122.name: Jiraiya (S)
122.description: Jiraiya is one of the legendary Sannin that were trained by the third Hokage. Also known as the toad sage, he has been Uzumaki Naruto's teacher for the past few years.

skills.skillDescription: Jiraiya (S) uses this skill, dealing 20 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill is replaced by ‘Toad Oil Projectile’ after being used.
Jiraiya (S) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, all enemy skills that target Jiraiya (S) will be reflected onto that enemy. This skill is invisible.

For 3 turns, Jiraiya (S) protects one ally or himself. If an enemy uses a non-strategic skill on that character, they will take 25 damage.* If an enemy uses a strategic skill, their skills will be stunned for 1 turn and they will take 15 damage.* This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Jiraiya (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Jiraiya (S) targets one enemy dealing 10 Affliction damage and ending any control skills they are using. If Katon Endan is used on this enemy they will take an additional 10 Affliction damage. The effect is permanent and stacks. This skill is replaced by Katon Endan after being used.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Jiraiya.

123.name: Orochimaru (S)
123.description: Orochimaru returns, strong as ever and with some new tricks up his sleeve. But his body seems to be on borrowed time.

skills.skillDescription: Orochimaru (S) sets his health to 100. This skill will be replaced by 'Triple Rashoumon' permanently.
Orochimaru (S) attacks, dealing 20 affliction damage to one enemy. Stun effects used by that enemy the following turn will last 1 turn less.
Orochimaru (S) targets one enemy. That enemy has their non-mental skills stunned for 2 turns. During this time, this enemy takes 25 piercing damage each turn.
This skill makes Orochimaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Orochimaru (S) targets both teams. For 2 turns, Orochimaru (S)'s team will be invulnerable to harmful skills. For 1 turn, the enemy team will be invulnerable to harmful skills. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kabuto.
Win 5 battles in a row with Orochimaru.

123.1.name: White Snake Orochimaru
123.1.description: Like a snake, Orochimaru has shed his skin, revealing his true form; an enormous white snake. As the White Snake, Orochimaru is able to regenerate without end, steal bodies and even revive himself as a dragon-like god.

skills.skillDescription: White Snake Orochimaru targets one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them and healing himself for 30 health.
White Snake Orochimaru stuns one enemy's non-mental skills for 3 turns, each turn stealing 10 health from them. This skill will end if White Snake Orochimaru dies.

White Snake Orochimaru targets one ally, and if their health drops to 25 or below while White Snake Orochimaru is dead, that character will heal 75 health, will have all friendly and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.
This skill makes White Snake Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: White Snake Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense then deals 35 piercing damage to them.

White Snake Orochimaru deals 20 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, if a new stun skill is used on White Snake Orochimaru, he will deal 20 damage and stun that enemy for 1 turn and White Snake Orochimaru will ignore stuns effect for 1 turn.*
White Snake Orochimaru regrows his form from the body of his ally, healing 25 health each turn for 4 turns.
This skill makes White Snake Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: From a Snake to a Dragon
Win 6 battles in a row with Orochimaru.

123.2.name: Fukasaku and Shima
123.2.description: Fukasaku and Shima are known as the two great sage toads of Mount Myoboku. They taught both Jiraiya and Naruto sage jutsu and are each skilled in elemental techniques as well as genjutsu techniques.

skills.skillDescription: Fukasaku and Shima use Frog Song. They target 1 enemy and deal 15 affliction damage for 2 turns.
Fukasaku and Shima use Sand Dust. All allies will be invulnerable for 1 turn.

Fukasaku and Shima use Toad Confrontation Singing on all enemies dealing 10 piercing damage for 2 turns. If any enemy uses a new skill during Toad Confrontation Singing they will have their skills non-strategic stunned for 1 turn.
This skill makes Fukasaku and Shima invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Sennin Naruto.
Win 4 battles in a row with Sennin Jiraiya.

123.3.name: Sennin Jiraiya
123.3.description: Sennin Jiraiya uses sage chakra to improve his speed, strength, and skills. The only downfall is that it alters his appearance similar to that of a toad and makes him unappealing to women, which makes it a last resort for the pervy sage. Original Design: Ider

skills.skillDescription: Sennin Jiraiya deals 20 damage and 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn counter skills used by that enemy will last 1 turn less.

Sennin Jiraiya deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to non-strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Chou Oodama Rasengan' will deal 5 less damage and cost 1 blue and 1 random energy instead.
Sennin Jiraiya deals 45 damage to 1 enemy. For 1 turn that enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable.
This skill makes Sennin Jiraiya invunerable for 1 turn.

123.4.name: Sennin Naruto
123.4.description: Sennin Naruto has trained on Mount Myoboku with Fukasaku and Shima. Naruto has become one of the most powerful individuals in the ninja world.

skills.skillDescription: Sennin Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This effect stacks. This skill becomes 'Recoil' for 1 turn after used.

Sennin Naruto targets all enemies for 1 turn, reducing their damage by 100%. For 2 turns, 'Rasenshuriken' will cost 1 blue and 1 random energy instead. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 10 less damage. This skill stacks and will be replaced by 'Rasengan Barrage' for 2 turns after used.
Sennin Naruto deals 55 piercing damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 10 less damage. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.

Sennin Naruto heals himself for 10 health and an additional 5 health for each skill he has used on the game. After this skill is used, Sennin Naruto will remove all healing increase and damage decrease stacks coming from his skills.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Sennin Naruto deals 30 piercing damage to the enemy affected by 'Frog Kata Kick'. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This effect stacks.

The following turn, the first enemy skill used on Sennin Naruto will be countered and the countered enemy will take 25 damage. This damage is not decreased by Sennin Naruto's skills. For the rest of the game, Sennin Naruto's skills will deal 5 less damage. This skill stacks and is invisible.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Naruto.

123.5.name: Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto
123.5.description: The Team 7 faces Orochimaru in the Tenchi Bridge and Naruto enrages as he starts to think about Sasuke's dark path. With three tails released, Naruto has an explosive chakra and no control over his own actions.

skills.skillDescription: Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto gains 5 points of reduction and targets all enemies permanently. Everytime an enemy uses a new harmful skill, Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn. This skill is permanent, cannot be used while in effect and stacks.
Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, their strategic skills will cost 1 additional random. This skill can only be used if 'Three-Tails Chakra Release' is actived.
Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill can only be used if 'Three-Tails Chakra Release' is actived.
This skill makes Three Tails Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 3 battles in a row with Kabuto.
Win 3 battles in a row with Orochimaru.
Win 3 battles in a row with Yamato.
Win 3 battles in a row with Sakura.
Win 3 battles in a row with Sai.
Win 5 battles in a row with Naruto.

123.6.name: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto
123.6.description: Naruto, after giving into his rage and manifesting a fourth tail ceases to be himself. In this state Naruto(s) becomes a mindless being of rage and destruction but the price is his own life.

skills.skillDescription: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction and 15 points of destructible defense permanently. He takes 5 affliction damage* each turn. He ignores healing effects and enemy stun effects. Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto can use 'Shockwave Smash' and 'Compressed Chakra Blast' while this skill is active. This skill becomes 'Enrage' permanently. This skill cannot be removed.
All enemies take 20 damage. This skill may only be used during Four Tails Transformation and cannot be countered or reflected.
Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill may only be used during Four Tails Transformation and cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Four Tails Kyuubi Naruto takes 10 affliction damage*. For 2 turns, 'Shockwave Smash' will deal 5 additional damage and 'Compressed Chakra Blast' will cost 1 random energy less.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Yamato.
Win 5 battles in a row with Naruto.
Win 6 battles in a row with Orochimaru.

123.7.name: Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto
123.7.description: During his battle against Pain, Naruto lost control over his Kyuubi chakra after being subdued and seeing Hinata get extremely hurt. With six tails released, Naruto's physical power and destructive rage is insanely raised as the battle goes to its climax.

skills.skillDescription: Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto makes one enemy ignore all helpful effects for 1 turn and then deals 20 piercing damage to them. Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto takes 10 affliction damage*.
Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them deal 5 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto takes 5 affliction damage*.

Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto deals 20 damage to one enemy then stuns their physical skills for 2 turns. This skill deals 10 additional damage for every 20 health Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto has lost. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Six Tails Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sennin Naruto.
Win 25 battles with Deva Path Pain.

124.name: Chiriku
124.description: Chiriku is a ninja monk from the Fire Temple. He was once part of the Twelve Guardian Ninja, when he developed a strong friendship with Sarutobi Asuma.

skills.skillDescription: Chiriku deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.
Chiriku gains 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. During this time, any enemy who uses a new non-mental skill on him will be dealt 15 damage. This skill is invisible.
Chiriku targets himself or an ally for 1 turn. All harmful skills used on them will be countered and the countered enemies will take 40 damage. This skill is invisible.

Chiriku heals himself for 20 health and then gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 3 turns. During this time 'Thousand-Armed Murder Assault' will deal 10 additional damage and Chiriku's skills will have 1 less turn of cooldown.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Asuma.

124.2.name: Sora
124.2.description: Sora is a monk in training from the Land of Fire's Fire Temple. He is a pseudo-jinchuuriki of Kurama, whose chakra was implanted in Sora's body by his own father, Kazuma.

skills.skillDescription: Sora deals 20 damage to an enemy. If that target is affected by 'Beast Tearing Palm Counter', it will trigger their secondary effects.

Sora targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy is affected by 'Claw Swipe', they will lose 1 random energy. The next turn, if that target uses a new harmful skill, it will be countered and for 2 turns, that enemy will ignore all helpful effects. This skill is invisible.
Sora targets one enemy, stunning their physical skills for 1 turn. For the rest of this turn, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from physical skills and will ignore all helpful effects.
This skill makes Sora invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Chiriku.

124.3.name: Guren
124.3.description: Guren is a kunoichi from Otogakure and the leader of a group of Orochimaru's subordinates. She possesses the unique Crystal Release Kekkei Genkai.

skills.skillDescription: Guren deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. The following turn, that enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Crystal Barrage'. After this skill is used, it will be replaced by 'Crystal Barrage'.

For 2 turns, one enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and all helpful counters and reflect skills on them will be ignored. For 1 turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Crystal Break'.
Guren targets herself for 2 turns, countering the first harmful skill used against her and dealing 20 piercing damage to the countered enemy. This skill is invisible and ends when triggered.
This skill makes Guren invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Guren deals 25 damage to all enemies. After this skill is used, it will be replaced by 'Crystal Dragon'.
Guren deals 25 piercing damage to the enemy affected by 'Crystal Prison'.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Sound Ninja.

124.5.name: Mecha Naruto
124.5.description: Mecha Naruto is a mechanized replica of Uzumaki Naruto; it is a mindless savage, attacking everything in its path. As a machine, he can manipulate his body in a variety of manners, even assuming a three-tailed form of its own.

skills.skillDescription: For 3 turns, Mecha Naruto will deal 10 piercing damage to all enemies and if they use a new skill, they will receive 5 piercing damage. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Pinpoint'.
Mecha Naruto attacks all enemies for 3 turns dealing 10 piercing damage to them each turn that they does not use a new skill. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Drill Run'.

Mecha Naruto instantly killing one enemy at 50 or less health. Afterwards, Mecha Naruto will die. This skill cannot be countered, reflected and ignores invulnerability. The self death effect of this skill cannot be ignored.

Mecha Naruto will ignore all non-damage effects except energy cost changes and will deal 15 more non-conditional damage with his skills permanently. This skill can only be used once and can only be used when Mecha Naruto has 40 or less health.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Mecha Naruto stuns one enemy in non-strategic skills and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The turn this skill is used, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from damaging skills.
Mecha Naruto attacks one enemy, dealing 25 piercing damage to them and stunning them for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Naruto.
Win 40 battles with any Konoha 11 Ninja.

124.6.name: Satori
124.6.description: Satori is a demonic bird-like creature that has existed since the time of Rikudou Sennin. It's a puppet of the Box of Ultimate Bliss that can shoot its feathers and giant spheres at high speeds which have powerful piercing and explosive power.

skills.skillDescription: Satori targets all characters permanently. They will ignore all friendly damage reduction and invulnerabilities on them. During this time, this skill can be used again to deal 10 piercing damage to all enemies and heal Satori and its allies by 10 health. This skill ends when Satori dies.

Satori targets all characters, dealing 5 damage to them permanently. During this time, this skill can be used again to deal 15 damage to all enemies and make them ignore healing effects for 1 turn. This skill ends when Satori dies.

Satori deals 50 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Giant Sphere' will permanently deal 15 less damage and will cost 1 less random energy. These effects stack but are only applied on the first 2 usages of this skill.
For 1 turn, Satori will ignore all harmful effects.

125.name: Kisame Body Double
125.description: By using one of Pain's techniques a Sand Nin spy for Akatsuki is changed to look like Kisame. The body double is controlled by Kisame but only has a third of his chakra.

skills.skillDescription: For 4 turns, Kisame Body Double and his allies will lose 1 less energy if a energy removal or stealing skill is used on them. For 4 turns, all enemies who use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 2 turns. During this time, 'Water Prison Technique' and 'Five Man-Eating Sharks' will be improved and this skill will be replaced by 'Sentient Water Disabling'.

Kisame Body Double deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills also for 1 turn. During this time, Kisame Body Double gains 15 points of damage reduction. During ‘Explosive Water Shock Wave’, this skill costs 1 random energy instead.
Kisame Body Double deals 25 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During 'Explosive Water Shock Wave', this skill costs 1 random energy less.
This skill makes Kisame Body Double invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Kisame Body Double targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, the first harmful non-mental skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will have 'Water Prison Technique' applied on them. This skill is invisible.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Hoshigaki Kisame.

125.5.name: Itachi Body Double
125.5.description: By using one of Pain's techniques a Sand Nin spy for Akatsuki is changed to look like Itachi. The body double is controlled by Itachi but only has a third of his chakra.

skills.skillDescription: Itachi Body Double (S) targets one enemy. If the affected enemy uses a new offensive skill, that skill will be countered, that enemy will take 10 damage, and Itachi Body Double (S) will gain 1 genjutsu energy. The target of this skill is invisible.
For 2 turns, if any enemy uses a non-mental skill on Itachi Body Double (S), he will reflect that skill onto the enemy who used it. This skill is invisible.
Itachi Body Double (S) attacks, dealing 20 damage to one enemy. The following turn, all enemies take an additional 10 affliction damage.*
This skill makes Itachi Body Double (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Uchiha Itachi.

126.name: Deidara
126.description: A former ninja of the Earth Village and now a junior Akatsuki member, Deidara(s) is able to fuse clay and chakra to create devastating explosives.

skills.skillDescription: Deidara deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this skill Deidara will be invulnerable to mental skills and this enemy's energy skills will deal 10 less damage*. 'Art is a Bang!' will deal 5 additional damage permanently*. This effect stacks.

Deidara deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn Deidara will be invulnerable to energy skills and this enemy's physical skills will deal 10 less damage. 'Art is a Bang!' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.
Deidara deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies. Deidara will instantly die after this skill is used. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and its self-death effect cannot be ignored.

Deidara gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This effect stacks. The first time this skill is used, it replaces 'C1: Birds' and 'C1: Centipede' with their alternative versions. The second time this skill is used Deidara's skills will revert back to their original versions.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Deidara deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn Deidara will be invulnerable to physical skills and this enemy's mental skills will deal 10 less damage. 'Art is a Bang!' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This effect stacks.

For 2 turns, all enemies will take 10 piercing damage if they use a new skill. During this time they will take 5 additional damage from energy skills and 'Clay Mold' will grant 10 additional destructible defense.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Gaara.
Win 20 battles with Uchiha Itachi or Hoshigaki Kisame.

126.5.name: Hiruko Sasori
126.5.description: Hiruko is a puppet used by the Akatsuki shinobi, Sasori. Serving as a 'puppet armor ', it allowed Sasori to hide inside of it. Hiruko is a human puppet made from the corpse of a renowned shinobi - this puppet is also Sasori's favorite.

skills.skillDescription: Hiruko Sasori deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

For 1 turn, Hiruko Sasori will ignore all enemy damage dealt. Every enemy that use a new non-strategic skill on him during this time will take 10 affliction damage permanently. This skill stacks and ends when Hiruko Sasori dies. This skill is invisible.

Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy afflictions on him then becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction skills for 3 turns. During this time, 'Poisonous Tail Stab' will be replaced by 'Eight Waves of Needles' and 'Sand Clone Trap' will be replaced by 'Prosthetic Arm Senbon'.
This skill makes Hiruko Sasori invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy afflictions on his team and then deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies each turn permanently. This skill stacks.

Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy afflictions on his team and then deals 5 piercing damage and 5 affliction damage* to all enemies for 3 turns. When this skill ends, Hiruko Sasori will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ends if Hiruko Sasori dies.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Deidara.
Win 30 battles with Sakura or Chiyo.

127.name: Sasori of the Red Sand
127.description: Sasori is a senior Akatsuki member and a legendary puppet master. He is even rumored to have defeated an entire nation with puppets alone. Original Design: Pavera

skills.skillDescription: Using this skill, Sasori of the Red Sand deals 10 damage to an enemy for 2 turns and gains 5 points of destructible defense each turn. If 'Poison Gas' is used on the target in the following turn, it will last 1 additional turn. The target of this skill will take 5 more affliction damage from 'Poison Gas' for 1 turn.

Sasori of the Red Sand deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies for 3 turns and gains 5 points of destructible defense. During this time, if an affected enemy uses a new skill, they will be dealt 5 affliction damage. This skill lasts 1 additional turn on an enemy affected by ‘Thousand Hands’. This skill stacks.

Sasori of the Red Sand uses this skill for 3 turns. Each turn, Sasori of the Red Sand gains 5 points of destructible defense. Each time a new harmful skill is used on Sasori of the Red Sand, the user of that skill will take 5 piercing damage. During this time, this skill will become 'Iron Sand Gathering Assault' and 'Thousand Hands' will become 'Iron Forest'.
This skill makes Sasori of the Red Sand invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: This skill deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. The target of this skill will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. Sasori of the Red Sand also gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.
This skill deals 25 piercing damage to all enemies. If an enemy's health falls to 10 or lower, they will be killed. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sakura.
Win 6 battles in a row with any Puppet User.
Win 25 battles with any Puppet User.

127.5.name: Puppet Sasori
127.5.description: Sasori's true form is a puppet body with a living core attached to it. In this form, he can use weapons like a flamethrower and water jets, while still controling a hundred puppets.

skills.skillDescription: Puppet Sasori deals 20 affliction damage to an enemy. If used after 'Water Stream Shooters', this skill will reduce that target's non-afflliction damage by 10 for 1 turn.
Puppet Sasori deals 20 piercing damage to an enemy. If used after 'Flamethrower', this skill will stun that target's skills for 1 turn.

For 3 turns, Puppet Sasori's other skills will deal extra 10 damage, and during this time, anytime an enemy uses a new harmful skill, they'll suffer 5 piercing damage. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Puppet Attack'.
This skill makes Puppet Sasori invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Puppet Sasori deals 25 damage to all enemies.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Puppet User.
Win 40 battles with any Puppet User.

128.name: Hidan
128.description: Hidan is a member of Akatsuki and a worshiper of the obscure god Jashin. He is apparently immortal and has perhaps the foulest mouth of the entire criminal organization.

skills.skillDescription: Hidan heals himself for 10 health and gains 1 random energy. This skill becomes 'Curse of Jashin' permanently after used.

Hidan deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will steal 10 health from one enemy instead. This skill ignores invulnerability.
Hidan will be unable to be killed for 1 turn. During 'Curse of Jashin' this skill lasts 2 turns instead.
This skill makes Hidan invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, Hidan will be healed for 10 health everytime he is targeted by a new harmful non-strategic skill, before being affected by it. This skill becomes 'Impale' permanently after used.
Hidan deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. Hidan takes 10 affliction damage*. This skill cannot kill Hidan and ignores invulnerability.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Akatsuki Member.
Win 20 battles with any Akatsuki Member.

129.name: Kakuzu
129.description: A missing-nin of mysterious talents and a member of Akatsuki, Kakuzu(s) is certainly older than he appears. He seems to only be concerned with money and the bounties which provide him with it.

skills.skillDescription: Kakuzu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes ‘Katon Zukokku’ permanently after used.

Kakuzu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. This enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage until the next time they use a new harmful skill. This skill becomes ‘Inferno Gust’ after being used. This skill cannot stack.
Kakuzu targets one enemy, stealing 25 health from them. If that enemy dies, Kakuzu will heal himself for 20 health.
This skill makes Kakuzu invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Kakuzu deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. This skill becomes 'Fuuton Atsugai' permanently after used.
Kakuzu deals 40 damage to one enemy, and 20 damage to all other enemies. This skill becomes 'Raiton Gian' permanently after used.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Hidan.

129.5.name: True Form Kakuzu
129.5.description: Kakuzu's real body is made of rag and when he releases it, his offensive power is increased by a huge amount. In this form, Kakuzu appears to be a monster who will pierce everything in its path.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, all enemies' skills will cost 1 additional random energy and True Form Kakuzu's and his allies' skills will cost 1 less random energy.
True Form Kakuzu deals 50 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be reflected.

True Form Kakuzu targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable and all new harmful skills used on True Form Kakuzu will be reflected to them. For 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Piercing Tendrils'.
This skill makes True Form Kakuzu invulnerable for 1 turn. If this skill is used one turn after 'Earth Grudge Fear', True Form Kakuzu will also gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: True Form Kakuzu targets the enemy affected by 'Heart Link', dealing 20 piercing damage to them.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Kakuzu.

130.name: Hoshigaki Kisame (S)
130.description: Hoshigake Kisame (S) is the partner of Uchiha Itachi in Akatsuki. He is an expert swordsman and missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village.

skills.skillDescription: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) ends 'Samehada Fusion' and becomes invulnerable to non-energy skills for 3 turns. During this time, any enemy who uses a new energy skill on him will take 10 additional damage from 'Samehada Frenzy' permanently. This effect stacks. This skill will be replaced by 'Samehada Frenzy' permanently after used.

HHoshigaki Kisame (S) targets one enemy. After 3 turns, they will take 45 piercing damage and the other enemies will take 30 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. During this time, whenever they use a new energy skill, Hoshigaki Kisame (S) will gain 1 random energy. This skill is invisible.

Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy and ends 'Samehada Interception' on himself. For the rest of the game, if a new energy drain or removal skill is used on him, he will gain 1 random energy. This skill becomes 'Water Prison Shark Dance' permanently after used.

This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. For 3 turns this skill can be used again to instead give Hoshigaki Kisame (S) 2 random energies and then kill him instantly. This self-death effect cannot be ignored.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy and deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, Hoshigaki Kisame (S) will gain 1 random energy.

Hoshigaki Kisame (S) gains 1 random energy. For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will take 10 damage. During this time, their energy skills will deal 15 less damage and cost 1 additional random energy.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Team 9 member.
Win 5 battles in a row with Hoshigaki Kisame.

131.name: Uchiha Itachi (S)
131.description: Uchiha Itachi (S) is a member of Akatsuki, and the brother of Uchiha Sasuke. He has mastered the sharingan completely.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Itachi (S) actives this skill, taking 10 affliction damage*. His skills become their alternate versions and he gains 5 permanent stacking destructible defense each turn. If used again, his skills return to their original versions and he loses all destructible defense from this skill.
Uchiha Itachi (S) attacks, dealing 20 affliction damage to one enemy for 2 turns. This skill becomes ‘Totsuka Sword’ during ‘Susanoo Activation’.

Uchiha Itachi (S) places a genjutsu on one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy use a new skill, their skills will be stunned for 2 turns. This skill is invisible and becomes ‘Yata Mirror’ during 'Susanoo Activation'.
This skill makes Uchiha Itachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Uchiha Itachi (S) uses this skill, dealing 30 piercing damage to one enemy and removing 1 random energy from them.
Using this skill, any enemy that uses a new skill on Uchiha Itachi (S) will be countered and have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn.* This skill is invisible.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Ninja of Team Hebi.
Win 5 battles in a row with Uchiha Itachi.

131.2.name: Biwa Juuzou
131.2.description: Juuzou was a jounin of the Hidden Mist Village and one of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist. Previous partner of Itachi in Akatsuki, Juuzou wields the Executioner's Blade, that can regenerate from the iron harvested from its victim's blood.

skills.skillDescription: Biwa Juuzou targets all enemies, removing all active control skills on them. For 1 turn, their invulnerability skills will last 1 turn less. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 white energy instead.
Biwa Juuzou steals 15 health from one enemy and makes his team ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 red energy instead.
Biwa Juuzou deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 green energy instead.

Biwa Juuzou gains 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, all his other skills will be replaced by 'Executioner's Blade Execution'. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 blue energy instead. This skill is invisible.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Biwa Juuzou targets one enemy. If that enemy's health is at 75 or less, they will be instantly killed.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Yagura.
Win 5 battles in a row with Itachi.

131.5.name: Yahiko
131.5.description: Yahiko was a shinobi from the Hidden Rain Village and the leader of the original Akatsuki organization. Alongside his fellow war orphans, Nagato and Konan, he founded and led Akatsuki in an attempt to bring piece.

skills.skillDescription: Yahiko targets himself and his allies for the rest of the game. If an ally uses a new friendly skill, Yahiko's skills will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn. If Yahiko dies, his allies will permanently deal 5 additional non-affliction damage. This skill will be replaced by 'Eye for an Eye' permanently after used.
Yahiko deals 20 damage to one enemy. During 'Water Release: Water Pillar' this skill will cost 1 additional random energy and will target all enemies instead.
Yahiko makes one random member of his team invulnerable for 1 turn and gains 1 stack of this skill. At 4 stacks, this skill will also deal 30 damage to all enemies and all stacks will be removed.

Yahiko targets himself and one enemy, making both invulnerable to harmful skills for 1 turn. During this time, that enemy's skills will be replaced by 'Brutalize or Die' and if they don't use a new skill, they will take 20 damage.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Yahiko targets himself and one ally for 1 turn. If that ally uses a new friendly skill, Yahiko's skills will deal 5 additional damage for 1 turn. If Yahiko dies, that ally will permanently deal 5 additional non-affliction damage.
This character takes 30 affliction damage* and deals 25 damage to one random enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with any Legendary Sannin.
Win 25 battles with any Legendary Sannin.

132.name: Konan
132.description: Konan is a member of Akatsuki and a master of origami ninjutsu, earning her the title God's Angel in Amegakure. Able to turn her body into thick sheets of paper, she is capable of multiple forms of attack.

skills.skillDescription: Konan deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy.

Konan targets one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy has their skills stunned, they are invulnerable to all new friendly skills, and they take 15 damage each turn. During this time, 'Paper Cut' will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy.
Konan attacks dealing 25 damage to one enemy and 25 damage to a random different enemy.
This skill makes Konan invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 30 battles with any Akatsuki Member.

133.name: Konan of the Rain
133.description: Konan of the Rain has returned to the Hidden Rain village. Now that Uzumaki Nagato is dead she is aligned with Uzumaki Naruto and his quest for peace.

skills.skillDescription: Konan of the Rain targets an enemy, dealing 35 piercing damage to them. Konan of the Rain will ignore stun effects for 1 turn when this skill is used.

Konan of the Rain activates this skill, granting all allies 10 points of damage reduction for 3 turns. For 3 turns, all enemies that use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 1 turn.
Konan of the Rain targets an enemy with explosive tags which detonate upon impact, dealing 20 damage to one enemy. This skill becomes ‘Paper Shurikens’ for 1 turn.
This skill makes Konan of the Rain invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Konan of the Rain attacks, dealing 20 piercing damage to one enemy. ‘Explosive Tags’ will deal an additional 10 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks. This skill becomes ‘Explosive Tags’ permanently when used.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Konan.
Win 5 battles in a row with any Akatsuki Member.
Win 30 battles with any Akatsuki Member.

134.name: Uzumaki Nagato
134.description: Uzumaki Nagato is the leader of Akatsuki and is also known as Pain. He is in control of the six paths of Pain and was a former student of Jiraiya. Nagato possess the rinnegan and may be the strongest ninja in the shinobi world.

skills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Nagato deals 20 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, Uzumaki Nagato will become invulnerable to physical, energy and strategic skills. The following turn ‘Etheral Dragon’ will deal an additional 10 damage to any enemy affected by this skill.
Uzumaki Nagato deals 20 damage to one enemy. If the health of the target of this skill drops to 35 or below after this skill is used on them, then their skills will be stunned for 1 turn.
Uzumaki Nagato uses this to revive all dead allies. Allies revived by this skill will have 50 health, Uzumaki Nagato will die once this skill is used. This skill cannot be countered.
This skill makes Uzumaki Nagato invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Konan.

135.name: Animal Path Pain
135.description: Animal Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This Path is able to summon a variety of different beasts for different purposes.

skills.skillDescription: Animal Path Pain deals 30 damage to one enemy. The following 2 turns, any enemy that uses a skill will be dealt 15 piercing damage and Animal Path Pain's team will be grant 5 points of damage reduction.
Animal Path Pain deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns.
Animal Path Pain targets himself or one ally, making them ignore stun effects and gain 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns.
This skill makes Animal Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with any Akatsuki Member.
Win 5 battles in a row with Konan.

135.5.name: Female Animal Path Pain
135.5.description: During his fight against Jiraiya, Nagato lost the Animal Path of Pain. He needed another body to recreate it and found it on a girl from the Hidden Rain Village named Ajisai.

skills.skillDescription: Female Animal Path Pain deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, Female Animal Path Pain will gain 15 points of damage reduction and 'Summoning: Rhino' will cost 1 random energy instead.
Female Animal Path Pain deals 20 damage to an enemy. This enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Summoning: Ox', deals 10 additional damage to this enemy.
Female Animal Path Pain makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Female Animal Path Pain will gain 10 unpierceable damage reduction and ignore all stun effects.
This skill makes Female Animal Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Path Pain.

136.name: Asura Path Pain
136.description: Asura Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. His body style is similar to a puppet filled with hidden weapons.

skills.skillDescription: Asura Path Pain deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, the first harmful energy, mental or strategic skill used on Asura Path Pain will be countered.

Asura Path Pain deals 30 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, the first harmful physical or affliction-only skill used on Asura Path Pain will be countered. This skill becomes 'Flaming Arrow of Amazing Ability' for 1 turn after used.

For 2 turns, Asura Path Pain will gain 25 points of destructible defense, will ignore healing effects, his skills will have no cost and if used, they will deal 15 affliction damage* to him (that cannot kill him) for every random energy they originally cost.
This skill makes Asura Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Asura Path Pain destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 45 damage to them.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Animal Path Pain.

137.name: Human Path Pain
137.description: Human Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This path is a mind reader and gathers intel for the other paths.

skills.skillDescription: Human Path Pain deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. 'Sneak Attack' will be unable to be used for 1 turn.
Human Path Pain targets an enemy affected by ‘Mind Invasion’. That enemy receives 40 piercing damage. If that enemy's health drops to 10 or less, they will be killed.
Human Path Pain attacks, dealing 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.
This skill makes Human Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Animal Path Pain.

138.name: Naraka Path Pain
138.description: Naraka Path Pain is one of the six path's of Pain. This path is able to interrogate it's enemies at will. Naraka Path Pain can also give life as well as take it.

skills.skillDescription: Naraka Path Pain gains 10 points of damage reduction and deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies for 3 turns. ‘Judgement’ can be used during this time and will deal 5 additional damage to any enemy affected by this skill.

While ‘Outer Path’ is being used, Naraka Path Pain targets one enemy. That enemy will take 20 damage and will ignore healing effects for 1 turn. If their health drops to 5 or below, they will be instantly killed.
Naraka Path Pain repairs any damage on one ally or himself, healing the target for 25 health.
This skill makes Naraka Path Pain invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Preta Path Pain.

139.name: Preta Path Pain
139.description: Preta Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This path is able to nulify jutsus and is used mostly for defensive tactics.

skills.skillDescription: Preta Path Pain deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. If 'Blocking Technique Absorption Seal' is active on this enemy, this skill will steal 1 random energy from them instead.

Preta Path Pain targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful energy or affliction-only skills used on them for 1 turn. All countered enemies will take 10 additional damage from 'Chakra-Removing Grab' permanently. This skill stacks and is invisible.

Preta Path Pain targets one enemy permanently, making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and reducing their non-affliction damage by 10. This skill ends if Preta Path Pain or the target enemy die or if Preta Path Pain uses any new skill.
This skill makes Preta Path Pain invulnerable for one turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Human Path Pain.

140.name: Deva Path Pain
140.description: Deva Path Pain is one of the six path's of Pain. This path is able to use itself as the epicenter of magnetism to attract or repel all objects. This path holds the most power and is the main force in battle for Pain.

skills.skillDescription: Deva Path Pain targets one enemy, dealing 15 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random energy.

For 3 turns, all enemies will take 10 piercing damage each turn that they do not use a new skill. First turn, they deal 10 less non-affliction damage. Second turn, they deal 15 less non-affliction damage. Third turn, they are stunned, and this skill is replaced by ‘Chibaku Tensei’ permanently. This skill cannot be reflected.

For 1 turn, Deva Path Pain will counter the first enemy skill used on him. The countered enemy will receive 25 damage, and for 2 turns, that enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage. This skill is invisible.

The first enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Deva Path Pain will take 10 piercing damage, make Deva Path Pain invulnerable, and this skill will end. While active, this skill will deal 10 additional damage each turn, stacking to a maximum of 40, and it cannot be used again. When triggered, this skill cannot be used for 3 turns. This skill is invisible.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Deva Path Pain deals 30 damage to all enemies. This skill becomes ‘Chibaku Tensei Charge’ when used. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

mission: Win 10 battles with Naruto or Jiraiya.
Win 20 battles with any Path Pain.
Win 5 battles in a row with Any Path Pain.

141.name: White Zetsu
141.description: White Zetsu is half of the Akatsuki member known as Zetsu. He was one of the first victims of Kaguya's Infinite Tsukuyomi. This Zetsu is capable of having hundreds of clones of himself and also copying his enemies' faces and abilities.

skills.skillDescription: White Zetsu targets one ally or himself. For 2 turns, the target of this skill will gain 1 red energy and ignore drain and stun effects.
White Zetsu attacks, dealing 30 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.
White Zetsu targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill, White Zetsu will copy it for 4 turns. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes White Zetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 50 battles with any Akatsuki Member.

141.5.name: Black Zetsu
141.5.description: Black Zetsu is the physical manifestation of Ootsutsuki Kaguya's will. To further its plans, it posed as Uchiha Madara's manifested will and then partnered with White Zetsu to become the Akatsuki member known simply as Zetsu.

skills.skillDescription: Black Zetsu targets one enemy until Black Zetsu himself dies. Everytime that enemy uses a new skill, they will have their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn and the skill they used will replace 'Body Coating' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.
Black Zetsu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their non-strategic skills for 1 turn.
Black Zetsu targets himself and his allies. For 1 turn, they will have 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all non-damage harmful effects. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Black Zetsu invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with White Zetsu.

142.name: Tobi
142.description: Not much is known about Tobi other than he appears to be a member of the Uchiha clan.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, Tobi will be unable to be killed and 'Kamui' will deal 20 additional damage. He targets one ally or himself and for 1 turn, every enemy who uses a new skill on the target will be dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.
Tobi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from mental skills.
Tobi targets one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, this enemy will take 10 additional damage from mental skills and everytime they use a new skill, they will take 20 piercing damage.
This skill makes Tobi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 30 battles with any Akatsuki Member.
Win 6 battles in a row with any Akatsuki Member.

142.5.name: Akatsuki Sasuke
142.5.description: After his fight against Itachi, Sasuke decides to take Tobi's advice and enter Akatsuki in order to get help to destroy the Hidden Leaf Village. In exchange, he will hunt the remaining bijuus along with his Taka teammaters.

skills.skillDescription: Akatsuki Sasuke deal 10 affliction damage to one random enemy. This skill will deal 10 additional damage each time. During 'Mangekyou Mastery' this skill is altered to target one enemy instead of a random enemy. This skill stacks.
For 2 turns, 'Uncontrolled Amaterasu' is altered to target one enemy instead of a random enemy. Akatsuki Sasuke will gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense.
Akatsuki Sasuke targets one enemy stunning their skills for 1 turn. For 2 turns this enemy will take 10 additional damage from affliction-only skills.
This skill makes Akatsuki Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sasuke.

143.name: Edo Tensei Asuma
143.description: Asuma was revived by Kabuto in order to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War. He is sent to fight the First Division and faces his former students as he tries to teach them one final lesson.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Asuma targets all enemies making them unable to use counter skills (this is a stun effect) and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. The following turn, they will take 15 additional affliction damage from 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.
Edo Tensei Asuma deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to non-physical skills for 1 turn.

Edo Tensei Asuma deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 3 turns they will take 5 additional affliction damage from 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite' and 'Ash Pile Burning' will last 1 additional turn on them. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Asuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Asuma.

143.3.name: Edo Tensei Dan
143.3.description: Kato Dan is the former lover of Tsunade and also Shizune's uncle. He was reincarnated by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War, wherein he would be put to use his physical skills and his own special techniques against those of his village.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Dan deals 10 damage to one enemy. The following turn, 'Rapid Kick' will deal 15 affliction damage to Edo Tensei Dan if used.*
For 1 turn, Edo Tensei Dan will ignore all enemy damage dealt. The following turn, 'Spirit Transformation Technique' will deal 15 affliction damage to Edo Tensei Dan if used.*

Edo Tensei Dan targets an enemy or an ally. If used on an enemy, they will take 10 damage. If used on an ally, they will be healed for 10 health. This skill deals 5 additional damage and heals 5 additional health for every 15 health Edo Tensei Dan has lost. This skill becomes 'Spirit World' for 1 turn after used.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Dan invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Dan targets one character affected by 'Spirit Travelling', stunning them and making them invulnerable to further harmful and helpful skills for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Tsunade.
Win 15 battles with any Edo Tensei.

143.4.name: Edo Tensei Hizashi
143.4.description: Hizashi is a member of a Hyuuga Clan's branch house, Hiashi's twin brother and Neji's father. At some point in Hizashi's life, he was branded with the clan's curse seal that would ensure his lifelong service to the main branch and that would seal his Byakugan when he died. He was reincarnated by Yakushi Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War.

skills.skillDescription: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Hizashi will lose 1 less energy if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him, will gain 5 points of damage reduction, his skills will deal 5 additional damage and they will do their alternate effects.

Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. Alternate: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy, removes 1 random energy from them, and stuns them for 1 turn.

This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or on an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn and will counter all harmful skills used on him the next turn. If used on an enemy, they will take 15 damage and Edo Tensei Hizashi will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. Alternate: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 15 damage to one enemy and gains 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, all new harmful skills used on Edo Tensei Hizashi will be countered. This skill is invisible.

This skill makes Edo Tensei Hizashi invulnerable for 1 turn. Alternate: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will become invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, reduces their damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Hyuuga Hiashi.

143.6.name: Edo Tensei Shin
143.6.description: Shin is an orphan from the Hidden Leaf Village who was recruited into the Root Division of the village's Anbu and then became Sai's adoptive brother. Although carrying a disease, Shin was very capable in battle. He was reincarnated by Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Shin deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Implanted Bomb' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks, ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.
Edo Tensei Shin targets one ally. For 3 turns, all harmful skills used on this ally will be reflected to Edo Tensei Shin.

Edo Tensei Shin targets one enemy permanently. Once Edo Tensei Shin dies, that enemy will take 45 affliction damage. This skill cannot be removed and becomes 'Intended Impure Vanishing' permanently after used.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Shin invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Shin takes 20 affliction damage* and gains 1 random energy. 'Implanted Bomb' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Sai.
Win 25 battles with any Konoha Anbu Ninja.

143.8.name: Edo Tensei Hayate
143.8.description: During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Hayate was brought back to life by Yakushi Kabuto. Hayate faces his former lover, Yugao, as he is controlled against his will and is obligated to fight her.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hayate deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy.

The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Straight Slash'. During this time, everytime Edo Tensei Hayate is affected by a new harmful skill, 'Straight Slash' will deal 10 additional damage for 3 turns and Edo Tensei Hayate will heal 10 health before being affected by that new harmful skill.
Edo Tensei Hayate targets one enemy. If this enemy's health is at 35 or below, they will be instantly killed. This skill ignores invulnerability.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Hayate invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hayate deals 10 damage to one enemy and stuns their skills.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Yugao.

143.9.name: Edo Tensei Torune
143.9.description: Torune was killed by Tobi and Kabuto as they decided to use him as a guinea pig for the Impure World Reincarnation technique. Later on the war, Kabuto decided to use another body to bring Torune back, aiming to use his special techniques against the forces of the Allied Shinobi Forces.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Torune applies 1 Venom Beetle on one enemy and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. While he still has this destructible defense up, he can use this skill again for 1 random energy to apply 1 Venom Beetle on one enemy. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 1 Venom Beetle applied on them.

Edo Tensei Torune applies 1 Venom Beetle on all enemies and gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. While he still has this destructible defense up, he can use this skill again for 2 random energies to apply 1 Venom Beetle on all enemies. The enemy that destroys this destructible defense has 1 Venom Beetle applied on them.
Edo Tensei Torune targets all enemies, removing 1 random energy from them for each Venom Beetle on them.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: This skill deals 5 affliction damage to the target for 5 turns.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Torune.
Win 5 battles in a row with Aburame Shino (S).

144.name: Edo Tensei Ginkaku
144.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku is one half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Ginkaku deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. Damage ‘Benihisago’, 'Bashosen' and 'Bashosen Flames' deals to that enemy will be increased by 5 permanently. This effect stacks.

Edo Tensei Ginkaku targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage to them and stunning their physical, affliction and strategic skills for 1 turn. ‘Benihisago’, 'Bashosen' and 'Bashosen Flames' will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy permanently. This effect stacks.
Edo Tensei Ginkaku deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. ‘Benihisago’ and 'Bashosen Flames' will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently
This skill makes Edo Tensei Ginkaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 15 battles with Edo Tensei Ninja.

145.name: Edo Tensei Kinkaku
145.description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku is the other half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Kinkaku uses this skill. One enemy will take 25 affliction damage and Edo Tensei Kinkaku will gain 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn when this skill is used. ‘Benihisago’ will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

Edo Tensei Kinkaku targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new offensive skill the following turn, that skill will be countered, and that enemy will be dealt 35 damage. 'Benihisago’ will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.
Edo Tensei Kinkaku attacks, dealing 20 damage to all enemies. 'Benihisago’ will deal an additional 5 damage to all targets of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Kinkaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Edo Tensei Ginkaku.
Win 20 battles with Edo Tensei Ginkaku.

145.5.name: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku
145.5.description: Kinkaku possesses chakra traces of the Nine-Tais mixed in due to him and his brother being swallowed and regurgitated by the Nine-Tails after surviving two weeks inside its stomach by eating some of its chakra-imbued flash.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku deals 30 damage to one enemy and heals himself for 10 health.
Permanently, 'Burning Tail Slam' will deal 5 additional damage after each time it is used. During this time, Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku can use this skill again to gain 1 random energy.

Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku gains 5 points of damage reduction permanently. He will gain 5 points of damage reduction permanently everytime he is targeted by a new non-strategic harmful skill. This skill stacks and cannot be used while active.

For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 5 less physical and energy damage and all new harmful skills used on Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku's allies will be reflected to him. This skill ignores invulnerability and ends when Edo Tensei Kyuubi Kinkaku dies.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Edo Tensei Kinkaku.
Win 30 battles with Edo Tensei Kinkaku.

146.name: Edo Tensei Pakura
146.description: Edo Tensei Pakura was a reviled Shinobi of the Hidden Sand in the past. So much so that she was revived against her will to participate in the fourth shinobi world war.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Pakura targets one enemy, dealing 20 affliction damage to them. The following 2 turns, if any enemy uses a skill on Edo Tensei Pakura, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage.
Edo Tensei Pakura targets an enemy, dealing 20 affliction damage for 2 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.
This skill deals 40 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, 'Scorch Release' will cost 1 random energy instead.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Pakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: The Kind Kunoichi of the Past
Win 5 battles in a row with Maki.

147.name: Edo Tensei Gari
147.description: Edo Tensei Gari is a former member of the Hidden Rock Village's explosives corps. Edo Tensei Gari has been summoned to do battle in the fourth great ninja war and he seems to be enjoying himself.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Gari deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from affliction-only skills. Edo Tensei Gari gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill stacks.

Edo Tensei Gari deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, that enemy will take 5 affliction damage each following turn and if they use a new non-conditional stun, energy removal, energy steal or energy gain skill they will lose 1 random energy. This skill stacks.

Edo Tensei Gari gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill can be used to deal 15 affliction damage to all enemies and then regrant its destructible defense. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Gari receives new non-affliction damage.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Gari invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kurotsuchi.
Win 5 battles in a row with Deidara.

148.name: Edo Tensei Fukai
148.description: Edo Tensei Fukai has been summoned using the edo tensei jutsu. He is powerless to stop himself from rampaging.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Fukai targets all enemies dealing 10 affliction damage. Continuous Tailed Beast Bomb and Jinchuuriki Telepathy will deal 5 more damage to all targets of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.
Edo Tensei Fukai deals 30 damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Fukai gains 5 unpiercable damage reduction permanently when this skill is used. This effect stacks.
Edo Tensei Fukai deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Fukai invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 20 battles with any Edo Tensei Ninja.

149.name: Edo Tensei Hanzo
149.description: Edo Tensei Hanzo has been summoned back from the dead in the middle of a battlefield and he is not happy about it. Edo Hanzo (S) will engage anyone that crosses his path as he did when he was alive.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hanzo targets one enemy, dealing 10 damage. That enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. ‘Poison Sickle’ will deal an additional 10 damage to an enemy affected by this skill.
