Edo Tensei Hanzo deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. That enemy will take 5 affliction damage permanently. This effect stacks.

Edo Tensei Hanzo uses this skill, dealing 25 affliction damage to all enemies. All allies will gain 20 destructible defense permanently. This skill becomes ‘Ibuse Toxic Mouth’ for 5 turns when it is used.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Hanzo invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hanzo deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. That enemy will lose 1 random energy.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Oboro or Shigure.
Win 6 battles in a row with Hanzo.

150.name: Edo Tensei Chiyo
150.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo has been summoned back from the afterlife. She may not like it but she will do her best to help her opponents out with information while she is forced to fight.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Chiyo targets one enemy stunning their physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. One random enemy will be dealt 20 damage for 2 turns.

Edo Tensei Chiyo targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a harmful skill it will be countered and will receive 20 damage while having their non-strategic skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.
Edo Tensei Chiyo targets one enemy dealing 20 damage. Edo Tensei Chiyo will ignore all non-damage effects for 1 turn when this skill is used.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Chiyo invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Chiyo.

151.name: Edo Tensei Chukichi
151.description: Edo Tensei Chukichi is back on the battlefield and he is being forced to combat his comrades against his will.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Chukichi will be invulnerable to enemy physical and affliction skills for 2 turns. Jamming Jutsu and Silent Assassination are improved during this skill.
For 2 turns Edo Tensei Chukichi targets all enemies increasing the cost of all their skills by 1 random energy. This skill costs 1 random energy during 'Hidden Frost'.

Edo Tensei Chukichi launches himself at one enemy dealing 30 piercing damage. The target of this skill will be unable to reduce damage or go invulnerable for 1 turn. During Hidden Frost this skill will deal an additional 10 damage and cost 1 random energy less.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Chukichi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 20 battles with any Mist Ninja.

152.name: Edo Tensei Toroi
152.description: Edo Tensei Toroi is back on the battlefield wreaking havoc as he goes. It will be a difficult situation for whoever may come across him.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Toroi targets one enemy dealing 20 damage. If an enemy uses a skill on Edo Tensei Toroi the following 2 turns they will ignore healing effects permanently. Magnetized Shuriken and Magnetic Current will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.
Edo Tensei Toroi gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. This skill become Magnetized Shuriken for 4 turns when used.
Edo Tensei Toroi targets all enemies dealing 15 damage. Magnetic Field and Magnetized Shuriken will deal an additional 5 damage to a target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Toroi invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Toroi targets one enemy dealing 10 piercing damage. Magnetic Field and Magnetic Current will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

mission: Win 50 battles with any Cloud Ninja.

153.5.name: Edo Tensei Chen
153.5.description: Chen was a jounin of the Hidden Leaf Village and a legendary taijutsu master. He was reincarnated by Kabuto to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War, wherein he faced Rock Lee, a ninja who reminded him of a former student he once had.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Chen deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For the following 2 turns, Edo Tensei Chen's non-conditional skills will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.
Edo Tensei Chen targets himself or an ally for 1 turn, countering the first harmful skill used on them. The countered enemy will take 10 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.
Edo Tensei Chen deals 30 damage to one enemy. If that enemy's health drops to 15 or below they will be instantly killed.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Chen invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Rock Lee.
Win 4 battles in a row with Maito Gai.
Win 25 battles with Rock Lee or Maito Gai.

153.8.name: Edo Tensei Yota
153.8.description: Yota was a young child from an unknown clan with mysterious powers of weather manipulation. He was revived by Yakushi Kabuto to fight in the Fourth Shinobi World War.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Yota targets an ally or an enemy. If used on an ally, the first harmful skill used on them the next turn will be countered. If used on an enemy, the first harmful skill used by them the next turn will be countered. The countered enemy will take 15 piercing damage and will have the cost of their skills increased by 1 random energy for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.
Edo Tensei Yota deals 30 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense.
Edo Tensei Yota deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following turn, this skill will cost 1 random energy instead. This skill stacks.

This skill makes Edo Tensei Fuu invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Fuu deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 3 turns. If they don't use a new skill, they will take 15 piercing damage.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Fuu.

176.name: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S)
176.description: Hashirama was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Shinobi Alliance against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. He is willing to witness the new generation's full power and finally defeat his archenemy for good.

skills.skillDescription: For 3 turns, Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) will remove all harmful skills from him each turn. This skill becomes 'Sage Mode: Self-Enhance' for 3 turns after used.

skills.skillName: Sage Art: Gate of the Great God
skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 2 random energies from them.
Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 35 damage to one enemy. For 4 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Wood Release: Wood Dragon'.

Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, if the target of this skill is targeted by a new harmful stun skill, they will ignore stun effects for 4 turns. This skill is invisible until triggered and cannot be used on a target already affected by it.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) reduces the cooldown of his skills by 1 turn permanently. This skill stacks.
Edo Tensei Hashirama (S) deals 10 damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Hashirama.
Win 6 battles in a row with Tsunade.
Win 6 battles in a row with Yamato.

176.1.name: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S)
176.1.description: Tobirama was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Shinobi Alliance against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. As he watches the development of his own special techniques by the hands of other shinobi, he is eagling to bury Madara once and for all.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If their health drops to 70 or below, they will deal 10 less damage for 1 turn. If it drops to 50 or below, they will also be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. If it drops to 30 or below, they will also be stunned for 1 turn.
Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) targets his allies. For 1 turn, their non-conditional stun skills, invulnerability skills and counter effects will last 1 additional turn.

Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills. This skill is invisible.

Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) targets himself or an ally. The target gains 15 points of unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn. During this time, every enemy that uses a new skill on them will permanently take 15 additional damage from 'Mutually Multiplying Explosive Tags'. This skill is invisible on the first turn, stacks and becomes 'Mutually Multiplying Explosive Tags' for 2 turns after used.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Tobirama (S) deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Tobirama.
Win 6 battles in a row with Danzo.
Win 6 battles in a row with Izuna.

176.2.name: Edo Tensei Hiruzen
176.2.description: Hiruzen was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Shinobi Alliance against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. Hiruzen will do everything in his power to aid his village in the battle for the world's salvation.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hiruzen gains 5 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, if a new harmful skill is used on Edo Tensei Hiruzen, he will become invulnerable to all other harmful skills for the rest of that turn. After the 4th time this skill is used, it will be replaced by 'Five Release Great Combo' permanently.

Edo Tensei Hiruzen deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, any member of Edo Tensei Hiruzen's team that target them with a new skill will be grant 5 points of permanent destructible defense. 'Giant Shuriken Shadow Clone' will last 1 additional turn the next time it's used. This skill stacks.

Edo Tensei Hiruzen deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, any member of Edo Tensei Hiruzen's team that target them with a new skill will be grant 10 points of damage reduction that cannot be ignored for 1 turn.* This skill stacks.
This skill makes Edo Tensei Hiruzen invulnerable for 1 turn. Edo Tensei Hiruzen gains 1 green energy.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Hiruzen deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies each turn permanently. This skill can only be used once.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Hiruzen.
Win 6 battles in a row with Asuma.
Win 6 battles in a row with Konohamaru.

176.3.name: Edo Tensei Minato
176.3.description: Minato was brought back to life by Orochimaru during the Fourth Shinobi World War to help the Shinobi Alliance against the combined forces of Obito and Madara. He is willing to meet and help his son on the battle for the whole ninja world's existence.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Minato targets all enemies. For the rest of the game, everytime they use a new harmful skill, 'Red Chakra Transfer' will heal 5 additional health and 'Hiraishin Rasengan' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be used while active.

Edo Tensei Minato heals one ally for 0 health and takes 5 affliction damage*. For 1 turn, this ally cannot be killed. During 'Sage Mode Activation', this skill will also grant Edo Tensei Minato 1 blue energy.

Edo Tensei Minato deals 0 damage to one enemy and takes 5 affliction damage*. For 1 turn, this enemy will ignore healing effects. During 'Sage Mode Activation', this skill will also grant Edo Tensei Minato 1 red energy.

Edo Tensei Minato becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 3 turns. During this time, 'Red Chakra Transfer' and 'Hiraishin Rasengan' will have their costs doubled and their values increased by 30.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Minato.
Win 6 battles in a row with Kushina.
Win 6 battles in a row with Naruto.

176.4.name: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato
176.4.description: To save his village from Kurama's rage, Minato sealed its dark half on himself shortly before his death. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Minato entered Kyuubi Chakra Mode, what strenghtens his abilities and allows him to use jinchuuriki techniques.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato heals himself for 10 health and ends 'Custom Kunai Addition' and 'Extendable Chakra Arms'. This skill will be replaced by 'Flying Thunder God Slash' permanently. During this time 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will target all enemies instead and will kill any enemy whose health drops to 5 or below.

Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato heals himself for 10 health and ends 'Chakra-Cloaked Shadow Clones' and 'Extendable Chakra Arms'. This skill will be replaced by 'Flying Thunder God Slash' permanently. During this time, 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will deal 10 additional damage and stun its target's strategic skills for 1 turn.

Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato heals himself for 10 health and ends 'Chakra-Cloaked Shadow Clones' and 'Custom Kunai Addition'. This skill will be replaced by 'Flying Thunder God Slash' permanently. During this time, 'Flying Thunder God Slash' will make Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, this skill will be replaced by 'Dark Kurama Rasengan' and any enemy who targets Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato with a new skill will deal 5 less non-affliction damage with that skill.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Dark Kurama Rasengan' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.
Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Dark Kurama Rasengan' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.
Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. 'Dark Kurama Rasengan' will deal 10 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks and cannot be countered or reflected.
Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill removes all stacks from 'Flying Thunder God Slash'.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Edo Tensei Minato.
Win 40 battles with Edo Tensei Minato.

176.5.name: Edo Tensei Madara
176.5.description: Madara was brought back to life by Kabuto to be his most impressive and powerful weapon against the Shinobi Alliance. He is ready to show his strength against the ninja world and use his mastery in the Uchiha techniques once again.

skills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will have 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. This skill becomes 'Great Fire Annihilation' permanently after used.

Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will deal 5 affliction damage to any enemy that uses a new skill on him. This skill becomes 'Tengai Shinsei' permanently after used.

Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense each turn. This skill becomes 'Yasaka Magatama' permanently after used.

Edo Tensei Madara becomes invulnerable to physical and energy skills for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Edo Tensei Madara will be healed for 5 health each turn. This skill becomes 'Nativity of a World of Trees' permanently after used.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Madara deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. If 'Rinnegan' is active, for 2 turns any member of Edo Tensei Madara's team that target any of the affected enemies with a new skill will become invulnerable for 1 turn to skills with the same main class as the skill they used. This skill ignores invulnerability and ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

Edo Tensei Madara deals 50 damage to one enemy. After 3 turns, this enemy will take another 50 damage. If 'Susanoo' is active, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and Edo Tensei Madara will ignore stun effects for this skill's duration. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

Edo Tensei Madara deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of permanent destructible defense. If 'Hashirama's Cells' is active, then this skill will first make the enemy ignore all helpful effects for 1 turn. This skill stacks.

alternateSkills.skillName: Nativity of a World of Trees
alternateSkills.skillDescription: Edo Tensei Madara deals 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. During this time, Edo Tensei Madara's allies will ignore energy drain or removal effects. If 'Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan' is active, Edo Tensei Madara will also gain 1 red energy and then will be healed for 10 health each turn for 4 turns. This skill ends if Edo Tensei Madara dies.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Madara.

177.name: Kyuubi Naruto (S)
177.description: Having gained complete control of all of the kyuubi's chakra Kyuubi Naruto (S) will be sure to rampage over every battlefield he comes across.

skills.skillDescription: Kyuubi Naruto (S) deals 15 damage to one enemy and heals himself for 5 health. This skill deals 5 additional damage and heals 5 additional health with each use.

Kyuubi Naruto (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies and gains 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage and grants 5 additional points of damage reduction with each use.

Kyuubi Naruto (S) deals 45 damage to one enemy and gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill deals 5 additional damage and grants 5 additional points of destructible defense with each use.
This skill makes Kyuubi Naruto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Clone Dispersion' for 4 turns after used and cannot be used if 'Clone Dispersion' is active.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Kyuubi Naruto (S) gains 1 blue energy. For 3 turns, the healing, damage reduction and destructible defense of 'Rasengan Riot', 'Absorption Rasengan' and 'Planetary Rasengan' respectively will target Kyuubi Naruto (S)'s entire team instead. This skill cannot be used while active.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Naruto.

177.1.name: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto
177.1.description: During his fight against Tobi, Naruto got to combine his Sennin & Kurama Chakra Cloak modes in order to strenghten his abilities. Capable of creating a yellow projection of Kurama's body, Naruto becomes one of the fastest shinobi alive while in this mode.

skills.skillDescription: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto heals himself for 20 health and increases the damage of his skills by 10 for the rest of the game. This effect stacks. For 1 turn, Sennin Kyuubi Naruto will be unable to be killed.

Sennin Kyuubi Naruto targets one ally for the rest of the game. During this time, whenever they use a new harmful skill, they will be healed for 20 health. This skill becomes 'Chakra Transfer' for 2 turns after used. This skill ends if Sennin Kyuubi Naruto dies and cannot be removed. This skill stacks.

Sennin Kyuubi Naruto deals 25 damage to one enemy and 5 damage to all others. For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Sennin Kyuubi Naruto will take 10 damage. This skill becomes 'Tailed Beast Bomb Blast' for 2 turns after used.

For 1 turn, Sennin Kyuubi Naruto will be unable to be killed. For the rest of the game, everytime Sennin Kyuubi Naruto uses a new skill, he will gain 5 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill becomes 'Tailed-Beast Chakra Arms' permanently after used.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Sennin Kyuubi Naruto targets one ally, granting them 1 blue energy and reducing their cooldowns by 1 for 1 turn.
Sennin Kyuubi Naruto targets one enemy, first removing all helpful skills on them and then dealing 35 damage to them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
Sennin Kyuubi Naruto deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sennin Naruto or Kyuubi Naruto (S).
Win 40 battles with Sennin Naruto or Kyuubi Naruto (S).

177.2.name: Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke
177.2.description: To avoid complete blindness, Sasuke decided to take Tobi's advice and steal Itachi's eyes so he could achieve the Eternal Mangekyou Sharingan. With Sharingan's final form, Sasuke can use his powers repeatedly without exhausting himself.

skills.skillDescription: For 6 turns, Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke gains 5 points of unpierceable damage reduction. During this time, he will also gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense each turn and will ignore all harmful non-damage effects. This skill becomes 'Eternal Mangekyou Insight' for 6 turns after used. This skill cannot be removed.

Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost 2 additional random energies. This skill deals 10 additional damage with each use. During 'Armored Susanoo Activation' this skill becomes 'Blaze Release: Susanoo Kagutsuchi'.

Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 5 affliction damage to one enemy. After each use, this skill will deal 15 additional affliction damage and cost 1 additional random energy for the rest of the game. This skill can only be used 4 times.
This skill makes Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn. During 'Armored Susanoo Activation', he will also ignore all enemy damage for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: The following turn, the first enemy that uses a new skill on Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke will have their skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and becomes 'Blaze Release: Yasaka Magatama' for 1 turn after used.
Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, if that enemy does not use a new skill, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage* that cannot be ignored.
Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 100 affliction damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. For 2 turns, if that enemy does not use a new skill, they will be dealt 10 affliction damage* that cannot be ignored.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Mangekyou Sasuke or Akatsuki Sasuke.
Win 40 battles with Mangekyou Sasuke or Akatsuki Sasuke.

177.3.name: Byakugou Sakura
177.3.description: After being trained by Tsunade, Sakura started storing chakra on her forehead to release the Strength of a Hundred Seal during the Fourth Shinobi World War. Now capable of fighting side by side with her teammates, Sakura becomes one of the strongest kunoichi and greatest medical-nin the world has ever seen.

skills.skillDescription: Byakugou Sakura deals 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies. Her team will be healed for 5 health.
Byakugou Sakura targets one ally. For 2 turns, they will be healed for 10 health each turn and will ignore all harmful non-damage effects. This skill ends if Byakugou Sakura dies.
Byakugou Sakura heals her team for 10 health each turn for the rest of the game. This skill becomes 'Katsuyu: Immense Network Healing' permanently after used and ends if Byakugou Sakura dies.
This skill makes Byakugou Sakura invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Byakugou Sakura heals her team for 10 health. This skill heals 5 additional health with each use. This skill ignores invulnerability.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sakura.

177.4.name: Commander Kakashi
177.4.description: As the Fourth Shinobi World War begins, Kakashi is appointed as commander of the Allied Shinobi Forces' Third Division. The Third Division is mobilised ahead of the other divisions in order to be on hand for any eventuality.

skills.skillDescription: Commander Kakashi targets one enemy for 1 turn. If they use a new non-strategic skill, they will take 30 piercing damage. If they use a new strategic skill, they will take 20 piercing damage and then have their strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. For 1 turn 'Lightning-Infused Kunai' can be used. This skill is invisible.

Commander Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and for 2 turns their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy. For 1 turn 'Lightning-Infused Kunai' can be used. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

Commander Kakashi targets one enemy. After 1 turn, this enemy will take 55 piercing damage. For 1 turn, the stun and counter effects of any new skill they use will take no effect. This skill is invisible and requires either 'Lightning Transmission' or 'Executioner's Blade Assault' to be active.
This skill makes Commander Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any War Commander.
Win 25 battles with any War Commander.
Win 6 battles in a row with any wielder of the Executioner's Blade.
Win 25 battles with any wielder of the Executioner's Blade.

177.5.name: Butterfly Chouji (S)
177.5.description: During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Chouji has to overcome his fears in order to make Asuma's last lesson worth it and defend the Shinobi Alliance. He now has full control of the Akimichi's special techniques, able to perform giant-form attacks covered by his butterfly chakra.

skills.skillDescription: Butterfly Chouji (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them deal 5 less damage with physical skills permanently. For 1 turn, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Hand Prison' will be applied one more time if it's used. This skill ends if Butterfly Chouji (S) dies.

Butterfly Chouji (S) gains 15 points of destructible defense for 1 turn, deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns that enemy's physical and strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing' will be applied one more time if it's used.

For 2 turns, Butterfly Chouji (S) will gain 1 random energy everytime a new harmful skill is used on him. During this time, all the stackable effects (damage included) of 'Giant Butterfly Bullet Bombing' and 'Giant Hand Prison' will be applied one more time if they are used. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Butterfly Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Butterfly Chouji.
Win 5 battles in a row with Akimichi Chouji (S).

178.name: Commander Gaara
178.description: Gaara has been choosen to be the main commander of the Shinobi Alliance in the Fourth Shinobi World War. With such a big responsability in his hands, he is now ready to take the war to a defining point and defeat any enemy he faces.

skills.skillDescription: Commander Gaara deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their skills for 1 turn.

Commander Gaara deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies. For 2 turns, anytime an enemy uses a new non-strategic skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. During this time, 'Sand Binding Prison' will deal 10 additional damage.

For 1 turn, if Commander Gaara or an ally is affected by a new physical or energy skill, they will gain 1 random energy. If they are affected by a new strategic skill, they will ignore stun effects for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.
This skill makes Commander Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Kazekage Gaara.
Win 6 battles in a row with Kankuro or Temari.
Win 25 battles with Kankuro or Temari.

179.name: Captain Kankuro
179.description: During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Kankuro is placed in charge of the Surprise Attack Division. He is now able to use his common original puppets with a higher control, along with the new machines in his arsenal, the puppets of Sasori and his parents.

skills.skillDescription: Captain Kankuro deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will be stunned for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Puppet Manipulation: Sasori' and 'Puppet Manipulation: Father & Mother' will cost 1 random energy less.

Captain Kankuro deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will take 25 damage that ignores invulnerability. The following turn, 'Puppet Manipulation: Father & Mother' and 'Puppet Manipulation: Karasu & Kuroari' will cost 1 random energy less.

Captain Kankuro deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy. The following turn, 'Puppet Manipulation: Karasu & Kuroari' and 'Puppet Manipulation: Sasori' will cost 1 random energy less.
This skill makes Captain Kankuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Kankuro.

180.name: Captain Temari
180.description: When the war begins, Temari is placed in the Fourth Division. Although Gaara is officially in command of the division and Shikamaru is in Gaara's proxy, Temari is the one who leads the division in the battlefield as well as the Wind Style Formation commanded by her.

skills.skillDescription: Captain Temari deals 20 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill can be used on Captain Temari or on an ally. The first non-strategic skill used on the target of this skill will be reflected back to one random enemy. This skill is invisible.
Captain Temari removes all harmful effects from herself. 'Wind Release: Cast Nest' will deal 5 additional damage permanently. This skill stacks.
For 1 turn, Captain Temari will counter all harmful skills used on her. The following turn, all enemies will take 10 damage.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Temari.

181.name: Samehada Bee
181.description: After his encounter with Kisame, Killer Bee has became the owner of the legendary sword of the mist, Samehada. With it on his side, Bee is able to use his arsenal of swords in a more efficient way, and combo them with Samehada's ability to absorb chakra.

skills.skillDescription: Samehada Bee targets an enemy, dealing 15 damage and removing 1 random energy from them.
Samehada Bee deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns their energy, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn.

For 3 turns, Samehada Bee will have 10 points of damage reduction, 'Samehada Bite' and 'Sealing Technique: Octopus Hold' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Partial Beast Hand Protection' will cost 1 random energy instead. During this time, Samehada Bee will gain 1 random energy if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him.
For 1 turn, the first new harmful skill used on Samehada Bee will be countered, the countered enemy will take 20 damage and Samehada Bee will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Killer Bee.
Win 6 battles in a row with Hoshigaki Kisame.

182.name: White Snake Kabuto
182.description: After Orochimaru's death by Sasuke's hands, Kabuto got access to his master's chakra and has implanted it on his body, granting himself the ability of summoning and controlling snakes. In his new form, Kabuto allies himself with Tobi to wage war on the shinobi world.

skills.skillDescription: White Snake Kabuto deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy at the end of their next turn. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on White Snake Kabuto will take 15 affliction damage. This skill is invisible.
White Snake Kabuto deals 40 damage to one enemy. For the following 2 turns, White Snake Kabuto will gain 1 random energy each turn. This skill ends if White Snake Kabuto dies.
White Snake Kabuto targets all allies permanently. The next time their health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 35. This skill is invisible, can only be used once and cannot be removed.
White Snake Kabuto removes all enemy afflictions from himself then becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. For the following 4 turns, 'Snake Strangulation' and 'Summoning: Manda II' will be replaced.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: White Snake Kabuto deals 25 damage to one enemy. The following turn, 'Snake Regeneration' will also deal 25 damage to one random enemy if used.
White Snake Kabuto heals himself for 25 health. The following turn, 'Snake Bite' will also heal White Snake Kabuto for 25 health if used.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Kabuto.
Win 50 battles with any Edo Tensei.

183.name: Sennin Kabuto
183.description: Due to the larger chakra reserves he gains from Orochimaru's remains,  Kabuto is able to learn senjutsu from the White Snake Sage at the Ryuchi Cave. This allows him to enter Sage Mode, which he can use indefinitely due to his research of Juugo's passively ability to constantly absorb natural energy.

skills.skillDescription: Sennin Kabuto deals 10 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time they cannot use skills with a counter effect (this is a stun effect).

Sennin Kabuto targets all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, their physical and strategic skills will cost 1 additional random energy, their energy skills will deal 10 less damage and their mental and affliction skills will be stunned. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
Sennin Kabuto targets one ally, granting them lifelink for 3 turns.
Sennin Kabuto uses this skill. This skill will be replaced by 'Arhat Fist' permanently after used.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Sennin Kabuto deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill becomes 'Spiral Web' after used.

Sennin Kabuto targets himself or an ally. The following turn, the first harmful skill used on them will be countered. The target of this skill is invisible. This skill becomes 'Demonic Flute' after used.
Sennin Kabuto stuns all enemies physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Rest' after used.
Sennin Kabuto heals himself for 40 health. This skill becomes 'Dance of the Seedling Fern' after used.

Sennin Kabuto deals 30 damage to all enemies and reduces their physical and energy damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. This skill becomes 'Regenerative Bite' after used.
Sennin Kabuto steals 40 health from one enemy. This skill becomes 'Arhat Fist' after used.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with White Snake Kabuto.
Win 6 battles in a row with any Sound Five Member.
Win 40 battles with White Snake Kabuto.

184.name: Rinnegan Tobi
184.description: The Fourth Shinobi World War its beginning was declared by Tobi when the five Kage and the leader of the Land of Iron unanimously refused to surrender the Eight and Nine-Tails for his Eye of the Moon Plan.

skills.skillDescription: Rinnegan Tobi deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill removes all stacks from 'Intangible' and 'Hidden Protection'. This skill ignores invulnerability.
For 2 turns, Rinnegan Tobi will deal 15 affliction damage and steal 1 random energy from one enemy each turn. That enemy will also be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.
This skill makes Rinnegan Tobi invulnerable to non-physical skills for 1 turn. Permanently, 'Gedou Mazou' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Rinnegan Tobi invulnerable to non-energy skills for 1 turn. Permanently, 'Gedou Mazou' will deal 10 additional damage. This skill stacks.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Uchiha Obito.
Win 6 battles in a row with Tobi.
Win 50 battles with Uchiha Obito or Tobi.

185.name: Uchiha Obito (S)
185.description: Following the destruction of his mask during the Fourth Shinobi World War, Tobi was revealed to be Uchiha Obito, the one everyone thought that was dead long ago. He allies himself with the reincarnated version of Madara in order to make the Infinite Tsukuyomi work.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Obito (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical, mental and strategic skills for 1 turn. This skill will also have the secondary effect of any skill used by Uchiha Obito (S) last turn.
Uchiha Obito (S) deals 20 damage and 10 affliction damage* to one enemy. This skill will also have the secondary effect of any skill used by Uchiha Obito (S) last turn.
Uchiha Obito (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. This skill will also have the secondary effect of any skill used by Uchiha Obito (S) last turn.
This skill makes Uchiha Obito (S) invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn Uchiha Obito (S)'s other skills will make him invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Rinnegan Tobi.
Win 50 battles with any Edo Tensei Jinchuuriki.

186.name: Guruguru
186.description: Guruguru is a version of Zetsu, whose nickname was given by Obito due to the swirl pattern of his face. He is the one who helps Obito against the forces of the Mist Village shinobi who killed Rin. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, he takes over Yamato's body to fight against the Shinobi Alliance.

skills.skillDescription: Guruguru deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and steals 1 random energy from them. This skill can only be used during 'Body Possession'.
Guruguru removes all enemy afflictions from him and then heals himself for 30 health. This skill can only be used during 'Body Possession'.

Guruguru grants his team 40 points of permanent destructible defense. For 4 turns, 'Wood Release: Cutting Technique' and 'Body Reconstruction' will be replaced by 'Top Transformed Buddha' and 'All is Suffering' respectively. This skill can only be used during 'Body Possession'.

Guruguru targets one ally, first removing all helpful skills from them, then stunning them and making them invulnerable to harmful and helpful skills (this effect starts next turn) permanently. Guruguru gains 100 points of permanent destructible defense and will be healed for 5 health each turn. This skill becomes 'Statue Rescue' permanently after used and ends when Guruguru dies.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Guruguru deals 40 damage to one random enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
Guruguru deals 20 damage and 20 piercing damage to all enemies. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Guruguru invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Corrupted Obito.
Win 6 battles in a row with Yamato.

187.name: Regenerated Madara
187.description: After Black Zetsu takes over Obito's body and uses Samsara of Heavenly Life, Madara is brought back to life. Without the limits from the Impure World Reincarnation technique, he gains new abilities that allow him to disrupt his enemies and nullify their abilities.

skills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, everytime Regenerated Madara uses a new strategic skill, he will decrease the cost of his non-strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently. This skill will be permanently replaced by 'Limbo: Limited Border Jail'.
Regenerated Madara stuns one enemy for 1 turn and steals 1 random energy from them. For 2 turns, if they use a new strategic skill, this skill will be replaced by it for 1 turn.

For the rest of the game, everytime Regenerated Madara uses a new non-strategic skill, he will decrease the cost of his strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and will gain 10 points of permanent destructible defense. This skill will be permanently replaced by 'Demonic Statue Chains'.
Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and ignores all harmful effects for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his non-strategic skills by 1 random energy permanently and deals 10 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will be stunned for 1 turn.
Regenerated Madara increases the cost of his skills by 1 random energy permanently, deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and increases the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Edo Tensei Madara.
Win 50 battles with any Edo Tensei Hokage.

188.name: Juubi
188.description: Juubi, also known as the Ten-Tails, is the combined form of Ootsutsuki Kaguya and the God Tree, created to reclaim the chakra inherited by her children, Hagoromo and Hamura. Centuries after its creation, its revival became the objective of Uchiha Madara and Obito, who both sought to become the beast's jinchuuriki in order to further their plans.

skills.skillDescription: Juubi deals 5 piercing damage to all enemies for 1 turn and gains 30 points of destructible defense also for 1 turn. This skill stacks, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

Juubi heals its team for 10 health for 1 turn and grants them 10 points of damage reduction also for 1 turn. During this time Juubi's team will ignore energy drain or removal effects. This skill stacks, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

Juubi targets one enemy for 1 turn. Once this skill's duration is over, this enemy will take 50 affliction damage. This skill cannot be used while active, requires 'Constant Evolution' to be active and ends if Juubi dies.

Juubi removes all harmful skills from itself and then targets all enemies permanently. Everytime they use a new skill, Juubi's skills will last 1 additional turn for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Tenpenchii' permanently after used, cannot be countered or reflected and ignores invulnerability.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Juubi deals 40 affliction damage to all characters. This skill's duration isn't increased by 'Constant Evolution'.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Uchiha Obito (S) or Regenerated Madara.
Win 6 battles in a row with any Jinchuuriki.

189.name: Rikudou Obito
189.description: After sealing the Ten-Tails into his body, Obito becomes its jinchuuriki and one of the biggest threats the world has ever seen. He will do everything in his power to make the Infinite Tsukuyomi work, now that he has an almost unstoppable offense and an indestructible defense.

skills.skillDescription: Rikudou Obito deals 0 piercing damage to one enemy plus 15 piercing damage for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Balls' permanently after used.

Rikudou Obito deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and then stuns their energy, affliction and strategic skills for 0 turns plus 1 turn for every 'Black Chakra Stack' Rikudou Obito has. Any 'Black Chakra Stack' will be removed afterwards.

For 1 turn, all enemies' damage will be reduced by 5. For 1 turn, any skill Rikudou Obito uses will not remove any 'Black Chakra Stack'. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

Rikudou Obito gains 0 points of permanent destructible defense plus 20 points of permanent destructible defense for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Black Receiver' permanently after used.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Rikudou Obito deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their non-affliction damage will be reduced by 0 plus 10 for every 'Black Chakra Stack' Rikudou Obito has and then any 'Black Chakra Stack' will be removed afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Umbrella' permanently after used.

Rikudou Obito gains 0 random energies plus 1 random energy for every 'Black Chakra Stack' he has and then removes any 'Black Chakra Stack' afterwards. This skill becomes 'Truth-Seeking Shield' permanently after used and removes all of its destructible defense.

This is a 'Black Chakra Stack'. All of Rikudou Obito's skills grant him 1 'Black Chakra Stack' normally, 2 if his health is at 50 or below and 3 if his health is at 25 or below (after their other effects are applied).

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Uchiha Obito (S).
Win 6 battles in a row with Juubi.
Win 6 battles in a row with Black Zetsu.

190.name: Rikudou Madara
190.description: With nobody left to oppose him, Madara seals the Ten-Tails into himself once its resurrection is complete. By becoming its jinchuuriki, Madara gains a tremendous amount of power and becomes one of the deadliest threats the world has ever witnessed. In power of two Rinnegan, Madara is almost untouchable through the access of the world known as Limbo.

skills.skillDescription: Rikudou Madara targets himself or an ally, making them ignore all harmful non-affliction damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and can only be used 4 times. At the 4th use of it, 'Infinite Tsukuyomi' will permanently cost 1 less white energy and will have its cooldown reduced by 2 turns.

skills.skillName: Sage Art: Yin Release Lightning Dispatch
skills.skillDescription: Rikudou Madara deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, any enemy who targets any of Rikudou Madara's allies with a new skill will be dealt 5 piercing damage. This skill stacks and ends when Rikudou Madara dies.

For 1 turn, the first new non-affliction damage skill used on Rikudou Madara will deal no damage to him and the damage of 'Sage Art: Yin Release Lightning Dispatch' will be increased by the amount of original damage of that skill for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

Rikudou Madara targets all enemies until they use a new skill. Their skills will cost 1 additional random energy, will deal 20 less damage and once they use a new skill, they will take 20 piercing damage. This skill cannot be used on enemies already affected by it and cannot be reflected.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Regenerated Madara.
Win 6 battles in a row with Rikudou Obito.
Win 6 battles in a row with any Team 7 member.

191.name: Eighth Gate Gai
191.description: Taught by his father at a young age, Gai is able to utilise any and all of the Eight Inner Gates. During the Fourth Shinobi World War, Gai decides to open the Eighth Gate to stop Madara in his jinchuuriki form, knowing that it would eventually cause his death.

skills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, Eighth Gate Gai can use his other skills. During this time, he will ignore healing effects, enemy stun effects and energy drain or removal effects. This skill cannot be removed and will be permanently replaced by 'Steam of Blood' after used.

Eighth Gate Gai destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 15 piercing damage to them. This skill deals 5 additional damage with each use. If the enemy dies after this skill is used, 'Night Gai' will permanently deal 25 additional damage and cost 1 less green energy.

Eighth Gate Gai targets one enemy, first removing all helpful skills on them and then dealing 50 piercing damage to them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected. Eighth Gate Gai will die after this skill is used; this self-death effect cannot be ignored.
This skill makes Eighth Gate Gai invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill can only be used three times.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Eighth Gate Gai takes 20 affliction damage* that cannot kill him and gains 1 green energy. For 1 turn, 'Evening Elephant' will deal 10 additional damage, will cost 1 random energy instead and Eighth Gate Gai will be unable to be killed.

mission: The Red Beast of the Leaf
Win 6 battles in a row with Maito Gai (S).
Win 5 battles in a row with Dai.
Win 5 battles in a row with Rock Lee (S).
Win 5 battles in a row with Hatake Kakashi (S).
Win 5 battles in a row with Edo Tensei Minato or Edo Tensei Kyuubi Minato.
Win 5 battles in a row with Rikudou Madara.

191.3.name: Rikudou Naruto
191.3.description: With the power given to him by Hagoromo, Naruto gained access to the Six Paths Sage Mode. Naruto's physical attributes and techniques are further augmented, to the point where he could dodge attacks that moved at the speed of light. He also retained use of his Tailed Beast Mode avatar of Kurama, what gave him access to one of the strongest ninja techniques to ever exist.

skills.skillDescription: Rikudou Naruto gains 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn and targets one enemy, reducing that enemy's non-affliction damage by 20 for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional white energy and will instead make Rikudou Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn, stun one target enemy for 1 turn and reduce that enemy's damage by 10 permanently. This skill stacks.

Rikudou Naruto targets one ally, removing all harmful skills from them and then healing them for 25 health. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional red energy and will instead remove all harmful skills from one ally and heal them for 50 health (if used).

Rikudou Naruto deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and increases the cost of their skills by 1 random energy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional blue energy and will target all enemies instead (if used).
All of Rikudou Naruto's skills will be permanently replaced. This skill costs 1 less random energy for each skill he has used on the game.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Rikudou Naruto deals 30 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, 'Yang Chakra Gathering' and 'Chakra Tail Shield' will cost 1 less random energy.

After 2 turns of this skill being used, Rikudou Naruto will heal himself for 35 health and will gain 2 random energies. For 1 turn, 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage' and 'Chakra Tail Shield' will cost 1 less random energy.

Rikudou Naruto removes all skills from himself and then deals 100 piercing damage to one enemy. Rikudou Naruto will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Rikudou Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Tailed-Beast Bomb Barrage' and 'Yang Chakra Gathering' will cost 1 less random energy.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Sennin Kyuubi Naruto.
Win 50 battles with Sennin Kyuubi Naruto, Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke, Byakugou Sakura or Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

191.6.name: Rinnegan Sasuke
191.6.description: With the power given to him by Hagoromo, Sasuke gained access to the Rinnegan. The doujutsu gives Sasuke the ability of pattern recognition and also grants him access to the various abilities of the Six Paths techniques. With that, Sasuke has access to one of the strongest ninja techniques to ever exist.

skills.skillDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke stuns one enemy for 1 turn. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional white energy and will instead last 2 turns (if used).

Rinnegan Sasuke deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, if they use a new skill, they will take another 10 affliction damage. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional red energy and it will instead instantly deal 25 affliction damage to all enemies (if used).
Rinnegan Sasuke deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and kills them if their health drops to 5 or below. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 additional blue energy and will deal 30 additional damage.
All of Rinnegan Sasuke's skills will be permanently replaced. This skill costs 1 less random energy for each skill he has used on the game.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Rinnegan Sasuke deals 25 affliction damage to one enemy and 15 affliction damage to all other enemies. For 1 turn, any enemy that target Rinnegan Sasuke with a new skill will take 5 additional damage from 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' permanently. For 1 turn, 'Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation' and 'Susanoo: Body Cocoon' will cost 1 less random energy.

Rinnegan Sasuke deals 15 affliction damage* to his allies and then increases his damage by 15 permanently. For 1 turn, 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' and 'Susanoo: Body Cocoon' will cost 1 less random energy.

Rinnegan Sasuke removes all skills from himself and then deals 100 piercing damage to one enemy. Rinnegan Sasuke will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.
This skill makes Rinnegan Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Susanoo: Great Fireball Technique' and 'Chibaku Tensei: Energy Relocation' will cost 1 less random energy.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke.
Win 50 battles with Sennin Kyuubi Naruto, Eternal Mangekyou Sasuke, Byakugou Sakura or Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

192.name: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi
192.description: As Obito sacrifices himself for the sake of Team 7 in the battle against Kaguya, Kakashi gets a last gift from him: his second Mangekyou Sharingan. In the possession of both eyes, Kakashi is able to connect his abilities with Obito's as well as release the perfect form of Susanoo.

skills.skillDescription: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi gains 40 points of permanent destructible defense. While Dual Mangekyou Kakashi still has destructible defense from this skill, 'Susanoo's Shared Shield' may be used and 'Perfect Susanoo Armor' will be replaced by 'Kamui Shuriken'.

Dual Mangekyou Kakashi grants his allies 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead make them invulnerable for 1 turn but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi. This skill requires 'Perfect Susanoo Armor' to be active.

Dual Mangekyou Kakashi deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns them and makes them invulnerable to harmful and helpful skills for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead deal 45 piercing damage but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.
This skill makes Dual Mangekyou Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Dual Mangekyou Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and reduces their non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. The next time this skill is used, it will instead reduce the enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 permanently but will also deal 5 affliction damage* to Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Young Kakashi and Obito (classic) on the same team.

193.name: Rehabilitated Obito
193.description: After redeeming himself, Obito decides to help Team 7 in the final battle against Kaguya using all the power from his doujutsu. Obito is ready to do whatever is needed to save the world he once wanted to destroy - even sacrifice himself for the sake of others.

skills.skillDescription: Rehabilitated Obito takes 5 affliction damage*. For the rest of the game, his skills will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 damage and 10 piercing damage to one enemy and makes one random member of his team invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will also stun its target for 1 turn and remove 1 random energy from them.

Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, their stun skills will last 1 turn less* and their energy drain or removal skills will remove 1 less energy*. This skill cannot be countered.

Rehabilitated Obito deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if Rehabilitated Obito is targeted by a new harmful non-affliction skill, he will become invulnerable for the rest of that turn*.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Byakugou Sakura.
Win 6 battles in a row with Dual Mangekyou Kakashi.
Win 40 battles with any Team 7 member.

194.name: Ootsutsuki Kaguya
194.description: Kaguya was a member of the Ootsutsuki clan and the matriarch of a branch family. Long before the founding of the hidden villages, during an era of endless war, Kaguya consumed the fruit of the God Tree and became the first wielder of chakra on Earth, before later merging with the tree to become the Ten-Tails.

skills.skillDescription: For the rest of the game, all enemies will take 5 affliction damage whenever they use a new skill. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also stun their targets' affliction skills for 1 turn. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

For the rest of the game, all enemies' stun effects will last 1 turn less. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also ignore invulnerability. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

For the rest of the game, all enemies will deal 5 less energy damage. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also decrease their targets' physical damage by 10 for 1 turn. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

For the rest of the game, all enemies will ignore friendly damage reduction and invulnerabilities. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya replaces all her skills and her harmful skills will also first destroy their targets' destructible defense. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Kaguya dies.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy, kills them if their health drops to 10 or below and marks them permanently. If this skill is used on a marked enemy, they will be killed if their health drops to 20 or below instead.
Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 10 damage to all enemies and grants her team 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.
Ootsutsuki Kaguya deals 20 damage to one enemy and makes them ignore all helpful effects for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Expansive Truth-Seeking Ball' for 1 turn after used.

Ootsutsuki Kaguya removes all skills from herself and then targets all enemies, removing any Ootsutsuki Kaguya's dimension from them. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

After 3 turns of this skill being used, Ootsutsuki Kaguya's health will be set to 100. During this time, Ootsutsuki Kaguya will deal 60 damage to the first enemy who uses a new skill on her. This skill ends if a new harmful skill is used on Ootsutsuki Kaguya. This skill will be replaced by 'Major Summoning: Juubi' for 3 turns after used.
Ootsutsuki Kaguya targets one dead ally, reviving them with 100 health and replacing all their skills with Juubi's skills permanently.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Juubi.
Win 5 battles in a row with Rikudou Obito.
Win 6 battles in a row with Rikudou Madara.
Win 7 battles in a row with Black Zetsu.
Win 25 battles with the team Rikudou Naruto, Rinnegan Sasuke and Byakugou Sakura.

195.name: Ootsutsuki Hamura
195.description: Hamura was the son of Princess Kaguya, the fraternal twin brother of Hagoromo; both of whom were the first people born with the ability to wield chakra. Hamura was the ancestor of the Hyuuga clan and the founder of the shinobi of the Moon.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Hamura deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy.
Ootsutsuki Hamura gains 30 points of permanent destructible defense. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill re-applies itself.

Ootsutsuki Hamura targets one enemy, who will lose 1 random energy and will be stunned for 1 turn. If this enemy is affected by Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's 'Six Paths Yang Power', 'Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei' will be applied on them.

Ootsutsuki Hamura targets all enemies, who will deal 15 less damage for 1 turn and if they use a new strategic skill, they will deal 5 less damage permanently. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hamura's skills will cost 1 less random energy. This skill ends if Ootsutsuki Hamura dies.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: The character affected by this skill is permanently stunned, loses 3 random energies once and takes 50 affliction damage once.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Hyuuga clan member.
Win 50 battles with any Hyuuga clan member.

196.name: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo
196.description: Hagoromo, known to Earth's population at large as the Sage of Six Paths, was a legendary godlike figure who is regarded as the ancestor of shinobi, for his act of founding ninshuu which led to the creation of the ninja world. He was the son of Princess Kaguya‎‎ and alongside his fraternal twin brother, Hamura, were the first to be born with the same powerful chakra as their mother.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Hagoromo removes all helpful non-strategic skills from one enemy and deals 10 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

Ootsutsuki Hagoromo deals 20 damage to one enemy and grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

Ootsutsuki Hagoromo targets one enemy, who will lose 1 random energy and will be stunned for 1 turn. If this enemy is affected by Ootsutsuki Hamura's 'Six Paths Yin Power', 'Six Paths - Chibaku Tensei' will be applied on them.

Ootsutsuki Hagoromo heals one ally for 20 health each turn for 2 turns and during this time, this ally will ignore enemy stun effects and will be unable to be killed. For 1 turn, Ootsutsuki Hagoromo's skills except 'Six Paths Yang Power' will cost 1 additional random energy.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: The character affected by this skill is permanently stunned, loses 3 random energies once and takes 50 affliction damage once.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Kaguya.
Win 6 battles in a row with Hamura.
Win 35 battles with any Ootsutsuki clan member.

197.name: Ootsutsuki Ashura
197.description: Ashura was the younger son of Ootsutsuki Hagoromo. Though not the obvious choice to most, he would go on to inherit his father's teachings, and as a result, would have to clash bitterly against his elder brother Indra. Ashura is also credited with being the progenitor of both the Senju and Uzumaki clans.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Ashura destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 10 piercing damage twice to them. For 1 turn, this skill will deal 5 additional damage. For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional blue energy. This effect re-applies itself.

Ootsutsuki Ashura grants his team 30 points of destructible defense for 3 turns and during this time, every original non-affliction damage dealt to his allies will be capped at 20 (this effect cannot be ignored). For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional red energy. This effect re-applies itself. For 3 turns this skill will be replaced by 'Top Transformed Buddha'.

Ootsutsuki Ashura gains 25 points of permanent destructible defense and an additional 25 for every other skill of his he has active on him. During 'Amenomihashira', this skill will grant him 2 random energies. During 'True Several Thousand Hands', this skill will make him ignore enemy stun effects permanently. During 'Top Transformed Buddha', this skill will permanently cap every original non-affliction damage dealt to him at 20 (this effect cannot be ignored). This skill re-applies itself.
This skill makes Ootsutsuki Ashura invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Ashura deals 55 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, 'Six Paths: Kunitsukami' will cost 1 additional green energy. This effect re-applies itself.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with any Senju clan member.
Win 6 battles in a row with any Uzumaki clan member.
Win 25 battles with any Senju clan member.
Win 25 battles with any Uzumaki clan member.

198.name: Ootsutsuki Indra
198.description: Indra was the first born son of Ootsutsuki Hagoromo. He was initially thought to be the most suitable successor of his father's teachings, however, it was his younger brother Ashura that ended up inheriting this mantle — a decision that would lead the two brothers to fight against each other. Indra is also credited with being the creator of ninjutsu, and the progenitor of the Uchiha clan.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new skill, the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 3 turns. During 'Origin: Susanoo' this skill is replaced by 'Origin Blade'.

Ootsutsuki Indra targets all enemies, applying 'Lightning Release: Lightning Spear' on all of them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. During 'Origin: Susanoo' this skill is replaced by 'Origin Dual Blades'.

Ootsutsuki Indra takes 15 affliction damage* and then becomes invulnerable to physical skills permanently. During this time, he will ignore healing effects, take 5 affliction damage each turn* and everytime he uses a new skill, he will take another 10 affliction damage*. This skill can be used while active for no cost to cancel itself.

Ootsutsuki Indra targets himself or an ally for 1 turn, countering the first non-mental harmful skill used on them and dealing 10 affliction damage to the countered enemy. If 'Origin: Susanoo' is active, this skill will deal 30 affliction damage instead. This skill is invisible.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Indra destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 30 piercing damage to them. If that enemy's health drops to 5 or below, they will be instantly killed.
Ootsutsuki Indra targets all enemies, applying 'Origin Blade' on all of them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

mission: Win 7 battles in a row with any Uchiha clan member.
Win 50 battles with any Uchiha clan member.

199.name: Ootsutsuki Toneri
199.description: Toneri is a descendant of Ootsutsuki Hamura and the sole survivor of Ootsutsuki clan's branch family on the moon. He intends to destroy Rikudou Sennin's world by launching the moon itself on Earth.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy, who will deal 20 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 20 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible and this skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy, who will ignore all helpful effects for 1 turn. The following turn, this enemy will take 20 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible and this skill cannot be used on an enemy already affected by it.

Ootsutsuki Toneri targets one enemy. For 1 turn, if they use a new harmful skill, 'Truth-Seeking Dome' will cost 1 less random energy permanently. This effect stacks. The following turn, this enemy will take 10 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.
Ootsutsuki Toneri makes his team invulnerable for 1 turn.

mission: Win 50 battles with any Ootsutsuki clan member.

200.name: Uzumaki Boruto
200.description: Boruto is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village's Uzumaki clan and a direct descendant of the Hyuuga clan through his mother - he is the son of Naruto and Hinata. Stemming from his two strong bloodlines, Boruto is a prodigy, regarded as able to accomplish anything he attempts in remarkably short periods of time.

skills.skillDescription: Uzumaki Boruto deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will lose 1 random energy.
Uzumaki Boruto targets one enemy. After 3 turns, that enemy will take 40 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.

For 3 turns, Uzumaki Boruto will have 10 points of damage reduction and 10 points of destructible defense and his skills will ignore invulnerability. During this time, 'Amateur Gentle Fist' will instantly remove 1 random energy from its target instead and 'Vanishing Rasengan' will take effect after 1 turn instead.
This skill makes Uzumaki Boruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Uzumaki Boruto uses 'Amateur Gentle Fist' while 'Boruto Stream' is active and then uses 'Vanishing Rasengan' the turn right after, he will achieve 'Achievement: Jougan': For the rest of the game, every original non-affliction damage dealt to Uzumaki Boruto will be capped at 25 (this effect cannot be ignored).

201.name: Uchiha Sarada
201.description: Sarada is a kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village's Uchiha clan - she is the daughter of Sasuke and Sakura. Sarada is a member of Team Konohamaru and she seeks to someday become Hokage so that she can connect with as many people as possible.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Sarada deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy for 1 turn. This effect stacks. If this skill isn't already active on that enemy, they will also ignore damage reduction and destructible defense on them for 1 turn. This skill ends if Uchiha Sarada dies.
Uchiha Sarada deals 25 piercing damage to one enemy and then reduces that enemy's non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. This skill cannot be reflected.

Uchiha Sarada gains 5 points of permanent damage reduction. For the rest of the game, 'Fire Release: Great Fireball' will last 1 additional turn and 'Chidori' will deal 5 additional damage. This skill stacks but can only be used three times.
This skill makes Uchiha Sarada invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Uchiha Sarada gets the 3rd stack of 'Sharingan: Tomoe Activation' after she killed at least one enemy with 'Chidori', she will achieve 'Achievement: Full Sight': 'Sharingan: Tomoe Activation' is removed from her and becomes unable to be used again. She becomes invulnerable for 3 turns. For the rest of the game, 'Fire Release: Great Fireball' will last 3 additional turns and 'Chidori' will deal 20 additional damage.

202.name: Mitsuki
202.description: Mitsuki is a synthetic human that was created as a partial clone of Orochimaru who becomes a shinobi of the Hidden Leaf Village. Mitsuki was placed on Team Konohamaru.

skills.skillDescription: Mitsuki deals 15 damage to all enemies and for 1 turn any new skill they use that directly grants destructible defense will grant 20 less points of destructible defense.
Mitsuki deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, Mitsuki will gain 1 blue energy.

Mitsuki becomes invulnerable for 1 turn and deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, any member of Mitsuki's team that target that enemy with a new energy skill will deal 5 additional damage with energy skills permanently. This effect stacks.
This skill makes Mitsuki invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Mitsuki uses 'Wind Release: Breakthrough', 'Hidden Shadow Wild Snake Hands' and 'Lightning Release: Snake Lightning' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Sage Mode': For the rest of the game, Mitsuki will have 10 points of unpierceable damage reduction and his skills will first remove all helpful skills from their targets.

203.name: Nara Shikadai
203.description: Shikadai is a chuunin from the Hidden Leaf Village and the heir to the Nara clan. Shikadai is the son of Shikamaru and Temari and a member of the new era's Team 10, along with Chouchou and Inojin; the three of them form the seventeenth generation of the Ino-Shika-Chou trio.

skills.skillDescription: Nara Shikadai deals 10 damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical and strategic skills for 2 turns.

Nara Shikadai targets one ally and himself. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new physical or strategic skill on that ally or on Nara Shikadai will take 10 damage and then have their physical and strategic skills stunned for 2 turns. This skill is invisible and cannot be used on Nara Shikadai alone.

skills.skillName: Wind Release: Great Task of the Dragon
skills.skillDescription: Nara Shikadai deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies and reduces their non-affliction damage by 5 for 1 turn. These enemies will permanently take 5 additional damage from this skill and have their non-affliction damage reduced by 5 additional points by it. This skill stacks and ends if Nara Shikadai dies.
This skill makes Nara Shikadai invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Nara Shikadai uses 'Prepared Battle Tactics' twice in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Shadow Extending': 'Prepared Battle Tactics' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, 'Amateur Shadow Imitation' will target another random enemy in addition to its primary target.

204.name: Akimichi Chouchou
204.description: Chouchou is a kunoichi from the Hidden Leaf Village and a member of the Akimichi clan. Chouchou is the daughter of Chouji and Karui and a member of the new era's Team 10, along with Shikadai and Inojin; the three of them form the seventeenth generation of the Ino-Shika-Chou trio.

skills.skillDescription: Akimichi Chouchou deals 20 damage to one enemy and marks them for 1 turn. If the enemy is marked by: 'Human Bullet Tank', they will be stunned for 1 turn; 'Rock Fragment Barrage', they will ignore all helpful effects except energy cost changes for 1 turn.

Akimichi Chouchou deals 15 damage to one enemy, marks them for 1 turn and becomes invulnerable for 1 turn. If the enemy is marked by: 'Partial Multi-Size Technique', they will take 10 additional damage from physical skills for 1 turn; 'Rock Fragment Barrage', they will take 10 additional damage from energy skills for 1 turn.

Akimichi Chouchou deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies and marks them for 1 turn. Enemies marked by: 'Partial Multi-Size Technique' will take another 20 damage; 'Human Bullet Tank' will have all helpful non-strategic skills removed from them.
This skill makes Akimichi Chouchou invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Akimichi Chouchou uses 'Partial Multi-Size Technique' while having 40 or less health, she will achieve 'Achievement: Butterfly Mode': For the rest of the game, her skills will ignore invulnerability and will deal 10 additional damage.

205.name: Yamanaka Inojin
205.description: Inojin is a shinobi from the Hidden Leaf Village and a member of the Yamanaka clan. Inojin is the son of Sai and Ino and a member of the new era's Team 10, along with Shikadai and Chouchou; the three of them form the seventeenth generation of the Ino-Shika-Chou trio.

skills.skillDescription: Yamanaka Inojin deals 15 damage to one enemy and 5 damage to all other enemies. The main target will take 5 additional damage from Yamanaka Inojin's skills for 1 turn. The other enemies will take 10 additional damage from Yamanaka Inojin's skills for 1 turn.
Yamanaka Inojin stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 2 turns. When this skill ends, this enemy will take 25 damage. This skill will end if Yamanaka Inojin dies.

Yamanaka Inojin stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. One random enemy will take 20 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.
This skill makes Yamanaka Inojin invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Yamanaka Inojin uses 'Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Dogs', 'Tiger Vision Staring Bullet' and 'Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Shoebill' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Paper Bomb Application': For the rest of the game, 'Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Dogs' will also deal 10 piercing damage instantly to its targets and 'Tiger Vision Staring Bullet' will also deal 15 piercing damage instantly to its target.

209.name: Shinki of the Iron Sand
209.description: Shinki is a chuunin of the Hidden Sand Village's Kazekage clan and the adopted son of Gaara. He also acts as leader of his team. Taught by his uncle, Shinki is a puppeteer, wielding a skeleton-like puppet alongside him. Using his sand instead, Shinki can control his puppets without chakra threads.

skills.skillDescription: Shinki of the Iron Sand deals 15 damage to one enemy and stuns their strategic skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Iron Sand Weaponry: Spear' will deal 15 additional damage and Shinki of the Iron Sand will have 15 points of destructible defense. This skill ends if Shinki of the Iron Sand receives new non-affliction damage.

Shinki of the Iron Sand deals 10 damage to all enemies and becomes invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Iron Sand Weaponry: Spear' will deal 10 additional damage and Shinki of the Iron Sand will have 10 points of destructible defense. This skill ends if Shinki of the Iron Sand receives new non-affliction damage.
Shinki of the Iron Sand deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy.
This skill makes Shinki of the Iron Sand invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Shinki of the Iron Sand uses 'Iron Sand Weaponry: Spear' while having 35 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Crush': For the rest of the game, 'Iron Sand Weaponry: Spear' will kill its target if their health drops to 10 or below.

210.name: Araya
210.description: Araya is a chuunin of the Hidden Sand Village. He is a member of a team along with Shinki and Yodo. Araya is skilled in kenjutsu and also excels in the use of the Puppet Technique, which he used to manipulate a life-like replica of himself.

skills.skillDescription: Araya targets himself or an ally, making the target invulnerable to physical skills for 1 turn.
Araya deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For the following 3 turns, that enemy will take 5 affliction damage*. This skill stacks.
Araya deals 30 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to use skills with non-conditional stun or counter effects (this is a stun effect) for 1 turn.
This skill makes Araya invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Araya uses 'Chakra Threads', 'Falling Beheading' and 'Puppet Technique: Salamander' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Puppet Body Replacement': For the rest of the game, 'Chakra Threads' will make its target invulnerable to physical and energy skills instead and the affliction damage of 'Falling Beheading' will last permanently instead.

211.name: Yodo
211.description: Araya is a chuunin of the Hidden Sand Village. He is a member of a team along with Shinki and Yodo. Araya is skilled in kenjutsu and also excels in the use of the Puppet Technique, which he used to manipulate a life-like replica of himself.

skills.skillDescription: For 1 turn, the first enemy that uses a new harmful skill on Yodo will take 5 additional damage from physical skills for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.
Yodo deals 15 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, this skill will cost 1 less random energy.

Yodo stuns one enemy's physical, energy and strategic skills for 1 turn. This enemy will take 10 additional damage from 'Howling Hair Sound Wave' for 4 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.
This skill makes Yodo invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Yodo uses 'Enhanced Hearing' 4 times in the game, she will achieve 'Achievement: Full Force': 'Enhanced Hearing' is removed from her. For the rest of the game, the triggered damage increase effect of 'Enhanced Hearing' will last 4 turns instead and 'Howling Hair Sound Wave' will cost 1 random energy instead but won't decrease its own cost.

212.name: Kawaki
212.description: Kawaki is a genin raised by Kara to be the future vessel for Ootsutsuki Isshiki and the key to the fulfilment of their greatest wish. After being brought to the Hidden Leaf Village by Team 7, he is taken in by Uzumaki Naruto who raises him as his own, during which he develops a brotherly bond with Boruto to solve the mystery of the Karma.

skills.skillDescription: Kawaki deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy. For 3 turns, this enemy's destructible defense will be destroyed each turn. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill or if it's removed from Kawaki or the affected enemy.

Kawaki deals 10 piercing damage to all enemies, who will take 5 piercing damage each following turn permanently. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill* or if it's removed from Kawaki or any of the affected enemies.
Kawaki will gain 25 points of destructible defense for 1 turn each turn permanently. This skill ends if Kawaki uses any new skill.
This skill makes Kawaki invulnerable for 1 turn.
