alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Kawaki uses any skill while having 10 or less health, he will achieve 'Achievement: Karma': All of Kawaki's skills are removed from him. He will be unable to be killed for 3 turns. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Karma Kawaki's skills.

mission: Win 15 battles with Sarada or Mitsuki.

213.name: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B)
213.description: As the years went through, Konohamaru became a teacher on the Hidden Leaf Village's academy and also a jounin. He is now a very skilled shinobi capable of using a variety of ninja techniques. Konohamaru was set to be the captain of the new Team 7.

skills.skillDescription: Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and stuns their affliction skills for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will ignore all harmful non-conditional affliction damage for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) stuns one enemy and makes them invulnerable to friendly skills for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.

Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) deals 35 damage to one enemy and reduces that enemy's non-affliction damage by 10 for 1 turn. This turn, any ally that targets that enemy with a new skill will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage for 1 turn; this triggered effect cannot be ignored.
This skill makes Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Sarutobi Konohamaru (B) uses 'Fire Release: Blazing Meteors', 'Adamantine Seal: Monkey Yang Suppression' and 'Mature Rasengan' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Sealing Release': All harmful skills are removed from him. For the rest of the game, he will ignore enemy stun effects and harmful non-conditional affliction damage.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Konohamaru.
Win 20 battles with any Team 7 (new era) member.

214.name: Hokage Naruto
214.description: Naruto finally achieved his goal and became the Seventh Hokage. He married Hinata and had two kids, Boruto and Himawari. As the village's Hokage, Naruto is a shield for it and is always ready to use all he has to protect his people. Damn, Boruto's dad should definitely get an anime of his own...

skills.skillDescription: Offense: Hokage Naruto deals 10 damage, 10 piercing damage and 5 affliction damage* to one enemy. Defense: For 1 turn, any enemy who targets any member of Hokage Naruto's team with a new skill will take 10 affliction damage* instantly and then have their affliction skills stunned for 3 turns. This skill is invisible.
Offense: For 1 turn, all enemies will deal 20 less non-affliction damage. This skill is invisible. Defense: For 1 turn, Hokage Naruto's team will be unable to be killed. This skill is invisible.

Hokage Naruto removes all harmful affliction skills from himself. For 3 turns, he will have 10 points of damage reduction and will toggle 'Lava Release: Rasenshuriken' and 'Chakra Arms Caging' to their defense state (they are by nature on their offense state).
This skill makes Hokage Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill will permanently have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Hokage Naruto uses 'Chakra Arms Wall' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Kurama's Avatar': 'Chakra Arms Wall' is removed from him and can no longer be used again. For the rest of the game, his skills will also grant him 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Rikudou Naruto.

215.name: Uchiha Sasuke (B)
215.description: Travelling the whole ninja world was a way of Sasuke redeeming himself by helping his village the most he can. However, he settled in his personal life by marrying Sakura and having a daughter named Sarada. As an adult, Sasuke is not the most present family member and friend but keeps his position as one of the strongest shinobi alive.

skills.skillDescription: Offense: Uchiha Sasuke (B) deals 25 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, this enemy will be invulnerable to friendly skills. Defense: Uchiha Sasuke (B) targets himself or an ally. For 1 turn, all new harmful non-mental skills used on the target will be countered. This skill is invisible.

Offense: Uchiha Sasuke (B) targets one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, this enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and all harmful physical or energy skills they use will be countered. Defense: Uchiha Sasuke (B) targets one ally, granting them 15 points of destructible defense and increasing their non-affliction damage by 10 for 2 turns.

Uchiha Sasuke (B) removes all harmful affliction skills from himself. For 3 turns, he will have 10 points of damage reduction and will toggle 'Quickened Chibaku Tensei' and 'Susanoo Coating' to their defense state (they are by nature on their offense state).
This skill makes Uchiha Sasuke (B) invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill will permanently have 1 less turn of cooldown. This skill stacks.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Uchiha Sasuke (B) uses 'Amenotejikara' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Perfect Susanoo': 'Amenotejikara' is removed from him and can no longer be used again. For the rest of the game, his skills will also grant him 30 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Rinnegan Sasuke.

300.name: Shin Clone
300.description: Shin is the name given to the various individual genetic clones of the original Uchiha Shin, who treats them both as sons and organ donors. The clones are shown to be very capable in battle, having enough scientific knowledge to create more clones.

skills.skillDescription: Shin Clone deals 15 damage to one enemy, who will take 10 piercing damage the following turn. For 1 turn, 'One-Hand Shuriken Stab' will deal 5 additional damage and Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.
Shin Clone deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy and kills them if their health drops to 10 or below. For 1 turn, Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.
Shin Clone makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'One-Hand Shuriken Stab' will deal 5 less damage and Shin Clone will gain 5 points of damage reduction.
This skill makes Shin Clone invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Shin Clone uses the same skill 5 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan': All skills are removed from Shin Clone. For the rest of the game, any enemy who targets Shin Clone with a new skill will take 25 piercing damage.

mission: Win 4 battles in a row with Sarada.

301.name: Uchiha Shin
301.description: Shin was a former test subject of Orochimaru. After developing a fixation on the Uchiha clan, more specifically Itachi, he took the Uchiha name for himself and severed ties with Orochimaru, taking his "sons" with him. Believing that peace was detrimental to human evolution, Shin began a plot to revive the Akatsuki so that the ensuing conflict would be a catalyst to further his beliefs.

skills.skillDescription: Uchiha Shin deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical skills for 1 turn. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself.

Uchiha Shin deals 45 damage to one enemy and then stuns their physical skills for 2 turns. This skill does not stack and will re-apply itself. For 1 turn 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' will have no cooldown.

Uchiha Shin targets one enemy for 1 turn. During this time, if that enemy uses a new skill, they will permanently take 5 additional damage from Uchiha Shin's skills and be stunned for 1 additional turn by them. The target of this skill is invisible. This skill stacks.
This skill makes Uchiha Shin invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Uchiha Shin uses 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' twice in a row, he will achieve 'Achievement: Mangekyou Sharingan': For the rest of the game, 'Object Manipulation: Blade Barrage' will now also heal Uchiha Shin for 15 health and 'Object Manipulation: Bladed Shuriken' will now also heal Uchiha Shin for 45 health.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Shin Clone.

302.name: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki
302.description: Kinshiki is a member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family, who serves as a guardian for his foster son Momoshiki. Kinshiki possesses the ability to absorb any kind of ninjutsu and transform the chakra into various red glowing ninja tools at will, which he is proficient with handling.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Kinshiki targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful physical or energy skills used on them for 1 turn. The target will gain 1 random energy for each skill countered this way. This skill is invisible.

Ootsutsuki Kinshiki deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and then targets one random member of his team. For 1 turn, this character will gain 1 random energy for every new harmful physical or energy skill used on them. This skill is invisible.

Ootsutsuki Kinshiki deals 15 damage to all enemies and grants his team 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. For 1 turn, if used again, this skill will instead deal 35 damage to one enemy and grant Ootsutsuki Kinshiki 25 points of destructible defense for 1 turn.
This skill makes Ootsutsuki Kinshiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Ootsutsuki Kinshiki uses 'Tool Cover' 4 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Tool Barrage': 'Tool Cover' is removed from him. For the rest of the game, 'Oodachi Mow Down' will target all enemies and all members of Ootsutsuki Kinshiki's team instead.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Boruto.
Win 30 battles with any Team 7 (new era) member.

303.name: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki
303.description: Momoshiki is a member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family, sent to investigate the whereabouts of Kaguya and her God Tree and then attempting to cultivate a new one out of the chakra of the Seventh Hokage. As an Ootsutsuki, Momoshiki has the ability to fly and his chakra is extremely powerful.

skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki deals 15 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. For 2 turns, this skill will cost 1 additional random energy and will deal 15 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.skillName: Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb
skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets himself or an ally, countering all harmful energy skills used on them for 1 turn. After 3 uses of this skill, it can no longer be used and 'Reign of the High Emperor: Release' will be able to be used. This skill is invisible.

skills.skillName: Reign of the High Emperor: Release
skills.skillDescription: Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets one enemy, first removing all helpful skills on them and then dealing 75 damage to them. 'Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb' can now be used again. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and requires 3 uses of 'Reign of the High Emperor: Absorb' so it can be used.

Ootsutsuki Momoshiki targets one ally permanently. If their health drops to 10 or below while Ootsutsuki Momoshiki is dead, that ally will be healed for 90 health, will have all helpful and harmful skills removed from them and will have all their skills replaced by Ootsutsuki Momoshiki's skills permanently. This skill is invisible and cannot be used while active.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Ootsutsuki Momoshiki uses 'Chakra Extraction' 7 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Chakra Fruit': All skills are removed from him and he is healed for 100 health. For the rest of the game, his skills will be replaced by Chakra Fruit Momoshiki's skills.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Kinshiki.

304.name: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki
304.description: Momoshiki is a member of the Ootsutsuki clan's main family, sent to investigate the whereabouts of Kaguya and her God Tree and then attempting to cultivate a new one out of the chakra of the Seventh Hokage. As an Ootsutsuki, Momoshiki has the ability to fly and his chakra is extremely powerful.

skills.skillDescription: Chakra Fruit Momoshiki stuns one enemy's physical and strategic skills for 2 turns. If this skill is used on an enemy already affected by it, it will deal 30 damage to them instead.

Chakra Fruit Momoshiki targets all enemies for 3 turns. Once this skill's duration is over, they will take 20 damage. If they use a new harmful skill during this time, they will take 30 damage and this skill will end on them.
Chakra Fruit Momoshiki removes all harmful skills from his team. He will gain 45 points of permanent destructible defense and his allies will gain 20 points of permanent destructible defense.
This skill makes Chakra Fruit Momoshiki invulnerable for 1 turn.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Chakra Fruit Momoshiki uses 'Hair Binding Technique', 'Dog Raising Robust Lord' and 'Monkey Rock' consecutively in this order, he will achieve 'Achievement: Triggered Rage': For the rest of the game, everytime an enemy uses a new skill on him, that enemy will take 10 additional damage from damaging skills for 1 turn.

mission: Win 6 battles in a row with Momoshiki

305.name: Karma Kawaki
305.description: Kawaki possesses the Karma mark of Ootsutsuki Isshiki, which he acquired when the Ootsutsuki branded him in hopes of making him his vessel. With it, he is able to absorb ninjutsu, and with Boruto's cooperation, can open portals to other dimensions.

skills.skillDescription: Karma Kawaki deals 25 damage and 25 piercing damage to one enemy. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also deal an additional 25 affliction damage* to the enemy.

Karma Kawaki destroys one enemy's destructible defense, deals 15 piercing damage to them, stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn and kills them if their health drops to 5 or below. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also remove 2 random energies from the enemy.
Karma Kawaki becomes invulnerable to energy and affliction-only skills for 3 turns. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also grant him 2 random energies instantly.
This skill makes Karma Kawaki invulnerable for 1 turn. If Karma Kawaki's health is at 15 or below, this skill will also remove all harmful skills from him.

alternateSkills.skillDescription: If Karma Kawaki uses 'Karma-Enhanced Shinobi-Ware' 3 times in the game, he will achieve 'Achievement: Recharge': His health is set to 15 and he gains 60 points of permanent destructible defense. For the rest of the game, his harmful skills will have no cooldown.

mission: Win 5 battles in a row with Kawaki
